[\[4b.7\]]'du byas pas 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar ltung bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/_de ni gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzhan du na sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad kyi don byed de/_sems can nam sgyu mar yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de sems can dang 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]sgyu ma [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol 
[\[5a.2\]]tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 'khor lo dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[5a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bur yongs su shes so/_/chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur yongs su shes so/_/chos thams cad [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bur yongs su shes so/_/chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes so/_/chos thams 
[\[5a.4\]]cad smyig rgyu lta bur yongs su shes so/_/chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ji ltar na chos thams cad [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 
[\[5a.5\]]'tshal ba lags/_ji ltar na chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/_ji ltar na chos thams cad [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/_ji ltar na chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yang dag pa ji 
[\[5a.6\]]lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/_ji ltar na chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/_ji ltar na chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[5a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/[{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sgra brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]thos so/_/sgra brnyan nyan pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]mthong ngo /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sgyu ma [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sgyu ma mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/smyig rgyu [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/smyig rgyu mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sprul pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sprul pa mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi 
[\[5b.2\]{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam ni phyin ci log go_/sgra brnyan ni phyin ci log go_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor ni phyin ci log go_/sgyu ma ni phyin ci log go_/smyig rgyu ni phyin ci log go_/sprul pa ni phyin ci log go/_dgra bcom pa ni [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/[{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sgra brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]thos so/_/
[\[5b.3\]]sgra brnyan nyan pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sgyu ma [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sgyu ma mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/smyig rgyu [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/smyig rgyu mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sprul pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sprul pa mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rang sangs

[\[5b.7\]]lam [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/[{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/sgra brnyan [{]myi [,]mi [}]gsan no/_/sgra brnyan nyan pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/sgyu ma [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/sgyu ma mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/smyig rgyu [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]gzigs so/_/smyig rgyu mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/sprul pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/sprul pa mthong ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar yang dag pa ma yin pas/_chos thams cad ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[6a.2\]]'das pa dang mnyam pa ste/_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad yongs su grub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dngos po'i 'du shes sam/_yongs su grub pa'i 'du shes 
[\[6a.3\]]sam/_yang dag pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/_de ni gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te chos la la zhig gi ngo bo nyid dam/_yongs su grub pa'am/_yang dag par gyur pa zhig [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_/
[\[6a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/_gzugs la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du shes la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du byed la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[6a.5\]]khams rnams la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/skye mched rnams la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'dod pa'i khams la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzugs kyi khams la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[6a.6\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa 
[\[6a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nang stong pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chen po stong pa nyid la chags 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la chags pa

[\[6b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags

[\[6b.5\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bsam gtan rnams la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[6b.6\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]snying rje chen po la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 
[\[7a.2\]]'bras bu la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang byang chub la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[7a.3\]]tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /_sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/_shes 
[\[7a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/_shes 
[\[7a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/_shes rab 
[\[7a.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing sa bzhi ba yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[7a.7\]]tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /_sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]la gnas shing /_sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 
[\[7b.2\]]gnas shing /_sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas 
[\[7b.3\]]shing /_sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /_
[\[7b.4\]]sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /_sa bcu 
[\[7b.5\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /_shes rab 
[\[7b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der chos thams cad kyang 'dus par mthong ste/_chos de dag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di 
[\[7b.7\]]ltar chos de dag dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos de dag ni tha dad du bya ba gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_chos kyi dbyings su bstan pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du bstan pa dang /_yang dag pa'i 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]mthar bstan pas/_chos thams cad dbyer [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa lags na/_ji ltar dge ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos rnams bstan pa lags/_ji ltar 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 
[\[8a.2\]]'das pa'i chos rnams bstan pa lags/_ji ltar zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams bstan pa lags/_ji ltar 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams bstan pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[8a.3\]]du sems/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la 'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_byang chub 
[\[8a.4\]]sems dpa' gang yang brjod du yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs des 'di ltar chos thams cad dbyer [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_chos thams cad mtshan 
[\[8a.5\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs shes bya ba'am/_tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/_'du shes zhes bya ba 'am/_'du byed ces bya ba 'am/_rnam par 
[\[8a.6\]]shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]ces bya ba 'am/_rna ba zhes bya ba 'am/_sna zhes bya ba 'am/_lce zhes bya ba 'am/_lus shes bya ba 'am/_yid ces bya ba 'am/_gzugs shes bya ba 'am/_sgra zhes bya ba 'am/_dri zhes bya ba 'am/_ro zhes bya ba 'am/_reg ces bya ba 
[\[8a.7\]]'am/_chos shes bya ba 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/_sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/_lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/_yid kyi rnam par 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes 
[\[8b.2\]]bya ba 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/_lus kyi 
[\[8b.3\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/_sa'i khams shes bya ba 'am/_chu'i khams shes bya ba 'am/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams shes bya ba 'am/_rlung gi khams shes bya ba 'am/_nam mkha'i khams 
[\[8b.4\]]shes bya ba 'am/_rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba 'am/_ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'am/_'du byed ces bya ba 'am/_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs shes bya ba 'am/_skye mched drug ces bya ba 'am/_reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/_tshor ba zhes 
[\[8b.5\]]bya ba 'am/_sred pa zhes bya ba 'am/_len pa zhes bya ba 'am/_srid pa zhes bya ba 'am/_skye ba zhes bya ba 'am/_rga shi zhes bya ba 'am/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[8b.6\]]phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/_nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_phyi nang stong pa nyid 
[\[8b.7\]]ces bya ba 'am/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]ces bya ba 'am/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[9a.2\]]ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya 
[\[9a.3\]]ba 'am/_yang dag par spong ba rnams shes bya ba 'am/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/_dbang po rnams shes bya ba 'am/_stobs rnams shes bya ba 'am/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ba 'am/_'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[9a.4\]]lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/_bsam gtan rnams shes bya ba 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/_rnam 
[\[9a.5\]]par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba 'am/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/_
[\[9a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams shes bya ba 'am/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya ba 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'am/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'am/_byams pa chen po zhes 
[\[9a.7\]]bya ba 'am/_snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ces bya ba 'am/_dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/_nyon 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/_'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/_
[\[9b.2\]]thun mong gi chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/_thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/_'dus byas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[9b.3\]]ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_chos gang gi 
[\[9b.4\]]rang bzhin yang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[9b.5\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas pa ni byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs 
[\[9b.6\]]par byed do/_/sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/_/de la gnas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams 
[\[9b.7\]]ci nas kyang dul bar gyur nas/_srid pa gsum na [{]myi [,]mi [}]snang ba de ltar rnam par btul lo/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u drug cu gnyis so//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams 
[\[10a.2\]]cad [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bu dngos po ma mchis pa/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa rnams la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig 
[\[10a.3\]]rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon 
[\[10a.4\]]du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[10a.5\]]'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/zhes bgyi bar ji ltar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/_chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu/_sgyu ma lta bu/_
[\[10a.6\]]smyig rgyu lta bu/_sprul pa lta bu/_dngos po ma mchis pa/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa rnams la/_'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di 
[\[10a.7\]]dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i 
[\[10b.2\]]rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o zhes bgyi bar ji ltar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[10b.3\]]'di la byis pa thos pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa so so'i skye bo ni [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam mthong ba yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sgra brnyan yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_sgra brnyan nyan pa yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor mthong ba yang 
[\[10b.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sgyu ma yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_sgyu ma mthong ba yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/smyig rgyu yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_smyig rgyu mthong ba yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sprul pa yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_sprul pa mthong ba yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/des [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam yang [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]
[\[10b.5\]]lam mthong ba yang [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sgra brnyan yang [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sgra brnyan nyan pa yang [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor yang [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor mthong ba yang [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sgyu ma yang [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sgyu ma mthong ba yang [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_smig rgyu yang [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_smyig rgyu 
[\[10b.6\]]mthong ba yang [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sprul pa yang [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sprul pa mthong ba yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]nas/_lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyis dge ba'i 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do/_/lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do/_/
[\[10b.7\]]de bzhin du lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyis bsod nams dang /_bsod nams ma yin pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo ba'i 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_mtha' 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong ba nyid dang /_stong ba nyid gnyis la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston te/_khams gsum 'di ni stong pa ste/_'di la gzugs sam/_tshor 
[\[11a.2\]]ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/_phung po rnams sam/_khams rnams sam/_skye mched rnams [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'di ni [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam/_'di ni sgra brnyan/_'di ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor/_'di ni sgyu ma/_'di ni smyig rgyu/_'di ni sprul pa 
[\[11a.3\]]ste/_'di la phung po rnams sam/_khams rnams sam/_skye mched rnams [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'di la [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sgra brnyan [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sgra brnyan nyan pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sgyu ma 
[\[11a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sgyu ma byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/smyig rgyu [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/smig rgyu mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sprul pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sprul pa byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/_'on kyang khyed ni phung po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[11a.5\]]la phung por 'du shes pa/_khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la kha mas su 'du shes pa/_skye mched [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la skye mched du 'du shes pa dag ste/_chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyin ci log las skyes pa/_las kyi rnam par smin 
[\[11a.6\]]pas yongs su bzung ba yin na/_khyed rnams ci'i phyir chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la dngos po'i 'du shes su byed ces te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas 
[\[11a.7\]]pas sems can ser sna can dag ser sna las rnam par bzlog nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor te/_sbyin pa yongs su btang ba de yang de dag la longs spyod chen po'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/des de dag de las bskyod nas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]phyin pa la sbyor te/_tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa de yang de dag la mtho ris su skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/des de dag de las bskyod nas/_ting nge 'dzin la sbyor te/_ting nge 'dzin de yang de dag la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/
[\[11b.2\]]des de dag de las bskyod nas/_bsam gtan dang po la sbyor te/_bsam gtan dang po las bskyod nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la sbyor ro/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa las bskyod nas/_bsam gtan gsum pa la sbyor ro/_/bsam gtan gsum 
[\[11b.3\]]pa las bskyod nas/_bsam gtan bzhi ba la sbyor ro/_/bsam gtan bzhi ba las bskyod nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor ro/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las bskyod nas/_
[\[11b.4\]]rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor ro/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las bskyod nas/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor ro/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi 
[\[11b.5\]]snyoms par 'jug pa las bskyod nas/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor ro/_/des sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dma' ba de las rnam grangs du mas bskyod de/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das 
[\[11b.6\]]pa'i dbyings su dbugs 'byin to/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/des tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de las rnam grangs du mas bskyod de/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu gzhog go_/
[\[11b.7\]]des ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu de las rnam grangs du mas bskyod de/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu gzhog go_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par 
[\[12a.2\]]gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' 
[\[12a.3\]]bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/dbang po lnga la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god 
[\[12a.4\]]do/_/stobs lnga la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng bstod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par ston to/_/
[\[12a.5\]]yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng bstod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par 
[\[12a.6\]]gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/
[\[12a.7\]]'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/bsam gtan bzhi la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la yang 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/
[\[12b.2\]]yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/
[\[12b.3\]]'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 
[\[12b.4\]]'god do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/mngon 
[\[12b.5\]]par shes pa rnams la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/
[\[12b.6\]]yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul 
[\[12b.7\]]lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la yang 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/so so yang dag par rig par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag 
[\[13a.2\]]par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/byams pa chen po la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' 
[\[13a.3\]]bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/snying rje chen po la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/sangs 
[\[13a.4\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/de zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_
[\[13a.5\]]bstan du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag gis gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba de dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba de dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 
[\[13a.6\]]'god do/_/gang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba de dag phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/gang dgra bcom pa nyid don du gnyer ba de dag dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do/_/gang rang byang chub don du gnyer ba de dag rang byang 
[\[13a.7\]]chub la rab tu 'god do/_/gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba de dag la byang chub kyi lam brjod cing ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/'dul 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]lo/_/gzhog go/_rab tu 'god do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang chu zla lta bu dang [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu dang /_
[\[13b.2\]]sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smyig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul ba lta bu ste/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la rnam par dgod par byed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 
[\[13b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_
[\[13b.4\]]chos thams cad mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa stong pa nyid la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das 
[\[13b.5\]]pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus 
[\[13b.6\]]ma byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur 
[\[13b.7\]]ba'o/_/'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/zhes bgyi bar rnam 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]par dgod par bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar te/_rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de 
[\[14a.2\]]bzhin te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_chos thams cad mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid dang /_thog 
[\[14a.3\]]ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas 
[\[14a.4\]]pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/
[\[14a.5\]]'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di 
[\[14a.6\]]dag ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/zhes bya bar rnam par dgod pa byed pa de 
[\[14a.7\]]ni ngo mtshar te/_rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos de shes kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]dpa' chen po de la slar phan gdags par bya ba sla ba ma yin te/_khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos de zil gyis gnan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos 
[\[14b.2\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la ma mchis pa'i ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la mchis pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gyis 
[\[14b.3\]]shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i stong pa nyid thams cad la 
[\[14b.4\]]gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan bzhi la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung 
[\[14b.5\]]ba'i tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[14b.6\]]par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i 
[\[14b.7\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/_
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byams pa chen po la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i snying rje chen po la gnas/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i 
[\[15a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la gnas shing /_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song zhing /_sems can gang la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang 
[\[15a.3\]]la tshul khrims kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la bzod pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni bzod pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la brtson 'grus kyis phan gdags 
[\[15a.4\]]par bya ba de dag la ni brtson 'grus kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni ting nge 'dzin gyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la shes rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni shes rab 
[\[15a.5\]]kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la bsam gtan dang pos phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni bsam gtan dang pos phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la bsam gtan gnyis pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni bsam gtan 
[\[15a.6\]]gnyis pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la bsam gtan gsum pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni bsam gtan gsum pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la bsam gtan bzhi pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni 
[\[15a.7\]]bsam gtan bzhi pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]gang la rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas 
[\[15b.2\]]phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[15b.3\]]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la byams pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni byams pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la snying rjes phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni snying rjes phan 
[\[15b.4\]]'dogs so/_/sems can gang la dga' bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni dga' bas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la btang snyoms kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni btang snyoms kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la dran 
[\[15b.5\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la yang dag par spong ba bzhis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_yang dag par spong ba bzhis phan 'dogs so/_/
[\[15b.6\]]sems can gang la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la dbang po lngas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni dbang po lngas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la stobs 
[\[15b.7\]]lngas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni stobs lngas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la 'phags pa'i lam 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]yan lag brgyad pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 
[\[16a.2\]]kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus phan gdags par bya 
[\[16a.3\]]ba de dag la ni/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang 
[\[16a.4\]]la mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[16a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin gyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la mngon par shes pa rnams kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis phan 
[\[16a.6\]]gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus phan 'dogs so/_/
[\[16a.7\]]sems can gang la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis phan 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]'dogs so/_/sems can gang la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la snying rje chen pos phan gdags par bya ba de dag la 
[\[16b.2\]]ni snying rje chen pos phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la thams cad shes pa nyid kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_thams cad shes pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis phan gdags 
[\[16b.3\]]par bya ba de dag la ni/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs so/_/sems can gang la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[16b.4\]]kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams la sman 'dogs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[16b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_zas 'dod pa rnams la zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa/_phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/_spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/_
[\[16b.6\]]byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/_gos 'dod pa rnams la gos/_mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha/_gnas 'dod pa rnams la gnas/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser 
[\[16b.7\]]dang /_dngul 'dod pa rnams la/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul gyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba nas/[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ste/_ji ltar 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa/_dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul zhing yongs su gtong ba dang /_ji ltar rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 
[\[17a.2\]]dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la yongs su gtong ba de bzhin du/_myir gyur pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas su 
[\[17a.3\]]gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la yang tha dad du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni tha dad du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_des tha dad du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sbyin pa byin pas/_
[\[17a.4\]]tha dad du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags sbyin pa'i gnas ma yin par mthong nas/_
[\[17a.5\]]'di snyam du/_bdag gi sbyin gnas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa ma yin no snyam na/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[17a.6\]]pos ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_'di ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag la ni sbyin pas phan gdags par bya'o/_/'di dag la ni phan gdags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/zhes bya bar bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag 
[\[17a.7\]]par zhugs pa ma yin te/_de dag sbyin pas phan btags nas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye/_bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye/_khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/_sbyin pa de nyid kyis phan btags 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]pa de dag theg pa gsum gyis rim gyis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis gsad par 
[\[17b.2\]]gsol ba btab na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin no snyam 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sbyin no snyam pa'i sems gzhan bskyed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'i/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems kyis skye bo'i tshogs de dag la sbyin par bya'o/_/
[\[17b.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir/_gal te de ltar rnam par rtog na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_
[\[17b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_slob pa rnams dang /_lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten kyis smad par 'gyur te/_de la thog mar 
[\[17b.5\]]sems can thams cad kyi mgon gyis shig ce 'am/_gnas dang /_skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen gyis shig ces sus gsol ba btab btab ces smad par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[17b.6\]]po'i drung du myir gyur pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin par gyur pa dag 'ongs nas/_bdag ni slong mo pa'o zhes yan lag dang /_nying lag gcad par gsol ba btab na/_de'i tshe des sbyin nam [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyin snyam pa'i sems gnyis su bskyed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[17b.7\]]zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can rnams kyi don du ched du bsams te/_lus 'dis bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don bya'o zhes lus yongs su bzung bas na/_des 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]'di dag gi don du lus yongs su bzung bzung bas de dag bslang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dgos pas khyer zhing dengs shig ces sems bskyed par byas te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[18a.2\]]phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos slongs mo ba mthong na 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad kyi rang bzhin [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_'di la su zhig ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong /_su la ni 
[\[18a.3\]]sbyin par bya/_ci zhig ni sbyin par bya zhes sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos de dag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ste/_stong pa nyid la ni gang la yang yongs su gtong ba 'am/_gang las kyang 'phrogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[18a.4\]]rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa 
[\[18a.5\]]nyid dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid 
[\[18a.6\]]dam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/de stong pa nyid de dag la gnas shing /_sbyin pa 
[\[18a.7\]]gtong na/_de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des/_phyi dang nang gi chos la gcad cing gtubs kyang /_bdag la su yang gtub pa 'am/_gcad do/_
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]snyam pa'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ngo //_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[18b.2\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 
[\[18b.3\]]'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de de dag zhi bar byas te/_yongs su 
[\[18b.4\]]bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/_des 
[\[18b.5\]]sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam 
[\[18b.6\]]par langs nas/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing /_rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho phyogs 
[\[18b.7\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/_rdzu 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis 
[\[19a.2\]]sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po 
[\[19a.3\]]dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/_des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing /_sems can dmyal ba chen 
[\[19a.4\]]po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing /_rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/rab 
[\[19a.5\]]'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/_sems can dmyal 
[\[19a.6\]]ba chen po dag tu dong zhing sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can 
[\[19a.7\]]dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang /_byang 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/_des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 
[\[19b.2\]]dag la sems mos par byas shing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing /_rim gyis 
[\[19b.3\]]theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis/_'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub 
[\[19b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_
[\[19b.5\]]rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/_yongs su bstan 
[\[19b.6\]]pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/_des sems 
[\[19b.7\]]can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas/_rnam par langs nas/_lha 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]dang [{]mye [,]me [}]dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing /_rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_byang shar gyi 
[\[20a.2\]]phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar 
[\[20a.3\]]byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis 
[\[20a.4\]]sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po 
[\[20a.5\]]dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/_des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/_sems mos par byas shing /_
[\[20a.6\]]sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing /_rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal 
[\[20a.7\]]mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]chen po dag ched du bsams te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 
[\[20b.2\]]'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 
[\[20b.3\]]'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/_des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems 
[\[20b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing /_
[\[20b.5\]]rim gyis breg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 
[\[20b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_
[\[20b.7\]]rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/_yongs su bstan 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos chos ston 
[\[21a.2\]]te/_des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas/_rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag 
[\[21a.3\]]nas rnam par langs nas/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing /_rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_nub byang gi 
[\[21a.4\]]phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi 
[\[21a.5\]]bar byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 
[\[21a.6\]]gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje 
[\[21a.7\]]chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/_des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing /_rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas 
[\[21b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag 
[\[21b.3\]]tu dong zhing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i 
[\[21b.4\]]sems can de dag la chos ston cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[21b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/_des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[21b.6\]]po de dag la sems mos par byas shing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing /_rim gyis theg 
[\[21b.7\]]pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul 
[\[22a.2\]]dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/_/
[\[22a.3\]]yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen pos chos 
[\[22a.4\]]ston te/_des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing /_sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag sems 
[\[22a.5\]]can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing /_rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan 
[\[22a.6\]]gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong 
[\[22a.7\]]ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar ma yin gyis/_dgyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byon pas ma yin gyi/_thugs su byon pa dang /_ma gus 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]pas ma yin gyis/_gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing /_bzung nas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang 
[\[22b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzon to/_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten 
[\[22b.3\]]gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[22b.4\]]'das de dag la dgyes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba ma yin gyi/_dgyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byon pas ma yin gyi/_thugs su byon pa dang /_ma gus pas ma yin gyi/_gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing /_byang chub 
[\[22b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing /_bzung nas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing 
[\[22b.6\]]nam du yang chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzon to/_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs 
[\[22b.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar ma yin gyi/_dgyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byon pas ma yin gyi/_thugs su byon pa dang /_ma gus pas ma yin gyi/_gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[23a.2\]]ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing /_bzung nas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzon to/_/rab 'byor ngas 
[\[23a.3\]]'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen 
[\[23a.4\]]bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar ma yin gyi/_dgyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byon pas ma yin gyi/_thugs su 
[\[23a.5\]]byon pa dang /_ma gus pas ma yin gyi/_gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing /_bzung nas bla 
[\[23a.6\]]na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzon to/_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_byang shar gyi 
[\[23a.7\]]phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar ma yin gyi/_dgyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byon pas ma yin gyi/_thugs su byon pa dang /_ma gus pas ma yin gyi/_gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing /_byang 
[\[23b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/_chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing bzung nas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud 
[\[23b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gzon to/_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs 
[\[23b.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar ma yin gyi/_dgyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byon pas ma 
[\[23b.5\]]yin gyi/_thugs su byon pa dang /_ma gus pas ma yin gyi/_gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 
[\[23b.6\]]'dzin cing bzung nas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzon to/_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho 
[\[23b.7\]]nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar ma yin gyi/_dgyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byon pas ma yin gyi/_thugs su byon pa dang /_ma gus pas ma yin gyi/_gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen 
[\[24a.2\]]bkur byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing /_bzung nas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar 
[\[24a.3\]]du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzon to/_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sems rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[24a.4\]]dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar ma yin gyi dgyes par 'gyur 
[\[24a.5\]]ba dang /_thugs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byon bsam yin gyi/_thugs su byon pa dang /_ma gus pas ma yin gyi/_gus par shin tu dad pas bsten bkur byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos 
[\[24a.6\]]gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing /_bzung nas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzon to/_/rab 'byor gas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten 
[\[24a.7\]]la rnam par gzigs na/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/_byang chub 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar ma yin gyi/_dgyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byon pas ma yin gyi/_thugs su byon pa dang /_ma gus pas ma yin gyi/_gus par shin 
[\[24b.2\]]tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing /_bzung nas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[24b.3\]]par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzon to/_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang 
[\[24b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar ma 
[\[24b.5\]]yin gyi/_dgyes par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byon pas ma yin gyi thugs su byon pa dang /_ma gus pas ma yin gyi/_gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 
[\[24b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing /_bzung nas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzon to/_/
[\[24b.7\]]rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/_phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_
[\[25a.2\]]byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang /_de dag byams pa thob pa 
[\[25a.3\]]des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing /_rnam par langs nas lha dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang du skye ba dang /_de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[25a.4\]]dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang /_de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa chen po 'am/_theg 
[\[25a.5\]]pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[25a.6\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 
[\[25a.7\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag_/_byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]lag dang /_nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/_phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/_de dag byang chub sems 
[\[25b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang /_de dag byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing /_rnam par langs nas lha dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang du skye ba dang /_de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[25b.3\]]ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang /_de dag nyan thos 
[\[25b.4\]]kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa chen po 'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma las pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' pa mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub 
[\[25b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten 
[\[25b.6\]]la rnam par gzigs na/_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtor ba byed cing /_de la byang chub 
[\[25b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang /_nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/_phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]nas/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang /_de dag byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing rnam par langs nas lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang du skye ba dang /_de dag tu 
[\[26a.2\]]skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa 
[\[26a.3\]]dang /_de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar 
[\[26a.4\]]na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig 
[\[26a.5\]]rten la rnam par gzigs na/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing /_de la byang chub 
[\[26a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang /_nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/_phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[26a.7\]]po de dag gi sha zos nas/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang /_de dag byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing /_rnam par langs nas lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang du skye ba dang /_de dag 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]tu skyes nas kyang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang /_de dag nyan 
[\[26b.2\]]thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa chen po 'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
