[\[26b.3\]]dpa' chen po gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_byang shar gyi 
[\[26b.4\]]phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[26b.5\]]dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang /_nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/_phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/_de dag 
[\[26b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang /_de dag byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing /_rnam par langs nas lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang du skye ba dang /_de dag tu skyes nas kyang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[26b.7\]]'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang /_de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa chen po'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[27a.2\]]chen po gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na 
[\[27a.3\]]shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing /_de la byang chub sems 
[\[27a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang /_nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/_phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos 
[\[27a.5\]]nas/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang /_de dag byams pa thob pa des/_byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing /_rnam par langs nas/_lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang du skye ba dang /_de dag tu 
[\[27a.6\]]skyes nas kyang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan 
[\[27a.7\]]byed pa dang /_de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa chen po 'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 
[\[27b.2\]]'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag_/byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag 
[\[27b.3\]]yongs su gtong ba byed cing /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang /_nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/_phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang 
[\[27b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang /_de dag byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing rnam par langs 
[\[27b.5\]]nas/_lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang du skye ba dang /_de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/_
[\[27b.6\]]de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang /_de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 
[\[27b.7\]]mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/_/rab 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed da dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[28a.2\]]po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/_phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_
[\[28a.3\]]byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang /_de dag byams pa 
[\[28a.4\]]thob pa des/_byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing /_rnam par langs nas lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang du skye ba dang /_de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[28a.5\]]dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang /_de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po'am/_theg pa gsum 
[\[28a.6\]]po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 
[\[28a.7\]]bskyed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang /_nying 
[\[28b.2\]]lag bcad cing gtubs te/_phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[28b.3\]]dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang /_de dag byams pa thob pa des/_byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing /_rnam par langs nas lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang du skye ba dang /_de dag tu skyes nas kyang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[28b.4\]]'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang /_de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 
[\[28b.5\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa chen po 'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[28b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam 
[\[28b.7\]]par gzigs na/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing /_de la byang 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang /_nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/_phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[29a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang /_de dag byams pa thob pa des/_byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing /_rnam par langs nas lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang du 
[\[29a.3\]]skye ba dang /_de dag tu skyes nas kyang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/_de bzhin 
[\[29a.4\]]nyid du nan tan byed pa dang /_de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 
[\[29a.5\]]mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o//_//
[\[29a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po gsum pa/_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub 
[\[29a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa rnams kyi/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul de dag na/_sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_de dag na sems can 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_dge ba'i 
[\[29b.2\]]rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]'jig rten du skyes te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_nam yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bdag mthong 
[\[29b.3\]]ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 
[\[29b.4\]]yul pa rnams [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_de dag na sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[29b.5\]]de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas/_rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]'jig rten du skyes te 
[\[29b.6\]]phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten 
[\[29b.7\]]la rnam par gzigs na/_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa rnams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul de dag na/_sdug bsngal ji snyed cig 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_de dag na sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /_
[\[30a.2\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]'jig rten du skyes te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das 
[\[30a.3\]]pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_nam yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs 
[\[30a.4\]]na/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul ba rnams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil 
[\[30a.5\]]zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_de dag na sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas/_rnam par ldang ba dang /_
[\[30a.6\]]de dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]'jig rten du skyes te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi 
[\[30a.7\]]bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa rnams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos 
[\[30b.2\]]ston pa dang /_de dag na sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas 
[\[30b.3\]]rnam par langs nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]'jig rten du skyes te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_nam 
[\[30b.4\]]yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed da dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[30b.5\]]dpa' chen po sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa rnams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_de dag na sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems 
[\[30b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' bu chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]
[\[30b.7\]]'jig rten du skyes te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa 
[\[31a.2\]]rnams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_de dag na sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 
[\[31a.3\]]la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas/_rnam par langs nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]'jig rten du skyes te/_
[\[31a.4\]]phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_nam yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la 
[\[31a.5\]]rnam par gzigs na/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa rnams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji 
[\[31a.6\]]snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_de dag na sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[31a.7\]]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]'jig rten du skyes te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_'og gi phyogs kyi 
[\[31b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa rnams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser 
[\[31b.3\]]sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_de dag na sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas/_rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag 
[\[31b.4\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]'jig rten du skyes te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[31b.5\]]ldan 'das rnams dang /_nam yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang 
[\[31b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa rnams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing /_ser sna yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_de dag 
[\[31b.7\]]na sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /_de dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas de dag gnas rnam par 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]langs nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]'jig rten du skyes te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 
[\[32a.2\]]nam yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dag mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[32a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[32a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/_theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor 
[\[32a.5\]]de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /_de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa 'du byed thams cad ni sdug 
[\[32a.6\]]bsngal ba/_'du byed thams cad ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan pa/_'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba/_'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/_'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos 
[\[32a.7\]]ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 
[\[32b.2\]]dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de la lha'i bu 
[\[32b.3\]]gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag las/_gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /_de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/_'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa/_'du byed thams cad ni sdug 
[\[32b.4\]]bsngal ba/_'du byed thams cad ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan pa/_'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba/_'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/_'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs 
[\[32b.5\]]par gnas shes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[32b.6\]]dpa' chen po rgyal chen ba zhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[32b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/_theg pa gsum po sa rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]'gyur ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag las/_gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /_de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/_'di skad du 
[\[33a.2\]]grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/_'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/_'du byed thams cad ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan pa/_'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba/_'du byed 
[\[33a.3\]]thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/_'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_byang 
[\[33a.4\]]phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_
[\[33a.5\]]'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/_theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya 
[\[33a.6\]]ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la/_gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang de 
[\[33a.7\]]dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/_'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa/_'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/_'du byed thams cad ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]pa/_'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba/_'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/_'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas 
[\[33b.2\]]kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum 
[\[33b.3\]]cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/_theg pa gsum 
[\[33b.4\]]pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas char myos pa de dag la gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang de 
[\[33b.5\]]dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /_de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/_'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa/_'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/_'du byed thams cad ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan 
[\[33b.6\]]par/_'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba/_'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/_'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 
[\[33b.7\]]'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/_/theg pa gsum pos 
[\[34a.2\]]rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang 
[\[34a.3\]]de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /_de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/_'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa/_'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/_'du byed thams cad ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan pa/_
[\[34a.4\]]'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba/_'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/_'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig 
[\[34a.5\]]rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' 
[\[34a.6\]]ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/_theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa 
[\[34a.7\]]dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /_de dag skyo bar gyur 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]par shes nas/_'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa/_'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/_'du byed thams cad ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan pa/_'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba/_'du byed thams cad ni rnam 
[\[34b.2\]]par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/_'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[34b.3\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la 
[\[34b.4\]]chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/_theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya 
[\[34b.5\]]ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_/rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /_de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/_'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed 
[\[34b.6\]]thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa/_'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/_'du byed thams cad ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan pa/_'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba/_'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/_
[\[34b.7\]]'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la 
[\[35a.2\]]chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/_theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs 
[\[35a.3\]]su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /_de dag skyo bar gyur bar shes nas/_'di skad du grogs po 
[\[35a.4\]]dag 'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa/_'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/_'du byed thams cad ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan pa/_'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba/_'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur 
[\[35a.5\]]ba'i chos can yin na/_'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung 
[\[35a.6\]]gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston 
[\[35a.7\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/_theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /_de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/_'di skad du grogs po dag 
[\[35b.2\]]'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa/_'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/_'du byed thams cad ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'du byed thams cad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan pa/_'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba/_'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[35b.3\]]chos can yin na/_'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 
[\[35b.4\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/_kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/_chos thams cad gsog dang 
[\[35b.5\]]gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 
[\[35b.6\]]'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[35b.7\]]khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/_kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/_chos thams 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]cad gsog dang /_gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /_sems 
[\[36a.2\]]can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_nub phyogs 
[\[36a.3\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/_kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/_chos 
[\[36a.4\]]thams cad gsog dang /_gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston 
[\[36a.5\]]to/_/rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[36a.6\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/_kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/_chos thams cad gsog dang gsob 
[\[36a.7\]]sha stag la ci zhig lta bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ni ngo 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]mtshar che ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 
[\[36b.2\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/_kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/_chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha 
[\[36b.3\]]stag la ci zhig lta bskyed ces/_lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ni ngo 
[\[36b.4\]]mtshar che ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[36b.5\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/_kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/_chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha 
[\[36b.6\]]stag la ci zhig lta bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/_byang 
[\[36b.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhon pa de dag la/_kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/_chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci 
[\[37a.2\]]zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/_
[\[37a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[37a.4\]]snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/_kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/_chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag 
[\[37a.5\]]la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar 
[\[37a.6\]]che ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[37a.7\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/_kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/_chos thams 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la chos 
[\[37b.2\]]ston to/_/rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_steng 
[\[37b.3\]]gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/_kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la 
[\[37b.4\]]ci zhig lta ba skyed/_chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas 
[\[37b.5\]]shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par 
[\[37b.6\]]gzigs na/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don spyad 
[\[37b.7\]]pa dang /_don mthun pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig [(]rtan [,]rten [)]la rnam par gzigs na/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don spyad pa dang /_don mthun pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam 
[\[38a.2\]]par gzigs na/_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don 
[\[38a.3\]]spyad pa dang /_don mthun pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[38a.4\]]dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don spyad pa dang /_don mthun pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_byang shar gyi 
[\[38a.5\]]phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don spyad pa dang /_don 
[\[38a.6\]]mthun pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[38a.7\]]rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_/tshig snyan pa dang /_don spyad pa dang /_don mthun pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don spyad pa dang /_don mthun pa'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[38b.2\]]ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis 
[\[38b.3\]]sdud pa mthong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don spyad pa dang /_don mthun pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 
[\[38b.4\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don spyad pa dang /_don mthun pa'o/_/rab 'byor ngas yang 'di 
[\[38b.5\]]nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/_bzhi 
[\[38b.6\]]gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don spyad pa dang /_don mthun pa'o//_//_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bzhi pa/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[38b.7\]]dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gnyis kyis sems can rnams sdud de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zang zing sbyin pa dang /_chos sbyin pa'o/_/rab 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]'byor ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gser ram/_
[\[39a.2\]]dngul lam/_nor bu 'am/_mu tig gam/_baiDUr+ya 'am/_dung ngam/_man shel lam/_byu ru 'am/_sa le sbram mam/_zas sam/_skom mam/_gdugs sam/_gos sam/_spos sam/_'phreng ba 'am/_byug pa 'am/_mal cha 'am/_stan nam/_'tsho 
[\[39a.3\]]ba 'am/_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]dam/_skyes pa 'am/_rta 'am/_glang po 'am/_bdag po yongs su gtong na/_'di skad du kye sems can dag tshur shog/_bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra bar bslang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dgos par khyer cig/_long la dengs shig ces brjod de/_sbyin pa des sbyin pa 
[\[39a.4\]]byin nas/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong ngo /_/chos la skyabs su gtong ngo /_/dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong ngo /_/la la ni bslab pa'i gnas lnga 'dzin tu 'dzud do/_/la la ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i nye bar gnas pa la nye bar gnas par 
[\[39a.5\]]byed do/_/la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do/_/la la ni bsam gtan dang po la 'god do/_/la la ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la 'god do/_/la la ni bsam gtan gsum pa la 'god do/_/la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god 
[\[39a.6\]]do/_/la la ni byams pa la 'god do/_/la la ni snying rje la 'god do/_/la la ni dga' ba la 'god do/_la la ni btang snyoms la 'god do/_/la la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do/_/la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la 
[\[39a.7\]]'god do/_/la la ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la 'god do/_/la la ni 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la 'god do/_/la la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni chos rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]lo/_la la ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni lha rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/
[\[39b.2\]]la la ni lus la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtsang ba las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i 'du shes so sor brtag pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni rnam par dag pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni yang dag par 
[\[39b.3\]]spong ba bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni dbang po lnga la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni stobs lnga la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 
[\[39b.4\]]la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni rnam par thar 
[\[39b.5\]]pa brgyad la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la yang 
[\[39b.6\]]dag par skul lo/_/la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[39b.7\]]la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su grub par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni rang byang 
[\[40a.2\]]chub la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo/_/la la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[40a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing thabs mkhas pas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bde ba dang ldan par 'god de/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[40a.4\]]po'i ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor gnyis po 'di 
[\[40a.5\]]dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/_'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang /_bshad pa dang /_ma nor bar bstan pa ste/_'di ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtsang ba'i 
[\[40a.6\]]rnam pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang /_thun mong du 
[\[40a.7\]]gyur pa rnams te/_rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas/_rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de las 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]bskyod de de las bskyod nas/_thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do/_/de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang /_'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/_
[\[40b.2\]]'phags pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_
[\[40b.3\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams so/_/'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra 
[\[40b.4\]]bcom pa nyid de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos ni/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/_/
[\[40b.5\]]dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[40b.6\]]pa shes pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/don dam pa 
[\[40b.7\]]stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes 
[\[41a.2\]]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes pa'o/_/dbang po lnga shes pa'o/_/stobs lnga shes pa'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[41a.3\]]bdun shes pa'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes pa'o/_/bsam gtan bzhi shes pa'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi shes pa'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes pa'o/_/rnam par thar 
[\[41a.4\]]pa brgyad shes pa'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa shes pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams shes pa'o/_/
[\[41a.5\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi shes pa'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad shes pa'o/_/byams pa chen po 
[\[41a.6\]]shes pa'o/_/snying rje chen po shes pa'o/_/dga' ba chen po shes pa'o/_/btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams dang /_
[\[41a.7\]]'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o/_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[41b.2\]]ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[41b.3\]]pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa 
[\[41b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ci zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bye brag yod do/_/gsol pa/_bye brag ji lta bu zhig 
[\[41b.5\]]mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang la gnas 
[\[41b.6\]]shing /_chos thams cad mun pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thob pa la/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang gzhan la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems 
[\[41b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/_de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]pa la sbyor zhing thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[42a.2\]]chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_
[\[42a.3\]]stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mtha' 
[\[42a.4\]]dag gi skye mched bcu dang /_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang /_nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon nas mkhyen pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag pa bzhi dang /_dbang bcu dang /_de bzhin 
[\[42a.5\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_bsrung du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gsum dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_bsnyel ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /_bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang /_
[\[42a.6\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[42a.7\]]kyi sgo rnams te/_'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nang gi lus dang /_phyi'i lus dang /_phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/
[\[42b.2\]]lus la kun 'byung ba dang /_zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/lus la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas par rnam par spyod cing /_'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nang gi tshor ba dang /_phyi'i tshor ba dang /_phyi nang gi tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes 
[\[42b.3\]]su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/tshor ba la kun du 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/
[\[42b.4\]]tshor ba la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/tshor ba la kun 'byung ba dang /_zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/tshor ba la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas par rnam par spyod cing /_'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nang gi sems 
[\[42b.5\]]dang /_phyi'i sems dang /_phyi nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/sems 
[\[42b.6\]]la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/sems la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/sems la kun 'byung ba dang /_zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/sems la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas par rnam par spyod cing /_'jig rten tu 
[\[42b.7\]]gang yang nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nang gi chos dang /_phyi'i chos dang /_phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]ba de ba rnam par bstsal cing 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]rnam par spyod do/_/chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/chos la kun 'byung ba dang /_zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/chos la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[43a.2\]]gnas par rnam par spyod cing /_'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/_sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed pa dang /_skyes pa rnams spong 
[\[43a.3\]]ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang /_dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing /_shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang /_bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa skyed 
[\[43a.4\]]pa'o/_/rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/_mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 
[\[43a.5\]]'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/_/dbang po lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i 
[\[43a.6\]]dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po ste/_de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o/_/stobs lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_dran pa'i stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_
[\[43a.7\]]shes rab kyi stobs te/_de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus yang 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_shin tu byang ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste 
[\[43b.2\]]de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i dag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_
[\[43b.3\]]yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/_de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o/_/de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 
[\[43b.4\]]dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/_de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/mtshan 
[\[43b.5\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/_de ni mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi 
[\[43b.6\]]rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/_de ni smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/_gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'du shes dang ldan 
[\[43b.7\]]pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/_/
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba lnga pa'o/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba drug pa'o/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[44a.2\]{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba bdun pa'o/_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba brgyad pa ste/_de dag ni rnam par thar ba brgyad ces bya'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[44a.3\]]par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/_'di la la la 'dod pas dben sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas 
[\[44a.4\]]so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/_nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar 
[\[44a.5\]]bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing /_shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/_bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/_btang 
[\[44a.6\]]snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /_yid bde ba dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]sdug bsngal 
[\[44a.7\]]ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]kyi 'du shes yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' 
[\[44b.2\]]yas so zhes te/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ma yod do zhes [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te 
[\[44b.3\]]gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched 
[\[44b.4\]]las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/_'di ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o/_/de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/_mtha' dgas dang /_mtha' dag 
[\[44b.5\]]chu dang /_mtha' dag [{]mye [,]me [}]dang /_mtha' dag rlung dang /_mtha' dag sngon po dang /_mtha' dag ser po dang /_mtha' dag dmar po dang /_mtha' dag dkar po dang /_mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang /_mtha' dag nam mkha' ste/_de dag ni mtha' 
[\[44b.6\]]dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o/_/de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/_nang gzugs su 'du shes shing /_phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang /_kha dog sdug gu dang /_kha dog [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/_
[\[44b.7\]]zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing /_de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o/_/nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang /_kha dog sdug pa dang /_kha dog [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]mnan te shes/_zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/_/nang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du shes shing /_phyi rol gyi gzugs phra ba dang /_kha dog sdug gu dang /_kha dog [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa mthong

[\[45a.3\]]pa dang /_kha dog [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/_zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/_/nang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/
[\[45a.4\]]kha dog sngon po/_sngon por snang ba/_mdog sngon po 'di lta ste/_dper na me tog o ma ka lta bu'am/_yul bar na ser byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba/_kha dog sngo ba/_sngo bar snang ba/_mdog sngo bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis

[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]lta bu 'am/_yul bar na ser byas pa'i gos ltar dmar ba/_kha dog dmar ba dmar bar snang ba mdog dmar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/_zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil kyis
