[\[45b.3\]]ser byas pa'i gos ltar dkar ba/_kha dog dkar ba dkar bar snang ba/_mdog dkar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/_zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing /_de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad 
[\[45b.4\]]pa'o/_/de la nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang zhe na/_bsam gtan la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa/_sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi nyon mongs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i mthu yong ba ting nge 'dzin gang 
[\[45b.5\]]gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/de la smon lam gyi shes pa gang zhe na/_bsam gtan la gnas te/_'di shes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi [(]shas [,]shes [)]pa'am/_shes pa gang dang gang 
[\[45b.6\]]'dod par gyur pa [(]da [,]de [)]la yid kyis smon pa byed de/_de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas de'i smon lam de yongs su grub par gyur cig//_shes bya de yang shes pa de ni smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/_
[\[45b.7\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang /_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi mngon par shes pa dang /_lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_zag pa zad 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/_drug po de dag go/_/de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/_lus yongs su dag pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs su dag pa dang /_ye shes 
[\[46a.2\]]yongs su dag pa ste/_bzhi po de dag go_/de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/_tshe la dbang ba dang /_sems la dbang ba dang /_yo byad la dbang ba dang /_las la dbang ba dang /_skye ba la dbang ba dang /_mos pa la dbang ba dang /_smon lam la dbang ba dang /_
[\[46a.3\]]rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang /_ye shes la dbang ba dang /_chos la dbang ba ste/_bcu po de dag go_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji 
[\[46a.4\]]lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las dang /_las yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa 
[\[46a.5\]]gnas kyi rnam pa dang /_rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/khams sna tshogs can dang /_khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyis 
[\[46a.6\]]mos pa sna tshogs dang /_mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang /_tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang 
[\[46a.7\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba rnam par 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]dgong pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/_tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/_tshe rabs brgya dang /_tshe rabs stong dang /_tshe rabs brgya stong dang /_tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag 
[\[46b.2\]]stong gi bar du yang rjes su dgongs so/_/bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/_bskal pa brgya'i bar dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[46b.3\]]phrag du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs te/_bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/_/zas ni 'di za za'o/_/yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas 
[\[46b.4\]]gnas so/_/tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/_bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/_de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/_sa mal dang bcas/_gtan tshigs dang bcas par 
[\[46b.5\]]rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so/_/lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye bdag kyang gzigs so/_/kha dog sdug pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa dang /_bzang ba dang ngan pa dang /_bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang /_
[\[46b.6\]]ngan song na 'khod pa dang /_las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dong ba'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/_sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_dag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa la 
[\[46b.7\]]skur pa 'debs pa/_log par lta bdag ste/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyis 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa la skur pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'debs pa yang dag par lta ba dag ste/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to/_/zag pa rnams zad pa'i 
[\[47a.2\]]phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba dang /_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/_bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag 
[\[47a.3\]]gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/_de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so/_/zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/_
[\[47a.4\]]'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thob pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa thob par rnam par 
[\[47a.5\]]spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am lha 'am/_bdud dam tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par 
[\[47a.6\]]bskor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/_de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad bar ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_skye dgu'i 
[\[47a.7\]]tshogs gzhan su 'ang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thob pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus 
[\[47b.2\]]kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bsten pa de dag la bsten na/_bar chad kyi chos su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/zhes dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_
[\[47b.3\]]bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su 'ang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob 
[\[47b.4\]]pa dang /_bag tsha ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thob pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_
[\[47b.5\]]lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par 
[\[47b.6\]]zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/_sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ngo zhes/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos 
[\[47b.7\]]dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thob pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs par thob par rnam par spyod de/_khyu 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_
[\[48a.2\]]chos dang ldan par bskor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/_bzhi po de dag ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_don so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[48a.3\]]dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_des pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/_de dag kyang gang zhe na/_don la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_chos la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[48a.4\]]pa dang /_spobs pa la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gsum gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' 
[\[48a.5\]]bas/_la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' ste/_'di ni bsrung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang po'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[48a.6\]]gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' bas/_la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' ste/_'di ni bsrung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gnyis pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod 
[\[48a.7\]]pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' bas/_la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' ste/_'di ni bsrung ba 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa gsum pa'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/_la la rna btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang /_chos 
[\[48b.2\]]dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na/_yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_yid bde bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_thugs yeng yeng por [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o/_/la la rna btud de/_
[\[48b.3\]]rim gror nyan cing /_bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]bzod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_thugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]ches 
[\[48b.4\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o/_/la la rna btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/_chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/_la la rna btud de rim gror [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyan 
[\[48b.5\]]cing /_bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed kyang /_des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa 'am/_thugs khro ba gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan 
[\[48b.6\]]zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/_gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos 
[\[48b.7\]]ston pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' ba ste/_de ni nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' ste/_de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[49a.2\]]pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa 
[\[49a.3\]]mdzad ces bya ste/_dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po/_/sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/_de ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[49a.4\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/ca co [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/dgongs pa nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/'du shes sna tshogs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms 
[\[49a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/mos pa yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/shes rab yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/rnam par 
[\[49a.6\]]grol pa yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 
[\[49a.7\]]'gro ba ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa ste/_de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang 
[\[49b.2\]]zhe na/_gang la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dran pas dbang sgyur ba/_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/_mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe 
[\[49b.3\]]na/_phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang /_phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa dang /_phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /_bdun shin tu mtho ba dang /_sor mo ring ba dang /_rting pa yangs pa dang /_
[\[49b.4\]]sku che zhing drang ba dang /_zhabs legs par mtho ba dang /_yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang /_phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang /_gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang /_gser gyi kha dog dang /_mdog shin tu 
[\[49b.5\]]'jam pa dang /_spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang /_zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang /_seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang /_phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang /_phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang /_ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang /_shing n+ya grod ltar chu 
[\[49b.6\]]zheng gab pa dang /_dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang /_ljags shin tu yangs pa dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /_seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang /_tshems shin tu dkar ba dang /_tshems mnyam pa dang /_tshems thags bzang ba dang /_tshems mnyam zhing 
[\[49b.7\]]bzhi bcu tshang ba dang /_spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /_ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/_mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa 'di 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]lta ste/_rus pa 'am ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o/_/zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing /_zhabs zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_zhabs shin tu 
[\[50a.2\]]gnas pa'o/_/ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel pas phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa'o/_/shing bal gyi ye'u ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o/_/phyag dang zhabs dang mgur 
[\[50a.3\]]gyi lhun dang ltag pa'i phyogs na shin tu mtho bas bdun shin tu mtho ba'o/_/phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas sor mo ring ba'o/_/rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o/_/sku lag pa mdun du 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o/_/pus mo'i 
[\[50a.4\]]lha nga dang /_long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'o/_/spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas/_yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa'o/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i byin pa dang /_smyig ma dang ldum bu dar ba ltar drang zhing mnyams 
[\[50a.5\]]la rim gyis gzhol bar grub cing /_byin pa zlum pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i byin pa lta bu'o/_/brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang /_phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas/_phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o/_/glang po dang rta 
[\[50a.6\]]cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/_gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o/_/shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go/_/gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 
[\[50a.7\]]'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug la sku la rdul [{]myi [,]mi [}]'go bas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o/_/shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'o/_/me tog kun da dang zla ba 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]dang /_'o ma dang /_ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la/_nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas/_zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o/_/ro stod che bas seng ge'i ro stod do/_/mgur dang 
[\[50b.2\]]rgyud legs par 'brel cing lhun zlum pas/_phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o/_/gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o/_/rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyis ma 
[\[50b.3\]]nyams shing rnam par shes pa 'dra ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_ro bro ba'i mchog go/_/sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas shing n+ya grod ltar chu zheng gab pa'o/_/spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing 
[\[50b.4\]]legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o/_/[{]mye [,]me [}]tog ud pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog lta bur 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o/_/tshangs pa dang bya ka la ping ka 
[\[50b.5\]]lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas/_tshangs pa'i dbyangs so/_/'gram pa [{]mye [,]me [}]long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te/_yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o/_/[{]mye [,]me [}]tog kun da dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i 
[\[50b.6\]]tshems mnga' bas tshems shin du dkar ba'o/_/tshems la mtho dman [{]myed [,]med [}]pas tshems mnyam pa'o/_/tshems la mtshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang pa'o/_/bla 'og tu gye gu [{]myed [,]med [}]pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o/_/dkar 
[\[50b.7\]]nag gi cha ma 'dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar po sam yogs pas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o/_/rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o/_/de la bla ma'i bsu bskyal dang /_chos mnyan pa 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]la sdod pa dang /_gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten rjes su sgrub pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa la phu dud du byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/_de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so/_/yi dam la brtan pas 
[\[51a.2\]]zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/_de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas so/_/sbyin pa dang /_ngag snyan pa dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas pas phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa ste/_de ni myur du 'du ba'i 
[\[51a.3\]]snga ltas so/_/bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing /_'jam pa dang /_bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/_de gnyis ni bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba shin tu zhim zhing nyams su bde 
[\[51a.4\]]ba thob pa'i snga ltas so/_/bcings pa bkrol ba dang /_srog gi rim gro byas pa dang /_srog gcod pa spangs pas sor mo ring ba dang /_rting pa yangs pa dang /_sku che zhing drang ba ste/_de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so/_/dge ba'i chos yang dag 
[\[51a.5\]]par blangs pa dang /_bzung ba mngon par spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang /_yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa ste/_de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so/_/rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing 
[\[51a.6\]]gzhan byin pa dang /_bdag gis blangs pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/_de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so/_/bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs na [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gong bar gtong zhing [{]myed [,]med [}]ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang bor slebs pa ste/_
[\[51a.7\]]de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang [(]ngul [,]dul [)]ba'i snga ltas so/_/grogs po dang mdza' bshes dang gnyen ma bye ba dang /_bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams bsdums pa dang /_tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul pa dang /_gsang ba'i tshig yongs su 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]bsrungs pas/_gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/_de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so/_/stan dang /_gos dang /_khang pa dang /_gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang dang /_gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/_de gnyis ni gdan dang 
[\[51b.2\]]na bza' dang /_khang pa dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so/_/'du 'dzi spangs pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_pha ma dang phu nu la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gror byas pa dang /_btsun par 
[\[51b.3\]]byas pa dang /_bcol pa rna la ma gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang /_zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/_de ni mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snga ltas so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]snyan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]zer zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]smod la snyan par smra zhing /_legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin 
[\[51b.4\]]pas seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang /_phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/_de ni thub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snga ltas so/_/na ba rnams la rtsi dang /_rim gro dang /_sman dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang /_rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang /_ro bro ba'i 
[\[51b.5\]]mchog ste/_de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so/_/skyed mos tshal dang /_'khor dang /_btung ba dang /_rdzing bu dang /_rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang /_kha zas dang /_'phreng ba'i gnas dang /_stegs dang /_gtsug lag khang bya ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa la gzhan mos 
[\[51b.6\]]par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing /_bdag gis gzhan byin pas shing n+ya grod ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /_dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/_de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/_/yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang /_nyams su bde bar smras 
[\[51b.7\]]pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/_de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/_/gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing /_rnam par shes par 'gyur ba 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]dang /_mnyan na dga' zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang /_gtang [{]myi [,]mi [}]bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang /_ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o/_/yun ring po nas tshig kyal pa spangs shing /_dus su smra smra bas 
[\[52a.2\]]seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/_de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so/_/rim gror bya ba dang brnyas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas/_tshems shin tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/_de ni 'khor snga nas bstsags pa'i snga ltas 
[\[52a.3\]]so/_/yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshig smra smra bas tshems thags bzang ba dang /_tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/_de ni 'khor dbyer [{]myi [,]mi [}]phyed pa'i snga ltas so/_/pang gis mkhyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_ma chags 
[\[52a.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]sngang ba dang /_rmongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis lta lta bas/_spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /_ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/_de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so/_/rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so/_/de la de bzhin 
[\[52a.5\]]gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/_sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen 
[\[52a.6\]]bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/_sen mo mtho ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[52a.7\]]ni tshul la kha na ma tho ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' ba ste/_sor mo zlum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/_sor mo rgyas pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/_sor mo rim gyis 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]gzhol ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang /_gsung dang sku'i 'phrin las dang 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/_rtsa mi mngon pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grel pa ste/_rtsa la mdud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[52b.2\]]yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/_long bu mi mngon pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol bste zhabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[52b.3\]]'das rnams ni [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]seng ge ste/_seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]glang po ste/_glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/_
[\[52b.4\]]ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]khyu mchog ste/_khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/_g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/_
[\[52b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/_mdzes par bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' ba ste ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par 
[\[52b.6\]]dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/_sku shin tu legs pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu spyangs pa ste/_sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/_chos rim gyis ston pa ste/_
[\[52b.7\]]skur rim gyis gzhol ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/_sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/_sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]pa dang ldan pa ste/_sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 
[\[53a.2\]]'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/_dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/_sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la 
[\[53a.3\]]mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sku legs par mnyam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/_sku shin tu gzhon pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[53a.4\]]thugs mnga' ba ste/_skra zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i rtse ba thams cad byang ba ste/_sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/_sku 
[\[53a.5\]]shin tu mkhregs pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang /_nying lag legs par ston pa ste/_yan lag dang nying lag spa bar mdzes pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[53a.6\]]rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/_snang ba rab rib [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/_phyal zlum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 
[\[53a.7\]]'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/_phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/_phyal ma zhom pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnam 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]par zlog pa ste/_phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/_lte ba zab pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/_lte 
[\[53b.2\]]ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/_kun nas mdzes pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang ma dang ldan 
[\[53b.3\]]pa ste/_kun spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/_sku la sme ba dang gnag bag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing 
[\[53b.4\]]bal ltar yang ba rab tu thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/_phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang /_skye bo phal la byams pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/_phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/_
[\[53b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/_phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/_phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[53b.6\]]'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ring bar 'cha' ba ste/_zhal ha cang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ring ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad du bkye ba ste/_zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang 
[\[53b.7\]]ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul ba ste/_ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/_ljags shin tu srab pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyi chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dka' ba ste/_ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa 
[\[54a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' ba ste/_glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang /_nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/_snyan cing 'jam pa dang /_nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/_
[\[54a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/_tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/_tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[54a.4\]]rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/_tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/_mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par 
[\[54a.5\]]rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/_tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/_shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo 
[\[54a.6\]]gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/_shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/_spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste 
[\[54a.7\]]spyan rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bstsags pa ste/_rdzi ma stug pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang /_skyes bu dang /_na chung mchog [{]myig [,]mig [}]dkar nag 'byes shing pad 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byas pa ste/_spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/_smyin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/_sangs 
[\[54b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/_smyin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_smyin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[54b.3\]]rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/_smyin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/_snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/_sangs rgyas 
[\[54b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal pa ste/_snyan mnyam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa mnyams pa 'dul ba ste/_snyan gyi dbang po mnyams pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas 
[\[54b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/_zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyi rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/_zhal 'phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/_
[\[54b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/_dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnam par zlog pa ste/_dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[54b.7\]]'das rnams ni mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/_dbu stug pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/_dbu 'jam pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/_dbu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzings pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/_dbu [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtsub pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[55a.2\]]ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi [{]mye [,]me [}]tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/_dbu dri zhim pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang /_bkra shis dang /_dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan 
[\[55a.3\]]pa yin/_rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang /_bstan pa dang /_yang dag par 
[\[55a.4\]]bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[55a.5\]]chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po lnga pa/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas 
[\[55a.6\]]sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod 
[\[55a.7\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]rnams sdud do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do/_/rab 
[\[55b.2\]]'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do/_/de ci'i 
[\[55b.3\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[55b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do/_/de ci'i 
[\[55b.5\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do/_/rab 'byor de yang byang 
[\[55b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang /_rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems 
[\[55b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad du 'dems shing 'di skad ston to/_/rigs kyi bu khyed tshur sheg/_yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig/_yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/_yi ge gnyis nas yi ge 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig/_yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/_yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/_yi ge bzhi 
[\[56a.2\]]bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/_yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig/_yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces ston to/_/rab 'byor 
[\[56a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/_yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/_yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/_yi ge bzhi 
[\[56a.4\]]bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/_de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par byas nas/_la la goms shing yi ge [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta 
[\[56a.5\]]ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos la mkhas pa dang /_yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/_de chos la mkhas pa dang /_yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mang pos yi ge [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos ston 
[\[56a.6\]]kyang /_rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang 'bral ba yang ma yin te/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos te/_gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 
[\[56a.7\]]thun mong ma yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/_sems can yang shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_chos kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_chos kyi dngos po yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[56b.2\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin po dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 
[\[56b.3\]]la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[56b.4\]]thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_
[\[56b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston par 
[\[56b.6\]]'gyur/_de la ni sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_sems can du gdags pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas gzugs [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas tshor ba [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems 
[\[56b.7\]]can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas 'du shes [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas 'du byed [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas rnam par shes pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas [{]myig [,]mig [}]
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_rna ba [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_sna [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_lce [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis 
[\[57a.2\]]so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_lus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_yid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_gzugs [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[57a.3\]]pas/_sgra [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_dri [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_ro [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_reg [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis so/_/sems

[\[60a.1\]]ma mchis so/_/sa'i khams ma mchis so/_/chu'i khams ma mchis so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ma mchis so/_/rlung gi khams ma mchis so/_/nam mkha'i khams ma mchis so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so/_/ma

[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]bdun ma mchis so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so/_/bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ma mchis so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so/_/
[\[60b.2\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so/_/stong pa nyid ma mchis so/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma mchis so/_/smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma mchis so/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so/_/ting nge 'dzin 
[\[60b.3\]]rnams ma mchis so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ma mchis so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so/_/byams pa chen po ma mchis so/_/snying rje 
[\[60b.4\]]chen po ma mchis so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ma mchis so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[60b.5\]]ma mchis so/_/rang byang chub ma mchis so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma mchis so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma mchis so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad 
[\[60b.6\]]du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par 'gyur ba lta 
[\[60b.7\]]ga las mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa bzhin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid du rig par 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]bya'o/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/'dus ma byas 
[\[61a.2\]]stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/chos thams cad 
[\[61a.3\]]stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[61a.4\]]pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par 
[\[61a.5\]]bya'o/_/bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/srog stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/'gro ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/gso ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/skyes bu stong pa nyid du rig par 
[\[61a.6\]]bya'o/_/gang zag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/shed can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/shed bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/byed du 'jug pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/slong ba po stong pa 
[\[61a.7\]]nyid du rig par bya'o/_/kun nas slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/tshor ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/tshor bar byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/shes pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/mthong ba po stong pa nyid du 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]rig par bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/dbang po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/stobs stong pa nyid du rig par 
[\[61b.2\]]bya'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/bsam gtan stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/tshad 
[\[61b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa nyid bu rig par bya'o/_/
[\[61b.4\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/so so yang 
[\[61b.5\]]dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/byams pa chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/snying rje chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs 
[\[61b.6\]]pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rang byang chub stong 
[\[61b.7\]]pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stod pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas/_phyin ci log tu 
[\[62a.2\]]gyur ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa de ltar ston to/_/des de ltar mthong nas chos thams cad sgrib ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes te/_chos gang yang 'khrug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed 
[\[62a.3\]]do/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang ston pa byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni/_sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing /_sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/_la la tshul khrims kyi 
[\[62a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/_la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/_la la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/_la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/_la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/_la la bsam 
[\[62a.5\]]gtan bzhi la sbyor/_la la tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la sbyor/_la la gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/_la la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyor/_la la yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyor/_la la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 
[\[62a.6\]]la sbyor/_la la dbang po lnga la sbyor/_la la stobs lnga la sbyor/_la la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyor/_la la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor/_la la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sbyor/_la la rnam par thar pa brgyad la 
[\[62a.7\]]sbyor/_la la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyor/_la la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sbyor/_la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/_la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sbyor/_la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/_
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyor/_la la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la sbyor/_la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor/_la la byams pa chen po la sbyor/_la la snying rje chen po la sbyor/_la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]
[\[62b.2\]]brgyad la sbyor/_la la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/_la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor/_la la phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor/_la la dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor/_la la rang byang chub la sbyor/_la la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa 
[\[62b.3\]]nyid la sbyor/_la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sbyor na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[62b.4\]]pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la chos ston te/_de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas/_ma bcings ma grol ba'i 
[\[62b.5\]]tshul du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/_tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/_'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba/_'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/_rnam par shes pa ma 
[\[62b.6\]]bcings ma grol ba/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]ma bcings ma grol ba/_rna ba ma bcings ma grol ba/_sna ma bcings ma grol ba/_lce ma bcings ma grol ba/_lus ma bcings ma grol ba/_yid ma bcings ma grol ba/_gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/_sgra ma bcings ma 
[\[62b.7\]]grol ba/_dri ma bcings ma grol ba/_ro ma bcings ma grol ba/_reg ma bcings ma grol ba/_chos ma bcings ma grol ba/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_sna'i rnam par shes pa ma 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]bcings ma grol ba/_lce'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_
[\[63a.2\]]rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus 
[\[63a.3\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/_lus 
[\[63a.4\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/_sa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/_chu'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ma bcings ma grol ba/_rlung gi khams ma 
[\[63a.5\]]bcings ma grol ba/_nam mkha'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/_rnam par shes pa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/_ma rig pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/_rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ma 
[\[63a.6\]]bcings ma grol ba/_skye mched drug ma bcings ma grol ba/_reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/_sred pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_len pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_srid pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_skye ba ma bcings ma grol ba/_rga shi 
[\[63a.7\]]ma bcings ma grol ba/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_bsam gtan 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_phyi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[63b.2\]]ma bcings ma grol ba/_chen po stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_don dam pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_'dus byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 
[\[63b.3\]]nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_rang gi 
[\[63b.4\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma 
[\[63b.5\]]bcings ma grol ba/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/_yang dag par spong ba rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/_dbang po rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/_stobs rnams 
[\[63b.6\]]ma bcings ma grol ba/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/_bsam gtan rnams ma 
[\[63b.7\]]bcings ma grol ba/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/_rnam par thar pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]bcings ma grol ba/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma bcings ma grol ba/_mngon par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/_ting nge 'dzin rnams ma bcings ma grol 
[\[64a.2\]]ba/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma bcings ma grol ba/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ma bcings ma grol ba/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma bcings ma grol ba/_byams pa 
[\[64a.3\]]chen po ma bcings ma grol ba/_snying rje chen po ma bcings ma grol ba/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ma bcings ma grol ba/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings 
[\[64a.4\]]ma grol ba/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba/_dgra bcom pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_rang byang chub ma bcings ma grol ba/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[64a.5\]]ma bcings ma grol ba ste/_gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no/_/tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no/_/'du shes kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'du shes 
[\[64a.6\]]ma yin no/_/'du byed kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de [{]myig [,]mig [}]ma yin no/_/
[\[64a.7\]]rna ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba ma yin no/_/sna'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna ma yin no/_/lce'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce ma yin no/_/lus kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]ma yin no/_/yid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no/_/sgra'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no/_/dri'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid 
[\[64b.2\]]gang yin pa de dri ma yin no/_/ro'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ro ma yin no/_/reg gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de reg ma yin no/_/chos kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chos ma yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam 
[\[64b.3\]]par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol 
[\[64b.4\]]ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par 
[\[64b.5\]]shes pa ma yin no/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus 
[\[64b.6\]]te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 
[\[64b.7\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg 
[\[65a.2\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 
[\[65a.3\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma 
[\[65a.4\]]bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/_/sa'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sa'i khams ma yin no/_/chu'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chu'i khams ma yin no/_/
[\[65a.5\]{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ma yin no/_/rlung gi khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rlung gi khams ma yin no/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de nam mkha'i khams ma yin no/_/rnam 
[\[65a.6\]]par shes pa'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/_/ma rig pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ma rig pa ma yin no/_/'du byed kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no/_/
[\[65a.7\]]rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ma yin no/_/skye mched drug gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de skye mched 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]drug ma yin no/_/reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de reg pa ma yin no/_/tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no/_/sred pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sred pa ma yin no/_/len pa'i ma 
[\[65b.2\]]bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de len pa ma yin no/_/srid pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin no/_/skye ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de skye ba ma yin no/_/rga shi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 
[\[65b.3\]]rga shi ma yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin 
[\[65b.4\]]no/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/bsam 
[\[65b.5\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/nang stong 
[\[65b.6\]]pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma 
[\[65b.7\]]yin no/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]grol ba nyid gang yin pa de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba 
[\[66a.2\]]nyid gang yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid 
[\[66a.3\]]gang yin pa de thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa 
[\[66a.4\]]de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rang gi 
[\[66a.5\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[66a.6\]]nyid ma yin no/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[66a.7\]]ma yin no/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no/_/
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no/_/dbang po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no/_/stobs rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang 
[\[66b.2\]]yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa 
[\[66b.3\]]de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no/_/bsam gtan rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 
[\[66b.4\]]bsam gtan rnams ma yin no/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ma yin no/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[66b.5\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa bde rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang 
[\[66b.6\]]yin pa de mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan 
[\[66b.7\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin no/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no/_/
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no/_/
[\[67a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no/_/sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma yin no/_/byams pa chen po'i ma 
[\[67a.3\]]bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no/_/snying rje chen po'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[67a.4\]]ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ma yin no/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 
[\[67a.5\]]'bras bu ma yin no/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no/_/rang byang chub kyi ma bcings ma grol ba 
[\[67a.6\]]nyid gang yin pa de rang byang chub ma yin no/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin tu rnam par 
[\[67a.7\]]dag pa'o/_/tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/'du shes ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/'du byed ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rna ba ni shin tu rnam par dag 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]pa'o/_/sna ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/lce ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/lus ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/yid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sgra ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/dri ni shin tu rnam 
[\[67b.2\]]par dag pa'o/_/ro ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/reg ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/chos ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sna'i rnam 
[\[67b.3\]]par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par 
[\[67b.4\]]dag pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 
[\[67b.5\]]ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/
[\[67b.6\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sa'i khams ni shin tu rnam par 
[\[67b.7\]]dag pa'o/_/chu'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rlung gi khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/nam mkha'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]ma rig pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/'du byed ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/skye mched drug ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/reg pa ni 
[\[68a.2\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sred pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/len pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/srid pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/skye ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rga shi ni shin tu rnam 
[\[68a.3\]]par dag pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par 
[\[68a.4\]]dag pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/phyi nang stong pa 
[\[68a.5\]]nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/
[\[68a.6\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rang 
[\[68a.7\]]bzhin stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni shin tu 
[\[68b.2\]]rnam par dag pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/dbang po rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/stobs rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/'phags pa'i 
[\[68b.3\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms 
[\[68b.4\]]par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang 
[\[68b.5\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[68b.6\]]bcu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/byams pa chen po ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/snying rje chen po ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/
[\[68b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]dag pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rang byang chub ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par 
[\[69a.2\]]dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la chos ston kyang sems can du [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[69a.3\]]po ni chos thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la de [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/_gzugs stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_tshor ba stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_'du shes stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_'du byed stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[69a.4\]]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_rna ba stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_sna stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_lce stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_

[\[69a.6\]]tshul dang /_reg stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_chos stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa 
[\[69a.7\]]stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa

[\[69b.4\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_sa'i khams stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_chu'i khams stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_rlung gi khams 
[\[69b.5\]]stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_ma rig pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_'du byed stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[69b.6\]]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_skye mched drug stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_reg pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_tshor 
[\[69b.7\]]ba stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_sred pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_len pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_srid pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_skye ba stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_rga shi stong pa 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]
