[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams ni gang yang gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[71a.2\]]la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/rang bzhin la rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/gzhan gyi dngos po la gzhan gyi dngos po [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni gang la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[71a.3\]]gnas so/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid thams cad kyis rab tu 'byed de/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang 
[\[71a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_'phags pa thams cad kyi skyon du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/de ci'i

[\[71a.6\]]kyang /_sems can rnams la chos ston te/_de yang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ni 'da' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag

[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos kyi dbyings la yang 'da' ba ma mchis/_de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang 'da' ba ma mchis na ci lags/_'o na gzugs kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan

[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_sgra yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig

[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan

[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_

[\[73b\]]

[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_

[\[74a.4\]]pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_

[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]sam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan 
[\[74b.2\]]de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_chos thams cad stong pa 
[\[74b.3\]]nyid kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang 
[\[74b.4\]]dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_
[\[74b.5\]]chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig 
[\[74b.6\]]lags sam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang 
[\[74b.7\]]gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin 
[\[75a.2\]]nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang 
[\[75a.3\]]gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang 
[\[75a.4\]]gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_bsam 
[\[75a.5\]]gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_
[\[75a.6\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_
[\[75a.7\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i

[\[75b.7\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin

[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang

[\[79b.3\]]kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la/_
[\[79b.4\]]chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i 
[\[79b.5\]]mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos 
[\[79b.6\]]kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/gzugs 
[\[79b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' 
[\[80a.2\]]yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/mngon par shes 
[\[80a.3\]]pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i 
[\[80a.4\]]mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan la/_
[\[80a.5\]]chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa

[\[80a.7\]]de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/snying rje chen po yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_
[\[80b.2\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/_

[\[80b.5\]]gzhan pa ma yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la/_

[\[82a.1\]]la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang

[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan

[\[83b\]]

[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha'

[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]gzhan pa ma lags/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[84b.2\]]kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang 
[\[84b.3\]]gzhan pa ma lags/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_mngon par shes pa

[\[84b.5\]]mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan la/_chos 
[\[84b.6\]]kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma 
[\[84b.7\]]lags/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_byams pa chen po yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_snying rje chen po yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[85a.2\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/_chos kyi 
[\[85a.3\]]dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan 
[\[85a.4\]]pa ma lags/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de 
[\[85a.5\]]bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_rang byang chub kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang 
[\[85a.6\]]gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/_de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i 
[\[85a.7\]]mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags na/_'o na ji ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod cing /_nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po ni/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten/_dkar 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar po ni/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dkar nag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar nag nag ni/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong ba/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnag cing dkar ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnag 
[\[85b.2\]]cing dkar ba ni/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar 
[\[85b.3\]]rnam par dgod par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas te/_'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan gyi/_don dam pa'i bden pas ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod par bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/
[\[85b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de ni rnam par brtag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_tha snyad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]bden pa dang /_gzugs bden pa dang /_skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang 
[\[85b.5\]]ba med pa ste/_'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/_'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lags kyi/_don dam 
[\[85b.6\]]pa'i bden par ma lags na/_byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[85b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'am/_don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/_gal te shes na ni de dag kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par dgod par 'gyur na/_rab 'byor byis pa 
[\[86a.2\]]so so'i skye bo rnams la lam yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_lam rnam par dgod pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_lam bsgom pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]par byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod par lta ga las 'ong /_rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni lam yang 
[\[86a.3\]]yod/_lam bsgom pa yang yod pas na/_de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'thob pa'am/_'bras bu 'thob par bgyi 
[\[86a.4\]]ba mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'thob pa'am/_'bras bu 'thob par bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu 'thob pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_lam gyis 
[\[86a.5\]]'bras bu 'thob par bya ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lam la ma gnas par yang 'bras bu 'thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can 
[\[86a.6\]]rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa byed de/_'dus byas kyi khams sam/_'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam/_'dus ma byas 
[\[86a.7\]]kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems bsrabs pas/_lan cig 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/'og ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/gang ci yang rung ste kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can 
[\[86b.2\]]du shes pas rang byang chub bo/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon myongs pa thams cad spangs pas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs na/_bcom ldan 'das ris su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos 
[\[86b.3\]]rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis na/_gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[86b.4\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas sam/_'on te 'dus ma byas pa yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o/_/bde bar 
[\[86b.5\]]gshegs pa de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su bcad pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[86b.6\]]pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par mtshan nyid gcig tu chud par gyur na/_de'i tshe 'dus byas she 'am/_
[\[86b.7\]]'dus ma byas shes chos gang la yang ris su gcod pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid 
[\[87a.2\]]dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa 
[\[87a.3\]]nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/_sems can rnams la ris su bcad pas chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/de bdag kyang 
[\[87a.4\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam 
[\[87a.5\]]gtan dang po 'am/_bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/_bsam gtan gsum pa 'am/_bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am/_byams pa 'am/_snying rje 'am/_dga' ba 'am/_btang snyoms sam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms 
[\[87a.6\]]par 'jug pa 'am/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/_dran pa 
[\[87a.7\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/_
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong 
[\[87b.2\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag 
[\[87b.3\]]par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_thams cad shes pa nyid dam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma/_chos gang la yang mngon 
[\[87b.4\]]par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas gang la yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang /_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams 
[\[87b.5\]]su myong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung yang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la chags pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_
[\[87b.6\]]gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du tshul khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa sgom yang bzod pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_bzod pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs 
[\[87b.7\]]su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don tu bzod pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom yang brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu la chags pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]ba'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug kyang /_bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu la chags pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs

[\[88a.3\]]las bzla ba'i don du shes rab sgom mo/_/zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams sgom yang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med

[\[88a.5\]]rnams sgom yang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya 
[\[88a.6\]]ngan las bzla ba'i don du 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams sgom mo/_/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom mo/_/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'dus byas dang 'dus 
[\[88a.7\]]ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom mo/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_chos thams cad la 
[\[88b.2\]]spyod de/_chos gang la yang gnas pa 'am/_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid shin tu khong du chud do/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_mtshan dang 
[\[88b.3\]]dpe byad bzang po mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu gsum mo//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bdun pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 
[\[88b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor

[\[89b.1\]]spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ma rig pa la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du byed la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/skye mched drug la yongs su spyod pa 
[\[89b.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/reg pa la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sred pa la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/len pa la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/srid pa la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/skye ba la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rga shi 
[\[89b.3\]]la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[89b.4\]]la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su 
[\[89b.5\]]spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'dus byas 
[\[89b.6\]]stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dor ba 
[\[89b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 
[\[90a.2\]]spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dbang po rnams la yongs su spyod 
[\[90a.3\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/stobs rnams la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 
[\[90a.4\]]yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bsam gtan rnams la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[90a.5\]]la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mngon par 
[\[90a.6\]]shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs 
[\[90a.7\]]pa bzhi la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byams pa chen po la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/snying rje chen po la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]brgyad la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la 
[\[90b.2\]]yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang byang chub la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[90b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[90b.4\]]'das sprul pas lam bsgom pa la brten kyang /_kun nas nyon mongs par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_rnam par byang bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gda' na/_lam bsgom du ci mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[90b.5\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig la brten te/_kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang 
[\[90b.6\]]yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brten te/_kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/_'gro ba lnga'i 
[\[90b.7\]]'khyer pa na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no/_/gsol 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/_tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/_'du shes thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/_'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta 
[\[91a.2\]]bu lags sam/_rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/_/tshor ba thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/_/'du shes thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni sprul 
[\[91a.3\]]pa lta bu'o/_/rnam par shes pa thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/_/gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/_tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu/_'du shes thams cad sprul ba lta bu/_'du byed thams cad sprul ba 
[\[91a.4\]]lta bu/_rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la ni/_gzugs ma mchis/_tshor ba ma mchis/_'du shes ma mchis/_'du byed ma mchis/_rnam par shes pa ma 
[\[91a.5\]]mchis/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/_rnam par byang ba ma mchis/_gang las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[91a.6\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/_lha 'am 
[\[91a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]dag las yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so/_/mthong ngo rtogs so/_/sprul pa lta bur shes so/_/mthong ngo rtogs 
[\[91b.2\]]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/_rtogs la sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/_rtogs pa lags na/_gang gi don du byang 
[\[91b.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/_bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa lags/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/_mngon par 
[\[91b.4\]]shes pa lnga la spyod pa lags/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa lags/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa lags/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 
[\[91b.5\]]la spyod pa lags/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod pa lags/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyod pa lags/_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod pa lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[91b.6\]]bcu la spyod pa lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/_byams pa chen po la spyod pa lags/_snying rje chen po la spyod pa lags/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod pa 
[\[91b.7\]]lags/_de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_bcom 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[92a.2\]]par/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod de/_rab 'byor sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do/_/
[\[92a.3\]]sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/_sgra brnyan lta bu/_smyig rgyu lta bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu/_sgyu ma lta bu/_
[\[92a.4\]]sprul pa lta bu lags na/_bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams gyen du skyod par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[92a.5\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems can rnams ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas pas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_de dag [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang mtshan ma las 
[\[92a.6\]]gyen du skyod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni gang lags/_mtshan ma ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]zhes bya ba 'am/_mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur gyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]gis sgro btags 
[\[92a.7\]]pa'o/_/'di lta ste [{]mying [,]ming [}]zhes bya ba 'am/_mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/_gzugs shes bya ba 'am/_tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/_'du shes bya ba 'am/_'du byed ces bya ba 'am/_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba 'am/_skyes pa 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]zhes bya ba 'am/_khye'u zhes bya ba 'am/_bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/_sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas zhes bya ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten zhes bya ba 'am/_lha zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]zhes bya ba 'am/_'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya 
[\[92b.2\]]ba 'am/_'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/_rang 
[\[92b.3\]]byang chub ces bya ba 'am/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni sgyu ma'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]gis sgro btags pa ste/_rab 'byor [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni thams cad [{]mying [,]ming [}]gi don gyis btags pa ste/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur ba'i 
[\[92b.4\]]'dus byas thams cad ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam ste/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas [{]mying [,]ming [}]thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyis/_yongs 
[\[92b.5\]]su brtags pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig/_chos thams cad stong pa la/_mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhen par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do zhes skul bar byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[92b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa yin no/_/rab 'byor mtshan ma gang zhe na/_gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur 
[\[92b.7\]]pa'i mtshan ma ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtshan ma'o/_/rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags pa 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]'am/_phra ba 'am/_bzang ba 'am/_ngan pa 'am/_rgyang ring ba'am/_thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtog pas bzung ba ste/_'di ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[93a.2\]]pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos gang la yang rung ste/_mtshan mar bzung bas yongs su brtags shing nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o/_/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[93a.3\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/_ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o/_/'di ni mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o zhes bya ba 
[\[93a.4\]]gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ba de ltar 'god cing gzhog ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol zhing 
[\[93a.5\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag thams cad ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du bas te/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang mtshan mar bas la/_btags pa tsam du bas te/_yongs su brtags pa las byung ba lags na/_bcom ldan 
[\[93a.6\]]'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par thob la/_gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis 
[\[93a.7\]]sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te dngos po'am/_dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/_rab 'byor/_byang chub 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_khyad par thob par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_gzhan yang khyad par 'thob pa la sbyor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur gyi/_'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_dngos po yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas na/_
[\[93b.2\]]rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha 
[\[93b.3\]]rol tu phyin da pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[93b.4\]]gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[93b.5\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma 
[\[93b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi 
[\[93b.7\]]yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po 
[\[94a.2\]]stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma 
[\[94a.3\]]byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[94a.4\]]tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan 
[\[94a.5\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs 
[\[94a.6\]]par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa 
[\[94a.7\]]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams 
[\[94b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[94b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis snying 
[\[94b.4\]]rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang 
[\[94b.5\]]dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/_rab 'byor gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyi khyon cig mtshan ma yod na yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[94b.6\]]pa dran pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yid la byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos 
[\[94b.7\]]thams cad ni mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dran pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yid la byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams kyis sems 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]can thams cad kyi don byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing dran pa ma mchis te/_yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni 
[\[95a.2\]]dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_
[\[95a.3\]]'di dag ni zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so/_/'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[95a.4\]]so/_/'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/_/'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'ang 
[\[95a.5\]]gzhan la/_nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'ang gzhan la rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[95a.6\]]chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan la/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[95a.7\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/rang byang chub bo//
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/gsold pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar chos 
[\[95b.2\]]thams cad ni mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[95b.3\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin da pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin da pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid 
[\[95b.4\]]dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[95b.5\]]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[95b.6\]]dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[95b.7\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[96a.2\]]bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo/_/
[\[96a.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge 
[\[96a.4\]]ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/_/mtshan ma dang bral ba ni mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/_/mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/_rnam par 
[\[96a.5\]]thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/_skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/_khams [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la slob pa yin/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la 
[\[96a.6\]]slob pa yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la slob pa yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la slob pa yin/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la slob pa yin/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la slob pa yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]
[\[96a.7\]]pa la slob pa yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/_nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_don 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[96b.2\]]la slob pa yin/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_
[\[96b.3\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/_stobs lnga la 
[\[96b.4\]]slob pa yin/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin/_
[\[96b.5\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid 
[\[96b.6\]]dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la slob pa yin/_mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la slob pa yin/_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/_
[\[96b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/_snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la slob pa yin/_thams cad shes pa 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]nyid la slob pa yin/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[97a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin dpal spyod pa'i tshe/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]
[\[97a.3\]]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs rab tu shes te/_gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang /_gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang /_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin pa rab tu shes so/_/de la ji ltar na gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[97a.4\]]dbu ba'i phung po snying po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ltar shin tu gsong ldong dang /_shin tu gse tshags dang /_shin tu snying po [{]myed [,]med [}]par rab tu shes te/_de ltar na gzugs shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang /_'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/_gzugs ni 
[\[97a.5\]]gang nas kyang 'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_gang du yang 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_gang nas kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong gang du yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ba ste/_gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/_de ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar 
[\[97a.6\]]na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gag 'ong ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byed pa ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin te/_phyin ci log ma yin zhing /_
[\[97a.7\]]de bzhin du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na tshor ba/_shes pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing /_'gag pa ltar shes pa ste 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang /_'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/_tshor ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gang du yang 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_gang nas kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong gang du yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ba ste/_gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de 
[\[97b.2\]]gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/_de ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gag 'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]'gro ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma 
[\[97b.3\]]yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin te/_phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du shes 
[\[97b.4\]]shes pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_smig rgyu la chu shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ltar shes pa ste/_de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang /_'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/_'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[97b.5\]]cing /_gang du yang 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ba ste/_gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/_de ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[97b.6\]]shes pa yin zhe na/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gag 'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]'gro ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin te/_phyin ci log ma yin zhing /_de bzhin du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir 
[\[97b.7\]]de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_chu shing shun pa so sor phye na/_snying po shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ltar shes pa ste/_de ltar na 'du byed shes pa 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/_'du byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_gang du yang 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_gang nas kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong gang du yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ba ste/_gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa 
[\[98a.2\]]de/_gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/_de ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gag 'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]'gro ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma 
[\[98a.3\]]yin/_nam par byang ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin te/_phyin ci log ma yin zhing /_de bzhin du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa 
[\[98a.4\]]yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba ltar shes pa ste/_de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang /_'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/_rnam par shes pa ni 
[\[98a.5\]]gang nas kyang 'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_gang du yang 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_gang nas kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong /_gang du yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ba ste/_gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/_de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang /_'jig pa shes pa yin no/_/
[\[98a.6\]]ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gag 'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]'gro ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par ba byang ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin te/_phyin ci log 
[\[98a.7\]]ma yin zhing /_de bzhin du gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/_/de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/_nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong /_phyi'i chos 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/_de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams kyang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gzugs kyi khams kyang 
[\[98b.2\]]gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sgra'i khams kyang 
[\[98b.3\]]sgra'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dri'i khams kyang dri'i khams kyi rang 
[\[98b.4\]]bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lce'i khams kyang lce'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/ro'i khams kyang ro'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/
[\[98b.5\]]lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lus kyi khams kyang lus kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/reg gi khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lus kyi 
[\[98b.6\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/yid kyi rnam par shes 
[\[98b.7\]]pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/zhes bya bar shes te/_de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]pa dang /_de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_tshad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rtag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_don gcig pa ma yin pa dang /_don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_spros pa dang 
[\[99a.2\]]bral zhing zhi bar shes pa de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 
[\[99a.3\]]'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/_ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/_sdug bsngal shes pa yin/_bden pa shes pa yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/_gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden 
[\[99a.4\]]pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no/_/de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/_de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes 
[\[99a.5\]]pa yin no/_/ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/_sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin/_de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa 
[\[99a.6\]]yin te/_de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[99a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'tshal na/_des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrugs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni/_rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur te/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gal te [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na ni chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par 'khrug 
[\[99b.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang ma [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[99b.3\]]so/_/de ltar ma [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no zhes bya bar btags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos kyi dbyings 
[\[99b.4\]]la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la bslab par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos kyi 
[\[99b.5\]]dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 
[\[99b.6\]]chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/_dbyer [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin du gnas 
[\[99b.7\]]pa ste/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de ni 'di lta ste/_dge ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad de/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos kyi dbyings la slob 
[\[100a.2\]]pas/_chos thams cad la slob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pas/_ji 
[\[100a.3\]]ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar khams dang skye mched rnams dang /_
[\[100a.4\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[100a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji 
[\[100a.6\]]ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par 
[\[100a.7\]]bgyi/_ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[100b.2\]]stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi la 
[\[100b.3\]]bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[100b.4\]]brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par 
[\[100b.5\]]bgyi/_ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la bslab par bgyi/_
[\[100b.6\]]ji ltar mngon par shes pa drug la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa 
[\[100b.7\]]bzhi la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar dga' ba chen po la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar btang snyoms chen 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]po la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 
[\[101a.2\]]rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rgyal 
[\[101a.3\]]chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar mtshe ma'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar dga' ldan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_
[\[101a.4\]]ji ltar 'phrul dga'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshangs ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la 
[\[101a.5\]]bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshangs chen gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar chung snang gi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lhar skye 
[\[101a.6\]]bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar chung dge'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar dge rgyas kyi 
[\[101a.7\]]lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar chung che'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]pa'i sems can du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing /_der yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bgyi/_ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang 
[\[101b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bgyi/_ji ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bgyi/_ji ltar [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bgyi/_ji ltar 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[101b.3\]]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bgyi/_ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems bskyed pa gnyis pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems bskyed pa gsum 
[\[101b.4\]]pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems bskyed pa bzhi pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems bskyed pa lnga pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems bskyed pa drug pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems bskyed pa bdun pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar 
[\[101b.5\]]sems bskyed pa brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems bskyed pa dgu pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar nyan thos kyis la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyis la bslab 
[\[101b.6\]]par bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar byang 
[\[101b.7\]]chub kyi lam la bslabs shing /_chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi lam la bslab par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]gzugs la bslab par bgyi/_tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/_'du shes la bslab par bgyi/_'du byed la bslab par bgyi/_rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]la bslab par bgyi/_rna ba la bslab par bgyi/_sna 
[\[102a.2\]]la bslab par bgyi/_lce la bslab par bgyi/_lus la bslab par bgyi/_yid la bslab par bgyi/_gzugs la bslab par bgyi/_sgra la bslab par bgyi/_dri la bslab par bgyi/_ro la bslab par bgyi/_reg la bslab par bgyi/_
[\[102a.3\]]chos la bslab par bgyi/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/_sna'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/_lce'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/_lus kyi rnam par shes 
[\[102a.4\]]pa la bslab par bgyi/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab 
[\[102a.5\]]par bgyi/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/_sna'i 'dus 
[\[102a.6\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/_
[\[102a.7\]]sa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/_chu'i khams la bslab par bgyi/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams la bslab par bgyi/_rlung gi khams la bslab par bgyi/_nam mkha'i khams la bslab par bgyi/_rnam par shes pa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/_
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]ma rig pa la bslab par bgyi/_'du byed la bslab par bgyi/_rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la bslab par bgyi/_skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi/_reg pa la bslab par bgyi/_tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/_
[\[102b.2\]]sred pa la bslab par bgyi/_len pa la bslab par bgyi/_srid pa la bslab par bgyi/_skye ba la bslab par bgyi/_rga shi la bslab par bgyi/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab 
[\[102b.3\]]par bgyi/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/_nang 
[\[102b.4\]]stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_'dus 
[\[102b.5\]]byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_
[\[102b.6\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_ngo 
[\[102b.7\]]bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid la bslab par bgyi/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/_yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bgyi/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]par bgyi/_dbang po rnams la bslab par bgyi/_stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bgyi/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/_'phags pa'i 
[\[103a.2\]]bden pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/_bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/_mthar 
[\[103a.3\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la bslab par bgyi/_mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab 
[\[103a.4\]]par bgyi/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/_byams pa chen po la bslab 
[\[103a.5\]]par bgyi/_snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 
[\[103a.6\]]bslab par bgyi/_dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/_byang
