[\[103a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]spro ba spros par bgyid par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur lags grang //_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin da pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po brgyad pa//
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/_gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid 
[\[103b.2\]]kyang gzugs so/_/tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o/_/'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_'du shes 
[\[103b.3\]]las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so/_/'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi 
[\[103b.4\]]dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do/_/rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 
[\[103b.5\]]rnam par shes pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang [{]myig [,]mig [}]go/_/rna ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rna ba las gud na 
[\[103b.6\]]yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o/_/sna yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_sna las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi 
[\[103b.7\]]dbyings nyid kyang sna'o/_/lce yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_lce las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o/_/lus kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_lus las gud 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so/_/yid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_yid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_yid nyid kyang chos 
[\[104a.2\]]kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do/_/gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/_/sgra yang chos 
[\[104a.3\]]kyi dbyings ma lags/_sgra las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o/_/dri yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_dri las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_dri nyid kyang chos kyi 
[\[104a.4\]]dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o/_/ro yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_ro las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o/_/reg kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_reg 
[\[104a.5\]]las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go/_/chos kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_chos las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/
[\[104a.6\]]chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[104a.7\]]nyid kyang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos 
[\[104b.2\]]kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos 
[\[104b.3\]]kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/
[\[104b.4\]]chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos 
[\[104b.5\]]kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa 
[\[104b.6\]]nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid 
[\[104b.7\]]kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_lce'i 'dus te reg 
[\[105a.2\]]pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_lus kyi 'dus te 
[\[105a.3\]]reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_yid 
[\[105a.4\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 
[\[105a.5\]]las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[105a.6\]]kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 
[\[105a.7\]]rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma 
[\[105b.2\]]mchis te/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_lus kyi 
[\[105b.3\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[105b.4\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid 
[\[105b.5\]]kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/sa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_sa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams 
[\[105b.6\]]so/_/chu'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_chu'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyang chos kyi dbyings 
[\[105b.7\]]ma lags/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams so/_/rlung gi khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rlung gi khams las 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/_/nam mkha'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_nam mkha'i khams 
[\[106a.2\]]las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[106a.3\]]las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/_/ma rig pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_ma rig pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma 
[\[106a.4\]]mchis te/_ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/_/'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[106a.5\]]nyid kyang 'du byed do/_/rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs 
[\[106a.6\]]kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs so/_/skye mched drug kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_skye mched 
[\[106a.7\]]drug las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go/_/reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_reg pa nyid 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o/_/tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o/_/sred 
[\[106b.2\]]pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_sred pa las gud na yang chos kyi bya dbyings ma mchis te/_sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o/_/len pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_len pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings 
[\[106b.3\]]ma mchis te/_len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o/_/srid pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_srid pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[106b.4\]]nyid kyang srid pa'o/_/skye ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_skye ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o/_/rga shi yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rga 
[\[106b.5\]]shi las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang 
[\[106b.6\]]chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[106b.7\]]pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[107a.2\]]tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu 
[\[107a.3\]]phyin pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid 
[\[107a.4\]]kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi 
[\[107a.5\]]dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/
[\[107a.6\]]chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_phyi stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 
[\[107a.7\]]phyi stong pa nyid do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid 
[\[107b.2\]]stong pa nyid do/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_chen po stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/_/
[\[107b.3\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/_/'dus 
[\[107b.4\]]byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/_/'dus ma byas 
[\[107b.5\]]stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/_/mtha' las 
[\[107b.6\]]'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das 
[\[107b.7\]]pa stong pa nyid do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid nyid 
[\[108a.2\]]kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang 
[\[108a.3\]]chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid nyid 
[\[108a.4\]]kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa 
[\[108a.5\]]nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong 
[\[108a.6\]]pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[108a.7\]]pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[108b.2\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi 
[\[108b.3\]]dbyings ma mchis te/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang 
[\[108b.4\]]chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na 
[\[108b.5\]]yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/_/dbang po rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_dbang po rnams las gud na yang chos kyi 
[\[108b.6\]]dbyings ma mchis te/_dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/_/stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_stobs rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_stobs nyid kyang 
[\[108b.7\]]chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/_/lam yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_lam las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_lam nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi 
[\[109a.2\]]dbyings nyid kyang lam mo/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[109a.3\]]nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/_/bsam gtan rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_bsam gtan rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 
[\[109a.4\]]bsam gtan rnams so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams 
[\[109a.5\]]so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang 
[\[109a.6\]]chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis 
[\[109a.7\]]te/_rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/rnam par 
[\[109b.2\]]thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[109b.3\]]sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chos 
[\[109b.4\]]kyi dbyings ma lags/_mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chos kyi 
[\[109b.5\]]dbyings ma lags/_ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_
[\[109b.6\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma 
[\[109b.7\]]lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa 
[\[110a.2\]]rnams so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi 
[\[110a.3\]]dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/_/byams pa chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_byams pa chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos 
[\[110a.4\]]kyi dbyings nyid kyang bya mas pa chen po'o/_/snying rje chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_snying rje chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje 
[\[110a.5\]]chen po'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/
[\[110a.6\]]chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[110a.7\]]nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma 
[\[110b.2\]]mchis te/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis 
[\[110b.3\]]te/_dgra bcom pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rang byang chub las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rang byang chub nyid kyang chos 
[\[110b.4\]]kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi 
[\[110b.5\]]dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[110b.6\]]pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa bzhin no/_/gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi 
[\[110b.7\]]dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/_/tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o/_/'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so/_/'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do/_/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang [{]myig [,]mig [}]go/_/rna ba

[\[111a.7\]]rnam par shes pa'o/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]par shes pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus 
[\[111b.2\]]te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/
[\[111b.3\]]chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/
[\[111b.4\]]chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/sna'i 'dus te

[\[111b.7\]]chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so/_/chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams so/_/rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/_/

[\[112a.6\]]dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o/_/srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o/_/skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o/_/rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/
[\[112a.7\]]chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings go/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid 
[\[112b.2\]]kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/
[\[112b.3\]]chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/_/phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/_/
[\[112b.4\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/_/chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/
[\[112b.5\]]chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas 
[\[112b.6\]]stong pa nyid do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong 
[\[112b.7\]]pa nyid do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad 
[\[113a.2\]]stong pa nyid do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/_//[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings mo/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/
[\[113a.3\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[113a.4\]]nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang 
[\[113a.5\]]chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/_/dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[113a.6\]]nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/_/stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/_/'phags pa'i 
[\[113a.7\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]so/_/bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[113b.2\]]'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/_/mthar kyis gnas 
[\[113b.3\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings 
[\[113b.4\]]so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/ting nge 'dzin nyid 
[\[113b.5\]]kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/
[\[113b.6\]]chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi 
[\[113b.7\]]dbyings nyid kyang so sa yang dag par rig pa rnams so/_/byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/_/snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]po'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi 
[\[114a.2\]]dbyings nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/
[\[114a.3\]]chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub 
[\[114a.4\]]bo/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[114a.5\]]nyid do/_/rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas 
[\[114a.6\]]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings yin pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes nas/_chos thams cad 
[\[114a.7\]{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa la [{]mying [,]ming [}]gi brdas chos ston te/_'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o/_/'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o/_/'di ni 'du shes zhes bya'o/_/'di ni 'du byed ces bya'o/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]ces bya'o/_/'di ni rna 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]ba zhes bya'o/_/'di ni sna zhes bya'o/_/'di ni lce zhes bya'o/_/'di ni lus zhes bya'o/_/'di ni yid ces bya'o/_/'di ni gzugs shes bya'o/_/'di ni sgra zhes bya'o/_/'di ni dri zhes bya'o/_/'di ni ro zhes bya'o/_/'di ni reg ces bya'o/_/
[\[114b.2\]]'di ni chos zhes bya'o/_/'di ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa 
[\[114b.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni 
[\[114b.4\]]lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/_/'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/_/'di ni sna'i 'dus te 
[\[114b.5\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/_/'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/_/'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/_/'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/_/'di ni 
[\[114b.6\]]sa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/'di ni chu'i khams zhes bya'o/_/'di ni [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams zhes bya'o/_/'di ni rlung gi khams zhes bya'o/_/'di ni nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/'di 
[\[114b.7\]]ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni 'du byed ces bya'o/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs zhes bya'o/_/'di ni skye mched drug ces bya'o/_/'di ni reg pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o/_/'di ni sred 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni len pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni srid pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni skye ba zhes bya'o/_/'di ni rga shi zhes bya'o/_/'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[115a.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni phyi stong pa nyid ces 
[\[115a.3\]]bya'o/_/'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa 
[\[115a.4\]]nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni chos thams cad 
[\[115a.5\]]stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[115a.6\]]nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni dbang po rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni stobs 
[\[115a.7\]]rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni bsam gtan rnams zhes bya'o/_/
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]'di dag ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/_/'di dag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni 
[\[115b.2\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni de 
[\[115b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di ni byams pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/'di ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/_/'di dag ni sangs 
[\[115b.4\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o/_/'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni rang byang chub 
[\[115b.5\]]ces bya'o/_/'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o/_/'di ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya'o zhes ston to/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/_sgyu ma byed pa'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis 
[\[115b.6\]]rdzas kyi rnam pa gyi na zhig la brten te/_gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_glang po'i gzugs sam/_rta'i gzugs sam/_ba lang gi gzugs sam/_rnga mo dang lug gi gzugs sam/_skyes pa dang /_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs 
[\[115b.7\]]sam/_skyed mos tshal dang /_gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_kun dga'i rab mdangs dga' ba 'am/_chu klung nyams dga' ba dag gam/_rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba 'am/_nags tshal mdangs dga' bdag sprul cing /_de 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]dag tu stan dang /_'khor gyi stan dang /_gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/[ {]mye [,]me [}]tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_kha zas dang /_spyan gzigs zhim po dag bstan tam/_glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar 
[\[116a.2\]]byas sam/_sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba'am/_/tshul khrims bsrung ba'am/_bzod pa bsgrub pa 'am/_brtson 'grus brtsam pa 'am/_ting nge 'dzin kyis rnam par rtse ba 'am/_shes rab bsgom pa'am/_rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo 
[\[116a.3\]]dga' bar byas te/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/_bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/_khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/_ri rab bstan tam/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/_
[\[116a.4\]]sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bstan tam/_mtshe ma'i lha rnams bstan tam/_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/_'phrul dga'i lha rnams bstan tam/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams bstan tam/_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams bstan 
[\[116a.5\]]tam/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams bstan tam/_tshangs chen gyi lha rnams bstan tam/_snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/_chung snang gi lha rnams bstan tam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha 
[\[116a.6\]]rnams bstan tam/_kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/_dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/_chung dge'i lha rnams bstan tam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams bstan tam/_che ba'i lha rnams bstan 
[\[116a.7\]]tam/_chung che'i lha rnams bstan tam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/_'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/_shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/_gya nom snang 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams bstan tam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/_
[\[116b.2\]]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams bstan tam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas mang po bstan tam/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[116b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[116b.4\]]spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpal spyod pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod 
[\[116b.5\]]pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[116b.6\]]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos 
[\[116b.7\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]la spyod pa dang /_dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang /_stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam 
[\[117a.2\]]par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la spyod pa dang /_sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa bzhi pa 
[\[117a.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa dgu pa 
[\[117a.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa dang /_mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams rnams 
[\[117a.5\]]snang bar byed pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtang ba dang /_spyad par dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[117a.6\]]rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /_snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub 
[\[117a.7\]]pa de dag bstan tam/_sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bstan na/_de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dis legs par bslabs pa ngo mtshar che'i 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]re mdzes dag byed/_de ltar skye bo dga' bar byed cing /_gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_glang po'i gzugs dang /_rta'i gzugs dang /_ba lang gi gzugs dang /_rnga mo dang lug gi gzugs dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs 
[\[117b.2\]]ston pa dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_kun dga'i ra ba mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang /_rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang /_nags tshal mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang /_de dag tu stan 
[\[117b.3\]]dang /_'khor gyi stan dang /_gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/[ {]mye [,]me [}]tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_kha zas dang /_spyan gzigs mang po de lta bu ston pa dang /_glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byed cing /_sbyin pa yongs 
[\[117b.4\]]su gtang ba dang /_tshul khrims bsrung ba dang /_bzod pa bsgrub pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang /_shes rab bsgom pa dang /_rnam pa 'di dag gis skye bo dga' bar byed cing /_rgyal rigs che zhing 
[\[117b.5\]]mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang /_bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang /_khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang /_ri rab ston pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams ston pa dang /_mtshe ma'i 
[\[117b.6\]]lha rnams ston pa dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang /_'phrul dga'i lha rnams ston pa dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang /_tshangs pa 
[\[117b.7\]]kun 'khor gyi lha rnams ston pa dang /_tshangs chen gyi lha rnams ston pa dang /_snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /_chung snang gi lha rnams ston pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /_kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /_dge ba'i lha 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]rnams ston pa dang /_chung dge'i lha rnams ston pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /_che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /_chung che'i lha rnams ston pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha 
[\[118a.2\]]rnams ston pa dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /_shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /_gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams 
[\[118a.3\]]ston pa dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams 
[\[118a.4\]]ston pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams ston pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas mang po rnams ston cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems dang po bskyed pa 
[\[118a.5\]]nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[118a.6\]]la spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa 
[\[118a.7\]]nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 
[\[118b.2\]]spyod pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang /_
[\[118b.3\]]stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_sa dang po yongs 
[\[118b.4\]]su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[118b.5\]]byed pa dang /_sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[118b.6\]]par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa dang /_mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_sangs 
[\[118b.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ba dang /_dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /_so so 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /_byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang /_snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa de dag kyang ston cing /_
[\[119a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ston pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzin to/_/de la skyes bu mkhas shing gsal la/_yid rno ba dang ldan pa/_dpyod pa dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni 'di snyam 
[\[119a.3\]]ste/_'di la chos gang yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'di de ltar [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po 'di dag dga' bar byed pa ni/_ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so snyam ste/_sems can 'di dag ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la/_/dngos por 'du shes 
[\[119a.4\]]pa'o zhes bya bar de dag gi shes pa 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_
[\[119a.5\]]thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can du [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_sems can du gdags pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin/_gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_sbyin 
[\[119a.6\]]pa'i legs brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa gtong ba de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang tshul khrims srung ba yin/_gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul ba yin/_tshul 
[\[119a.7\]]khrims kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bzod pa sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bzod 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]pa'i legs brjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing /_mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin/_gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul ba yin/_
[\[119b.2\]]brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la yang 
[\[119b.3\]]dag par skul ba yin/_ting nge 'dzin gyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang shes rab sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang shes 
[\[119b.4\]]rab la yang dag par skul ba yin/_/shes rab kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang shes rab sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin 
[\[119b.5\]]pa yin/_gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba yin/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun 
[\[119b.6\]]pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la yang dag par skul ba yin/_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin gyi 
[\[119b.7\]]legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/_
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bslab pa'i gnas lnga'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun 
[\[120a.2\]]pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_sems can gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bsam gtan dang po'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can 
[\[120a.3\]]gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag 
[\[120a.4\]]par skul ba yin/_bsam gtan gnyis pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bsam gtan 
[\[120a.5\]]gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bsam gtan gsum pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 
[\[120a.6\]]mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang 
[\[120a.7\]]bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_byams pa'i legs pa rjod 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang snying rje la yang dag par skul ba yin/_snying rje'i legs 
[\[120b.2\]]pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_dga' 
[\[120b.3\]]ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang 
[\[120b.4\]]dag par skul ba yin/_btang snyoms kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched 
[\[120b.5\]]la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms 
[\[120b.6\]]par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/_rnam shes 
[\[120b.7\]]mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]gzhan yang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs 
[\[121a.2\]]pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[121a.3\]]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[121a.4\]]rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 
[\[121a.5\]]mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang 
[\[121a.6\]]yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod ba yin/_bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 
[\[121a.7\]]kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang dbang po rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]dbang po rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang dbang po rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang stobs rnams sgom pa yin/_/gzhan yang stobs rnams la yang dag par skul 
[\[121b.2\]]ba yin/_stobs rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang stobs rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan 
[\[121b.3\]]yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar 
[\[121b.4\]]spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_
[\[121b.5\]]sems can gzhan gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag 
[\[121b.6\]]par skul ba yin/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa yin/_
[\[121b.7\]]gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul ba yin/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[122a.2\]]dgu'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang 
[\[122a.3\]]mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/_mngon par shes pa lnga'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang mngon par shes pa lnga sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag 
[\[122a.4\]]kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang ting 
[\[122a.5\]]nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[122a.6\]]rnams kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang 
[\[122a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa de dag gi 
[\[122b.2\]]legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul pa yin/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i legs pa rjod 
[\[122b.3\]]pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang byams pa chen po sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul 
[\[122b.4\]]ba yin/_byams pa chen po'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang byams pa chen po sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang snying rje chen po sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang 
[\[122b.5\]]dag par skul ba yin/_snying rje chen po'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang snying rje chen po sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad sgom pa yin/_
[\[122b.6\]]gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]pa brgyad kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad sgom pa de dag gi legs 
[\[122b.7\]]pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_bdag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa yin/_gzhan yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag par skul ba yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi legs pa rjod pa yin/_
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]sems can gzhan gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_/bdag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu sgrub pa yin/_gzhan yang dpe byad 
[\[123a.2\]]bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul ba yin/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_sems can gzhan gang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/_rab 'byor 
[\[123a.3\]]gal te chos kyi dbyings de sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin ma yin nam/_bar du yang de bzhin ma yin du zin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can 
[\[123a.4\]]rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin bar du yang de 
[\[123a.5\]]bzhin pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston to/_/sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[123a.6\]]spyad pa spyod do/_/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i le'u ste/_
[\[123a.7\]]drug cu bzhi'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po dgu pa/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]'das de ltar gal te sems can yang shin tu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis la/_sems can du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa yang ma mchis na/_su'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa

[\[123b.3\]]'byor gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan la/_sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan yin ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'

[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur ba yang med/_rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur

[\[124a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin te/_de ltar na sems can gyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/

[\[124a.6\]]nas nye bar bzung ste/_sems can rnams sbyin pa la rab tu 'god do/_/sbyin pa la rab tu bkod nas/_sbyin pa de thog ma'i mtha' dang /_tha ma'i mtha' dang dbus stong ste/_ji ltar sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' yang stong /_tha ma'i 
[\[124a.7\]]mtha' yang stong /_dbus kyang stong pa de ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang stong /_sbyin bdag kyang stong /_/len pa yang stong par ston cing /_rigs kyi bu de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la don de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]kyis/_sbyin pa yang gzhan la/_sbyin pa'i 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]'bras bu yang gzhan no snyam du ma sems shig/_sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la/_len pa yang gzhan no/_/snyam du ma sems shig/_rigs kyi bu khyod nam sbyin pa yang gzhan la/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems/_

[\[124b.3\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su ma 'dzin cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pas stong ngo /_/de'i 'bras bu yang 'bras bus stong ngo /_/sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gis stong ngo /_/

[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]tshig kyal pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/_chags sems spongs la/_chags sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig_/gnod sems spongs la/_gnod sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig_/log par lta

[\[125a.4\]]pas log par g.yem pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem par btags pa dang /_gang gis 'dod pas log par g.yem par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/_gang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_rdzun du smra bar btags pa dang /_gang

[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]yin/_gang log par lta ba dang /_log par lta bar btags pa dang /_gang gis log par mthong ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin zhes ston cing /_tshul khrims la 'god de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs

[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]bya ba dang /_gang la gnod par bya ba'i chos de dag ni thams cad kyang /_rang bzhin gyi stong pa yin gyis rigs kyi bu gnod par byed pa ni su yod/_gnod par ni su la bya/_cis ni gnod par bya/_sems dang chos de

[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/gzhog go/_/'dul lo/_/rab tu 'god do/_/de yang 'jig rten gyi

[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_
