[\[127a.6\]]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la brtson par gyis shig/_rigs kyi bu dag stong pa nyid kyis chos de dag thams cad 
[\[127a.7\]]sgrib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par rtogs shig/_sgrib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos la zhum par 'gyur ba gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]sems can rnams la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/gzhog go/_/'dul lo rab tu 'god do/_/ci nas kyang gnyis la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa de ltar 
[\[127b.2\]]rab tu 'god do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos ni gang la yang gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[127b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus la 'dems shing rjes su ston te/_/tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa 'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_
[\[127b.4\]]bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas 
[\[127b.5\]]stong pa nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[127b.6\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[127b.7\]]rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[128a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_yang na byams pa chen po 
[\[128a.3\]]'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la brtson 'grus rtsoms la/_chos de dag gnyis par yang yid la ma byed cig/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis par yang yid la ma byed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_rang 
[\[128a.4\]]bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni gnyis par yang yid la bya ba ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis par yang yid la bya ba ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams 
[\[128a.5\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su smin par byed de/_yongs su smin par byas nas/_rim gyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god 
[\[128a.6\]]do/_/rang byang chub la 'god do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'god do/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[128a.7\]]thabs mkhas pas sems can sems g.yeng ba rnams la 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin sgoms shig/_g.yeng pa'i 'du shes sam/_ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes su ma byed cig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag ni 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni gang g.yeng ba 'am/_rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin de la gnas te/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad na/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge ba'i 
[\[128b.2\]]chos gang ci byed kyang rung ste/_sbyin pa gtong ngam/_tshul khrims srung ngam/_bzod pa sgrub bam/_brtson 'grus rtsom mam/_ting nge 'dzin skyed dam/_shes rab sgom mam/_nang stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_phyi nang stong 
[\[128b.3\]]pa nyid la spyod dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_chen po stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 
[\[128b.4\]]spyod dam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[128b.5\]]stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod dam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod 
[\[128b.6\]]dam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod dam/_dbang po rnams la spyod dam/_stobs rnams la spyod dam/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod dam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod dam/_'phags pa'i bden 
[\[128b.7\]]pa rnams la spyod dam/_bsam gtan rnams la spyod dam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod dam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod dam/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod dam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]'jug pa dgul spyod dam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod dam/_mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod dam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod dam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams 
[\[129a.2\]]la spyod dam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la spyod dam/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod dam/_byams pa chen po la spyod dam/_snying rje chen po la spyod dam/_dga' ba chen po la spyod dam/_/
[\[129a.3\]]btang snyoms chen po la spyod dam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la spyod dam/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod dam/_nyan thos kyi lam la spyod dam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[129a.4\]]lam la spyod dam/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod dam/_sangs rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod dam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod dam/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod dam/_dgra bcom 
[\[129a.5\]]pa nyid la spyod dam/_rang byang chub la spyod dam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod dam/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spyod dam/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la spyod kyang rung ste/_dge ba'i chos de dag las 
[\[129a.6\]]gron chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes 'dems shing rjes su ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed 
[\[129a.7\]]de/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas/_bar 'ga' yang las [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur gyi/_dge ba thams cad tshol zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]chad par 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]bsnyen bkur byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos pa de yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/_tshe rabs rjes 
[\[129b.2\]]kyang nam du yang rnam par chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]za ste/_rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par gzungs thob cing /_lus kyi dbang po 'am/_ngag gi dbang po 'am/_yid kyi dbang po [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam pa yin/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[129b.3\]]dpa' chen po des rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pa des lam thams cad shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur te/_nyan thos kyi lam mam/_
[\[129b.4\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lam mam/_sangs rgyas kyi lam shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur/_mngon par shes pa gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam par chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]za ba'i tshul gyis phan par 
[\[129b.5\]]'gyur ba de dag kyang shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur te/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed na/_'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'khor yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang 
[\[129b.6\]]yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam mo/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[129b.7\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing /_sems can shes rab 'chal ba can blo chung ba rnams mthong na/_'di skad 'dems shing rjes 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]su ston te/_tshur rigs kyi bu lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las gang ci byed kyang rung ste/_de thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rtogs shig dang /_khyod kyi las thams cad bdud rtsi'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/_mthar bdud 
[\[130a.2\]]rtsir 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni gang 'jig par 'gyur ba'am/_yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yongs su nyam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_rang bzhin 
[\[130a.3\]]stong pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa'i chos kyang gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni dngos po yod pa yang ma yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang ma yin/_chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[130a.4\]]la ci zhig yongs su nyam par 'gyur zhes/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la 'dems shing rjes su ston par byed de rang 
[\[130a.5\]]bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la 'dzud par byed do/_/de ltar 'dems shing rjes su ston pa dang /_rang bzhin kyis stong pa nyid la 'dzud pa'i tshe/_nam du yang rjes su ma bsgrubs pa ma yin/_de ni bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing 
[\[130a.6\]]gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang 
[\[130a.7\]]yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag 
[\[130b.2\]]kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang 
[\[130b.3\]]dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par byams pa la gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par byams pa sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par snying rje la gnas pa yin/_gzhan 
[\[130b.4\]]yang rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par snying rje sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par dga' ba la gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par dga' ba sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang rtag 
[\[130b.5\]]tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par btang snyoms sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_
[\[130b.6\]]gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul pa yin/_bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi 
[\[130b.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]bdag kyang 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/_gzhan yang 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug 
[\[131a.2\]]pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu 
[\[131a.3\]{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu 
[\[131a.4\]{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang brtson 'grus kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag 
[\[131a.5\]]kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha 
[\[131a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang nang stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang phyi stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba 
[\[131a.7\]]yin/_bdag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]bdag kyang chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang chen po stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang don dam ba stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang 
[\[131b.2\]]'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag 
[\[131b.3\]]kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[131b.4\]]la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid 
[\[131b.5\]]la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang rang gi mtshan 
[\[131b.6\]]nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan 
[\[131b.7\]]yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/_gzhan 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag 
[\[132a.2\]]kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin 
[\[132a.3\]]bdag kyang dbang po rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang stobs rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang stobs rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[132a.4\]]la sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/_
[\[132a.5\]]bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa yin/_gzhan yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yang dag 
[\[132a.6\]]par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang mthar 
[\[132a.7\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang mngon par shes pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]pa yin/_gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[132b.2\]]stobs bcu la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag 
[\[132b.3\]]kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/_
[\[132b.4\]]bdag kyang snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la 
[\[132b.5\]]yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la slob pa yin/_gzhan yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la slob pa yin/_gzhan 
[\[132b.6\]]yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul ba yin/_bdag kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin/_bdag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[132b.7\]]ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin/_bdag kyang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]'bras bu la 'god pa yin/_bdag kyang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing /_de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god pa yin/_bdag kyang rang byang chub kyi shes pa skyed cing de la yang 
[\[133a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa yin/_gzhan yang rang byang chub la 'god pa yin/_bdag kyang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam skyed pa yin/_gzhan yang lam de la 'dems shing rjes su ston pa dang /_gzhog cing 'dul ba dang 'god 
[\[133a.3\]]pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi don 
[\[133a.4\]]byed pa'i tshe/_nam yang las [{]myed [,]med [}]par gnas pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni sems can yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_chos kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[133a.5\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_chos ma lags pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du yang dag par 'jug pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[133a.6\]]'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa bzhin no/_/chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos ma yin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[133a.7\]]so/_/rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_chos rnams rang bzhin gyis stong par [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston to/_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/tsho rab ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'du shes ni 
[\[133b.2\]]rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor [{]myig [,]mig [}]ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rna ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sna ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lce ni rang bzhin 
[\[133b.3\]]gyis stong ngo /_/lus ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sgra ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dri ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/ro ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/reg ni rang 
[\[133b.4\]]bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/chos ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sna'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lce'i rnam par 
[\[133b.5\]]shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 
[\[133b.6\]]ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/
[\[133b.7\]]rab 'byor [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lce'i 'dus te 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor 
[\[134a.2\]]sa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/chu'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rlung gi khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/nam mkha'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam par shes 
[\[134a.3\]]pa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor ma rig pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/skye mched 
[\[134a.4\]]drug ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sred pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/len pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/srid pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/skye ba ni rang bzhin 
[\[134a.5\]]gyis stong ngo /_/rga shi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/brtson 
[\[134a.6\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/phyi stong pa 
[\[134a.7\]]nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/chen po stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'dus byas stong 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni rang 
[\[134b.2\]]bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis 
[\[134b.3\]]stong ngo /_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin 
[\[134b.4\]]gyis stong ngo /_/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dbang po rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[134b.5\]]rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/bsam gtan rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni 
[\[134b.6\]]rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam par thar pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 
[\[134b.7\]]stong ngo /_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/
[\[135a.2\]]byams pa chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/snying rje chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dga' ba chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/btang snyoms chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni rang bzhin 
[\[135a.3\]]gyis stong ngo /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin 
[\[135a.4\]]gyis stong ngo /_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rang byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[135a.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston da to/_/skye mched bcu gnyis ni rang bzhin 
[\[135a.6\]]gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/khams [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 
[\[135a.7\]]stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/stong pa nyid thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/dbang po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/stobs lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/byang 
[\[135b.2\]]chub kyi yan lag bdun ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/bsam 
[\[135b.3\]]gtan bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rnam par 
[\[135b.4\]]thar pa brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos [{]stond [,]ston [}]to/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang 
[\[135b.5\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/mngon par shes pa lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[135b.6\]]thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/so so 
[\[135b.7\]]yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/byams pa chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/snying rje chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/dga' ba chen po ni rang bzhin 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/btang snyoms chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]chen 
[\[136a.2\]]po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/lan 
[\[136a.3\]]cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rang byang chub ni rang 
[\[136a.4\]]bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/bag chags kyi mtshams 
[\[136a.5\]]sbyor ba thams cad spong ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rab 'byor gal te nang stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong 
[\[136a.6\]]ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te phyi stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur 
[\[136a.7\]]ro/_/gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te stong pa nyid stong 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te chen po stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma 
[\[136b.2\]]yin na ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub 
[\[136b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang 
[\[136b.4\]]chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes 
[\[136b.5\]]bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal 
[\[136b.6\]]te thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bas bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis 
[\[136b.7\]]stong pa ma yin ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams 
[\[137a.2\]]cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur 
[\[137a.3\]]ro/_/gal te [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rang 
[\[137a.4\]]bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[137a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gal te dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos 
[\[137a.6\]]thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bshig par 'gyur na/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'jig par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur rtag pa ma yin te/_phyis [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gro ba yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i 
[\[137a.7\]]phyir zhe na/_de ni yul na [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas/_phyogs na [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa ste/_de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba yang ma yin/_gang du 'gro ba yang ma yin te/_de ni chos gnas pa nyid do/_/de la ni chos gang yang 'phel bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'am/_'grib pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]'am/_'gong ba [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'am/_skye ba [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 'am/_'byung ba [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'am/_'gag pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 'am/_rnam par byang ba [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin te_/

[\[140b.1\]]rnams kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'phags pa'i bden par gdags pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_bsam gtan rnams kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_bsam gtan du gdags pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]par gdags pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad du gdags pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gdags pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_

[\[145b.1\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang byang chub [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzhan du na/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa las lam gyi don du/_

[\[145b.4\]]pa shes pa nyid la spyod do/_/de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi lam dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang /_lam thams cad la spyod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems

[\[145b.7\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul te/_'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]'das gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig/_

[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]nyid kyang gzhan no/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/sa'i khams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/chu'i khams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin

[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/phyi stong 
[\[147b.2\]]pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[147b.3\]]gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 
[\[147b.4\]]kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/dor ba 
[\[147b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang gi 
[\[147b.6\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[147b.7\]]gzhan no/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan no/_/
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/
[\[148a.2\]]dbang po rnams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/stobs rnams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/'phags 
[\[148a.3\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid 
[\[148a.4\]]kyang gzhan no/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan no/_/rang 
[\[148a.5\]]bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan no/_/rang

[\[148a.7\]]stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/byams pa chen po yang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/snying rje chen po yang gzhan no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]

[\[148b.6\]]pa nyid kyang 'du shes so/_/'du byed nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/_/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]nyid kyang rang

[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'o/_/lus nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus so/_/yid nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid do/_/gzugs nyid kyang rang

[\[149a.7\]]'dus te reg pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/yid kyi

[\[149b.3\]]tshor ba'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/
[\[149b.4\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te 
[\[149b.5\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid

[\[149b.7\]{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams so/_/rlung gi khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/_/nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/_/ma rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/

[\[150a.3\]]dang gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs so/_/skye mched drug nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/_/reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa 
[\[150a.4\]]nyid kyang reg pa'o/_/tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/_/sred pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o/_/len pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong 
[\[150a.5\]]pa nyid kyang len pa'o/_/srid pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o/_/skye ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o/_/rga shi nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin

[\[150a.7\]]kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]bzhin stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang 
[\[150b.2\]]bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang 
[\[150b.3\]]bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa 
[\[150b.4\]]nyid stong pa nyid do/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/_/'dus 
[\[150b.5\]]byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 
[\[150b.6\]]nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/dor 
[\[150b.7\]]ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[151a.2\]]pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[151a.3\]]kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[151a.4\]]nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[151a.5\]]rkang pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/_/dbang po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/_/stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid 
[\[151a.6\]]do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rang bzhin 
[\[151a.7\]]stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/_/bsam gtan nyid kyang rang 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong 
[\[151b.2\]]pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[151b.3\]]'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa 
[\[151b.4\]]nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/
[\[151b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[151b.6\]]stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams so/_/so so 
[\[151b.7\]]yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/_/byams pa chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/_/snying rje chen 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/
[\[152a.2\]]rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[152a.3\]]ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/
[\[152a.4\]]rang byang chub nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[152a.5\]]nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/zhes bgyi bar spyod pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa bzhin 
[\[152a.6\]]te/_/rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_tshor ba yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_'du shes kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_'du byed kyang gzhan la/_rang 
[\[152a.7\]]bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rna ba yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_sna yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]pa nyid kyang gzhan/_lce yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_lus kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_yid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_gzugs kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[152b.2\]]gzhan/_sgra yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_dri yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_ro yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_reg kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_chos kyang 
[\[152b.3\]]gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_
[\[152b.4\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_rang 
[\[152b.5\]]bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin 
[\[152b.6\]]stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa 
[\[152b.7\]]nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/_
[\[153a.2\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_sa'i khams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_chu'i khams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin 
[\[153a.3\]]stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rlung gi khams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rnam 
[\[153a.4\]]par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_ma rig pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_'du byed kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_rang 
[\[153a.5\]]bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_skye mched drug kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_reg pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_tshor ba 
[\[153a.6\]]yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_sred pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_len pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_srid pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_skye 
[\[153a.7\]]ba yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rga shi yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu 
[\[153b.2\]]phyin pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_phyi stong pa nyid 
[\[153b.3\]]kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin 
[\[153b.4\]]stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa 
[\[153b.5\]]nyid kyang gzhan/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin 
[\[153b.6\]]stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin 
[\[153b.7\]]stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]kyang gzhan/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag par spong ba rnams 
[\[154a.2\]]kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong 
[\[154a.3\]]pa nyid kyang gzhan/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_
[\[154a.4\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan 
[\[154a.5\]]la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[154a.6\]]sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa 
[\[154a.7\]]nyid kyang gzhan/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]pa nyid kyang gzhan/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_byams pa chen po yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_snying rje chen po yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[154b.2\]]gzhan/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/_
[\[154b.3\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rang byang chub kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[154b.4\]]gzhan/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan te/_gal te gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_
[\[154b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[154b.6\]]dpa' chen po gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin ni/_byang chub 
[\[154b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshor ba rang 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub 
[\[155a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[155a.3\]]po 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[155a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[155a.5\]]'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[155a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[155a.7\]]po rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te [{]myig [,]mig [}]rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir [{]myig [,]mig [}]rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [{]myig [,]mig [}]rang 
[\[155b.2\]]bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te rna ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[155b.3\]]chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir rna ba rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba rang bzhin gyis stong ngo 
[\[155b.4\]]zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te sna rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na 
[\[155b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir sna rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du 
[\[155b.6\]]chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te lce rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[155b.7\]]tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir lce rang bzhin gyis stong bas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lce rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te lus rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_
[\[156a.2\]]rab 'byor gang gi phyir lus rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[156a.3\]]par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te yid rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_/rab 'byor gang gi phyir yid 
[\[156a.4\]]rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te gzugs 
[\[156a.5\]]rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub 
[\[156a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te sgra rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang 
[\[156a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir sgra rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rang bzhin 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te dri rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang 
[\[156b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir dri rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du 
[\[156b.3\]]chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te ro rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[156b.4\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir ro rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[156b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te reg rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[156b.6\]]'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir reg rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po reg rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[156b.7\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te chos rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]gang gi phyir chos rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[157a.2\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[157a.3\]]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[157a.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[157a.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya 
[\[157a.6\]]bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[157a.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna'i rnam par shes pa rang 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[157b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[157b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po lce'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa 
[\[157b.4\]]zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong bas na/_de'i 
[\[157b.5\]]phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te yid 
[\[157b.6\]]kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir yid kyi rnam par 
[\[157b.7\]]shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[158a.2\]]rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par 
[\[158a.3\]]byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[158a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin 
[\[158a.5\]]gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[158a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong bas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[158a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po sna'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong bas na/_de'i phyir byang chub 
[\[158b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rang 
[\[158b.3\]]bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis
