[\[232b.4\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la rab tu 'god do/_/mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la rab tu 'god do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rab tu 'god do/_/yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug par 
[\[232b.5\]]byed do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rang byang chub thob par byed do/_/
[\[232b.6\]]bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul lo/_/kye skyes bu dag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]dka' ste/_phyin ci log gis rmongs pa'i sems 
[\[232b.7\]]can rnams kyis khong du [{]myi [,]mi [}]chud pa ma gtogs par chos gang la sems can rnams chags par gyur pa'i chos de lta bu gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]kyis/_phyin ci log gi 'dzin pa thams cad rgyun chod la/_'khor ba las 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]bdag cag kyang thar par gyis shig_/gzhan yang thar par gyis shig_/de ltar khyed bdag cag kyang don chen po gyis shig_/gzhan yang don chen po la sbyor cig ces yang dag par skul pa byed de/_rab 'byor de 
[\[233a.2\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/_de ltar spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_nam yang ngan song du [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ba dang /_nam yang 
[\[233a.3\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa bon ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu 'byung ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i drung du slongs mo pa gang ji snyed cig 'ongs kyang 'khor los sgyur 
[\[233a.4\]]ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par/_gzhan gyi don du 'khor los sgyur ba yongs su ma bzung ngo /_zhes de 'di skad ces zer te/_su ci 'dod pa de khyed byin gyis 'di ni nga'i ma yin 
[\[233a.5\]]gyi khyed kyi'o/_/nga ni nang gi gzugs la yang don du gnyer ba [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_gzhan lta ci smos te/_gzhan du na ngas sems can rnams kyi don du 'khor ba yongs su bzung gi/_bdag ni 'khor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin no zhes te/_de snying brtse 
[\[233a.6\]]bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_snying rje chen pos sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang sems can gang yongs su grub pa de lta bu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_gzhan du na 'du shes dang [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang /_tha snyad kyis rnam par spyod de/_
[\[233a.7\]]rnam par spyod pa de yang sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par spyad du [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/_spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang bdag gi sha yan 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]chad kyang sems can rnams la yongs su ma btang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya na/_phyi rol gyi yo byad gang gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya ba dag lta smos su yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ltar spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_yo byad de 
[\[233b.2\]]dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[233b.3\]]ni yo byad do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[233b.4\]]ni yo byad do/_/chen po stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/thog ma 
[\[233b.5\]]dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[233b.6\]]stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/yang dag par spong pa 
[\[233b.7\]]rnams ni yo byad do/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/dbang po rnams ni yo byad do/_/stobs rnams ni yo byad do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yo byed do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yo byad do/_/
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/bsam gtan rnams ni yo byad do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yo byed do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams ni yo 
[\[234a.2\]]byad do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa ni yo byad do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni yo 
[\[234a.3\]]byad do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yo byad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yo byad do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/snying rje chen po ni yo byad do/_/sangs 
[\[234a.4\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni yo byad do/_/de dag ni yo byad de/_yo byad de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su bsdus shing rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po 'am/_theg pa 
[\[234a.5\]]gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/
[\[234a.6\]]rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[234a.7\]]chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_de sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe 'di skad ces rjod do/_/rigs kyi bu dag tshur [(]sheg[,]shog[) ]/tshul khrims srungs shig_/ngas khyed zas dang /_
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_
[\[234b.2\]]byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_mi'i rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya'o/_/khyed kyang phongs pas tshul khrims ngan pa la spyod gang na khyed yo byad thams cad dang rin po che sna bdun gyi bar gyis 
[\[234b.3\]]phongs pa med par byas/_des khyed sdom pa'i tshul khrims la gnos la/_rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis sdug bsngal 
[\[234b.4\]]gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig ces nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung ngo /_/gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul lo/_/tshul khrims kyi legs pa rjod do/_/sems 
[\[234b.5\]]can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar tshul khrims la sbyar cing /_tshul khrims la rab tu 
[\[234b.6\]]bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems 
[\[234b.7\]]can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can gang khro ba dang /_gnod sems su byed pa dag mthong na/_de dag la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed ci'i 
[\[235a.2\]]rgyus gnod sems su byed par gyur/_khyed gang gis phongs shing gnod sems su byed par gyur pa de dang de nga las long shig_/ngas khyed zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_
[\[235a.3\]]spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_mi'i rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i 
[\[235a.4\]]bar gyis phongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas/_khro ba dang /_gnod sems med par gyis shig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag bzod pa la sbyor te/_'di 
[\[235a.5\]]skad du gcugs gang gis khyed kyi khro ba skye bar gyur pa de ni snying po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de la dngos po gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/khro ba de ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa ste/_dngos po gang gi phyir khyed 'thab cing mkhon pa dang /_gnod 
[\[235a.6\]]sems su byed par gyur pa dang /_de ltar 'thabs shing mkhon te/_gnod sems su gyur nas/_dbyig pas 'gyed pa dang /_mtshon gyis 'dre ba dang /_phan tshun gyi srog la rgol bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la/_dngos po'i rang bzhin 
[\[235a.7\]]gang yang med na/_de lta yin yang khyed yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas 'khrugs na/_sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_byol song gi skye gnas dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]'gyur/_de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag du yang khyed sdug bsngal [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzad pa dang /_tsha zhing rtsub la yid tu mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyis/_skyes bu khyed rnams dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams kyi don du las gang 
[\[235b.2\]]yongs su bzung bas myir skye ba yang 'thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur na/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'phrad par 'gyur ba lta smos su yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de lta bu'i lus yongs su ma 'dzin cig_/grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon no/_/myir skye 
[\[235b.3\]]ba 'thob pa ni dkon no/_/dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni dkon no/_/'khor ba las thar ba ni dkon no/_/de lta yin gyis dal ba 'di don [{]myed [,]med [}]par ma bya shig_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]khom par gyur cing gsor [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung bar gyur ta re zhes de la byang chub sems 
[\[235b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang bzod pa sgrub bo/_/gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/bzod pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing /_mthun pas 
[\[235b.5\]]dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar bzod pa la sbyar cing /_bzod pa la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na 
[\[235b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[235b.7\]]po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can le lo can/_brtson 'grus chung ba dag 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]mthong na 'di skad du khyed ci'i phyir le lo byed ces rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can de dag 
[\[236a.2\]]la 'di skad ces zer te/_kye skyes bu dag ngas sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/_tshul khrims kyi rkyen tam/_bzod pa'i rkyen tam/_gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang gis/_brtson 'grus brtsam du rung ba de dag khyed la ngas nye bar bsgrub par byas/_
[\[236a.3\]]brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas/_sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing lus sam/_sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad 
[\[236a.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams sgom mo/_/de dag bsgoms pas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong 
[\[236a.5\]]ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob bo/_/rang byang chub 'thob/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid 
[\[236a.6\]]kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo/_/brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/
[\[236a.7\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyar cing /_brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[236b.2\]]phyin pa la spyod cing /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems 
[\[236b.3\]]can khyed ci'i phyir bsam gtan la mnyam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzhog ces rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad 
[\[236b.4\]]du 'dems te/_kye sems can dag ngas rkyen gang dang gang gis phyi nang gi chos la rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang 
[\[236b.5\]]nye bar bsgrubs pas/_rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar sgrub ste/_de'i phyir de dag rnam par rtog pa chad nas/_bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam 
[\[236b.6\]]gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go_/dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug go_/btang snyoms la snyoms par 
[\[236b.7\]]'jug go_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]mched la snyoms par 'jug go_/de dag bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis/_sems dul bar gyur pas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/_yang 
[\[237a.2\]]dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/_/dbang po lnga sgom mo/_/stobs lnga sgom mo/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[237a.3\]]gsum sgom mo/_/de dag bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/_de la la la ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam ste/_rab 'byor de 
[\[237a.4\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas/_sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[237a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[237a.6\]]la gnas shing /_shes rab 'chal par gyur ba'i sems can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab [{]myi [,]mi [}]sgom zhes rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[237a.7\]]dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/_nga las yo byad rnams long la/_sbyin pa byin cig_/tshul khrims srungs shig_/bzod pa sgoms shig_/brtson 'grus 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]rtsoms shig/_ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhogs shig_/rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyis la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_'gro ba'am/_gso ba 'am/_
[\[237b.2\]]skyes bu 'am/_gang zag gam/_shed can nam/_shed bdag gam/_byed pa po'am/_tshor ba po 'am/_shes pa po 'am/_mthong ba po 'am/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/_
[\[237b.3\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gam/_rna ba 'am/_sna 'am/_lce 'am/_lus sam/_yid dam/_gzugs sam/_sgra 'am/_dri 'am/_ro 'am/_reg gam/_chos sam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa 'am/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/_sna'i rnam par shes 
[\[237b.4\]]pa 'am/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'am/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_
[\[237b.5\]]lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg 
[\[237b.6\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_sa'i khams sam/_chu'i khams sam/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams sam/_rlung gi khams sam/_nam mkha'i 
[\[237b.7\]]khams sam/_rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/_ma rig pa 'am/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs sam/_skye mched drug gam/_reg pa 'am/_tshor ba 'am/_sred pa 'am/_len pa 'am/_
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]srid pa 'am/_skye ba 'am/_rga shi 'am/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi 
[\[238a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas 
[\[238a.3\]]stong pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/_
[\[238a.4\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang 
[\[238a.5\]]dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[238a.6\]]rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par 
[\[238a.7\]]thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[238b.2\]]bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/_chos gang yang yod dam/_yongs su rtogs shig ces 'dems shing rjes su [{]stond [,]ston [}]te/_des byang chub sems 
[\[238b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de la mngon par zhen pa med pas/_chos gang yang skye ba 
[\[238b.4\]]'am/_'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang ba yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_'di ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o/_/'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/_/'di ni 
[\[238b.5\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni lha ma yin gyi ris su gtogs pa'o/_/'di ni lha'o/_/'di ni myi'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims ngan pa can no/_/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan 
[\[238b.6\]]cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar 
[\[238b.7\]]rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[239a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can rnams la 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su ston to/_/sems can khyed ci'i phyir sbyin pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong zhes rdzod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan 
[\[239a.3\]]pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di skad ces zer te/_nga las yo byad rnams long la sbyin pa byin cig_/sbyin pa de la yang 'dzin pas ma 'dzin cig_/sbyin pa de la 'dzin pas 
[\[239a.4\]]'dzin 'dzin cing /_lus gang mngon par grub pas/_sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus mngon par grub pa re/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di la don dam par na sbyin pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[239a.5\]]yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sbyin pa'i bdag po yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_len pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_chos de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni gzung du med pa'o zhes 
[\[239a.6\]]'dems shing rjes su ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang /_de la sbyin par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[239a.7\]]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sbyin pa'i bdag por [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_len par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de chos gsum po de dag thams cad la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]pas/_sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor ro/_/rang byang chub la sbyor ro/_/bla na med pa 
[\[239b.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sbyor ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par 
[\[239b.3\]]byed de/_de bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/sbyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun 
[\[239b.4\]]pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang de lta bu'i sbyin pa chen po byin pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal 
[\[239b.5\]]ba mnyam par skye'o/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/khams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob bo/_/de de dag na yang sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po 
[\[239b.6\]]bzhis yongs su sdud de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don bya ba dang /_don mthun pas yongs su sdud do/_/de de ltar sems can sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa de dag kyang rim gyis tshul khrims la rab tu 'god 
[\[239b.7\]]do/_/bzod pa la rab tu 'god do/_/brtson 'grus la rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do/_/shes rab la rab tu 'god do/_/bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]'jug pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/dbang po lnga la rab tu 'god do/_/
[\[240a.2\]]stobs lnga la rab tu 'god do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rab tu 'god do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rab tu 'god do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad la rab tu 'god do/_/
[\[240a.3\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rab tu 'god do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa med pa la rab tu 'god do/_/mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin 
[\[240a.4\]]rnams la rab tu 'god do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rab tu 'god do/_/yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug par byed do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/_/
[\[240a.5\]]phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rang byang chub thob par byed do/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul bar byed do/_/kye skyes bu dag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang 
[\[240a.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]dka' ste/_de la phyin ci log gis rmongs pa'i sems kyis khong du ma chud pa ma gtogs par chos gang la sems can rnams chags par gyur pa'i chos de lta bu 
[\[240a.7\]]gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]kyis/_de bas na phyin ci log gi 'dzin pa thams cad rgyun chod la 'khor ba las bdag kyang thar bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang thar bar gyis shig_/de ltar na khyed bdag cag gi don du yang cher 'gyur/_
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]gzhan yang don chen po la 'byor bar 'gyur ro zhes yang dag par skul ba byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/_de ltar spyod pa'i tshe/_ci nas kyang sems dang po 
[\[240b.2\]]bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_nam yang ngan song du [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ba dang /_nam yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa bon ji lta bu bzhin du 'bras bu 'byung ste/_'khor los sgyur 
[\[240b.3\]]ba'i rgyal po de'i drung du slongs mo pa gang ji snyed cig 'ongs kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par gzhan gyi don du 'khor los sgyur ba yongs su ma bzung ngo zhes 
[\[240b.4\]]nas/_de 'di skad ces zer te/_su ci 'dod pa de khyed byin gyis 'di ni nga'i ma yin gyi khyed kyi'o/_/nga ni nang gi gzugs la yang don du gnyer ba [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_gzhan lta ci smos te/_gzhan du na ngas sems can rnams kyi don du 'khor ba yongs 
[\[240b.5\]]su bzung gi/_bdag ni 'khor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin no zhes te/_de snying brtse bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_snying rje chen pos sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang /_sems can gang yongs su grub pa de lta bu [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[240b.6\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_gzhan du na 'du shes dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda'i tha snyad kyis rnam par spyod de/_rnam par spyod pa de yang sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par spyad du [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin 
[\[240b.7\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/_spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang bdag gi sha yan chad kyang sems can rnams la yongs su ma gtang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya na/_phyi rol gyi yo byad gang gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]bar bya ba dag lta smos su yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ltar spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_yo byad de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni

[\[241a.3\]]stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/chen po stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni

[\[241a.5\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dran pa nye bar 
[\[241a.6\]]gzhag pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yo byad do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/dbang po rnams ni yo byad do/_/stobs rnams ni yo byad do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yo byed do/_/'phags

[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]thar pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni yo byad do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/ting nge

[\[241b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/de dag ni yo byad de yo byad de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su bsdus shing /_rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa chen po 'am/_theg pa gsum 
[\[241b.4\]]po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 
[\[241b.5\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[241b.6\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la 'di skad du kye sems can dag ci'i phyir khyed tshul khrims [{]myi [,]mi [}]srung zhes 'dems shing rjes su ston par byed de/_de dag 'di skad du rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer

[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]
[\[242a.2\]]rkyen dang /_yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya'o/_/khyed gang gis phongs pa'i phyir tshul khrims ngan pa la spyod par gyur pa'i yo byad dang /_longs spyod pa thams cad kyis phongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas/_khyed sdom pa'i 
[\[242a.3\]]tshul khrims la gnos la/_rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig ces byang 
[\[242a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung ngo /_/gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro/_/tshul khrims kyi legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 
[\[242a.5\]]mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can de dag de ltar tshul khrims la sbyar cing /_tshul khrims la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[242a.6\]]zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na 
[\[242a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can gang khro ba dang /_gnod sems su byed pa dag mthong na/_de dag la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed ci'i rgyus gnod sems su byed par gyur/_gang gis phongs shing 
[\[242b.2\]]gnod sems su byed par gyur pa de dang de nga las longs shig_/ngas khyed zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor 
[\[242b.3\]]dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas/_khro ba dang /_gnod sems 
[\[242b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]par gyis shig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can de dag bzod pa la sbyor te/_'di skad du gcugs gang gis khyed kyis khro ba skye bar gyur pa de ni snying 
[\[242b.5\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de la dngos po gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/khro ba de ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa ste/_dngos po gang gis phyir khyed 'thab cing 'khon pa dang /_gnod sems su byed par gyur pa dang /_de ltar 'thabs shing 'khon 
[\[242b.6\]]te/_gnod sems su gyur nas dbyig pas 'gyed pa dang /_mtshon gyis 'dre ba dang /_phan tshun gyi srog la rgol bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de lta yin yang khyed yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yongs su 
[\[242b.7\]]rtog pas 'khrugs na/_sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_byol song gi skye gnas dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu yang khyed sdug bsngal [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]bzod pa dang tsha zhing rtsub la yid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyis/_skyes bu khyed rnams dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos kyi don du las gang yongs su bzung bas myir skye ba yang 'thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur na/_sangs rgyas 
[\[243a.2\]]'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur ba lta smos su yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de lta bu'i las yongs su ma 'dzin cig_/grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon no/_/myir skye ba 'thob pa ni dkon no/_/dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni dkon no/_/'khor ba las 
[\[243a.3\]]thar pa ni dkon no/_/de lta yin gyis dal ba 'di don [{]myed [,]med [}]par ma bya shig_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]khom par gyur cing gsor mi rung bar gyur ta re zhes de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang bzod pa sgrub la/_gzhan yang bzod pa la yang 
[\[243a.4\]]dag par skul lo/_/bzod pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can de dag de 
[\[243a.5\]]ltar bzod pa la sbyar cing /_bzod pa la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_bzod 
[\[243a.6\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams 
[\[243a.7\]]sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na 'di skad du khyed ci'i phyir le lo byed ces rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te/_kye skyes bu dag ngas sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/_tshul khrims kyi rkyen tam/_bzod pa'i rkyen tam/_gzhan yang 
[\[243b.2\]]rnam pa gang dang gang gis brtson 'grus brtsam du rung ba de dag khyed la ngas nye bar bsgrub par byas/_brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas/_sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing /_lus sam 
[\[243b.3\]]sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams sgom mo/_/de dag bsgoms 
[\[243b.4\]]pas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob bo/_/rang byang chub 'thob bo/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[243b.5\]]chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo/_/brtson 'grus kyi legs brjod do/_/sems 
[\[243b.6\]]can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyar cing /_brtson 'grus la rab 
[\[243b.7\]]tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]can yongs su sdud pa yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu drug pa/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul 
[\[244a.2\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong 
[\[244a.3\]]na/_'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir bsam gtan la mnyam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzhog ces rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de la 'di skad du 'dems te/_
[\[244a.4\]]kye sems can dag ngas rkyen gang dang gang gis phyi nang gi chos la rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub bo zhes smras so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can de dag la rkyen nye bar bsgrub 
[\[244a.5\]]par bya'o zhes nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas/_rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar sgrub ste/_de'i phyir de dag rnam par rtog pa chad 
[\[244a.6\]]nas/_bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/byams pa la snyoms 
[\[244a.7\]]par 'jug go_/snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go_/dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug go_/btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug go_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go_/de dag bsam gtan dang /_
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems dul bar gyur pas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/_/dbang po lnga sgom mo/_/
[\[244b.2\]]stobs lnga sgom mo/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo/_/de dag bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[244b.3\]]'da' ste/_de la la la ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas

[\[245a\]]

[\[245a.3\]]pa'i khams sam/_gzugs kyi khams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams sam/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gam/_stong pa nyid thams cad dam/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam

[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro/_/tshul khrims kyi legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[249a.2\]]chen po de sems can de dag de ltar tshul khrims la sbyar cing tshul khrims la rab tu 'god de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[249a.3\]]phyin pa la gnas shing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[249a.4\]]sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can gang khro ba dang /_gnod sems su byed pa dag mthong na/_de la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/
[\[249a.5\]]rigs kyi bu dag khyed ci'i rgyus gnod sems su byed par gyur/_gang gis phongs shing gnod sems su gyur pa de dang de nga las long shig_/ngas khyed zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug 
[\[249a.6\]]spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i 
[\[249a.7\]]bar gyis phongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas/_khro ba dang /_gnod sems [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyis shig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag bzod pa la sbyor te/_'di skad du gcugs gang 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]gis khyed kyi khro ba skye bar 'gyur ba de ni snying po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de la dngos po gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/khro ba de ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa ste/_dngos po gang gis phyir khyed 'thab cing 'khon pa dang /_gnod sems su byed par gyur pa dang /_
[\[249b.2\]]de ltar 'thabs shing 'khon te/_gnod sems su gyur nas dbyug pas 'gyed pa dang /_mtshon gyis 'dre ba dang /_phan tshun gyi srog la rgol bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de lta yin yang khyed yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 
[\[249b.3\]]yongs su rtog pas 'khrugs na/_sems can dmyal bdag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_byol song gi skye gnas dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu yang khyed sdug bsngal [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzad 
[\[249b.4\]]pa tsha zhing rtsub la yid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyis/_skyes bu khyed rnams dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos kyi don du las gang yongs su bzung bas myir skye ba yang 'thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur na/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur 
[\[249b.5\]]ba lta smos su yang med pa de lta bu'i las yongs su ma 'dzin cig_/grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon no/_/myir skye ba 'thob pa ni dkon no/_/dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni dkon no/_/'khor ba las thar pa ni dkon no/_/de lta 
[\[249b.6\]]yin gyis dal ba 'di don [{]myed [,]med [}]par ma bya shig_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]khom par gyur cing gsor [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung bar gyur ta re zhes de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang bzod pa sgrub po/_/gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/

[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]sbyar cing /_bzod pa la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i 
[\[250a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/_
[\[250a.3\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung bdag mthong na 'di skad du khyed ci'i phyir le lo byed ces rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems 
[\[250a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te/_kye skyes bu dag ngas sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/_tshul khrims kyi rkyen tam/_bzod pa'i rkyen tam/_gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang 
[\[250a.5\]]gis brtson 'grus brtsam du rung ba de dag khyed la ngas nye bar bsgrub par byas/_brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas/_sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing /_lus sam sems kyi brtson 
[\[250a.6\]]'grus rtsom ste/_de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams sgom mo/_/de dag bsgoms pas rgyun tu zhugs 
[\[250a.7\]]pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob bo/_/rang byang chub 'thob bo/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo/_/brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan 
[\[250b.2\]]gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyar cing /_brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod de/_
[\[250b.3\]]rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud 
[\[250b.4\]]pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[250b.5\]]dpa' chen pos sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir bsam gtan la mnyam par mi gzhog ces rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[250b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/_kye sems can dag ngas rkyen gang dang gang gis phyi nang gi chos la rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes nas/_byang chub 
[\[250b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar sgrub ste/_de'i phyir de dag rnam par rtog pa chad nas bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/_
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go_/dga' 
[\[251a.2\]]ba la snyoms par 'jug go_/btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug go_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go_/de dag bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems 
[\[251a.3\]]dul bar gyur pas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/_/dbang po lnga sgom mo/_/stobs lnga sgom mo/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo/_/'phags pa'i lam 
[\[251a.4\]]yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo/_/de dag bsgoms pas/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/_de la la la ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam las 
[\[251a.5\]]yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[251a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[251a.7\]]la gnas shing shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab kyi sgom zhes rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/_de las yo byad rnams long la sbyin pa byin cig_/tshul khrims srungs shig_/bzod pa sgoms shig_/brtson 'grus rtsoms shig_/ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog

[\[251b.3\]]byed pa po 'am/_tshor ba po 'am/_shes pa po 'am/_mthong ba po 'am/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/_'dod pa'i khams sam/_gzugs kyi khams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams

[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad med pa rnams sam/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par

[\[252a.5\]]rtogs shig ces 'dems shing rjes su ston te/_des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang 
[\[252a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de la mngon par zhen pa med pas chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_'di ni sems 
[\[252a.7\]]can dmyal ba pa'o/_/'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/_/'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni lha ma yin gyi ris su gtogs pa'o/_/'di ni lha'o/_/'di ni myi'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]ngan pa can no/_/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

[\[252b.3\]]yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la 
[\[252b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_sbyin pa yongs su btang nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu dag sbyin pa la 'dzin pas ma 'dzin cig_/
[\[252b.5\]]sbyin pa la 'dzin pas 'dzin 'dzin cing lus gang mngon par grub pas sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus mngon par grub pa re/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di la don dam par ni/_sbyin pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[252b.6\]]yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sbyin pa'i bdag po yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_len pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_chos de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/_gzung du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_zhes 'dems 
[\[252b.7\]]shing rjes su ston te rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang de la sbyin par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sbyin pa'i bdag por 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_len par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de chos gsum po de dag thams cad la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_sems can rnams rgyun 
[\[253a.2\]]tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor ro/_/rang byang chub la sbyor ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 
[\[253a.3\]]sbyor ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_de bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong 
[\[253a.4\]]ngo /_/gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/sbyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[253a.5\]]dpa' chen po de yang de lta bu'i sbyin pa chen po byin pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba 
[\[253a.6\]]mnyam par skye'o/_/khams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob bo/_/de de dag na yang sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su sdud de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don bya ba 
[\[253a.7\]]dang /_don mthun pas yongs su sdud do/_/de de ltar sems can sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa de dag kyang /_rim gyis tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/_/bzod pa la rab tu 'god do/_/brtson 'grus la rab tu 'god do/_/
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do/_/bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/dran pa 
[\[253b.2\]]nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/dbang po lnga la rab tu 'god do/_/stobs lnga la rab tu 'god do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rab tu 
[\[253b.3\]]'god do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rab tu 'god do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad la rab tu 'god do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rab tu 'god 
[\[253b.4\]]do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la rab tu 'god do/_/mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la rab tu 'god do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rab tu 'god 
[\[253b.5\]]do/_yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug par byed do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byed do/_/
[\[253b.6\]]rang byang chub thob par byed do/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed do/_/kye skyes bu dag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]dka' ste/_de la 
[\[253b.7\]]phyin ci log gis rmongs pa'i sems kyis khong du ma chud pa ma gtogs par chos gang la sems can rnams chags par gyur pa'i chos de lta bu gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]kyis/_de bas na phyin ci log gi 'dzin pa thams cad 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]rgyun chod la/_'khor ba las bdag cag kyang thar bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang thar bar gyis shig_/de ltar khyed bdag cag gi don du yang cher 'gyur/_gzhan yang don chen po la 'byor bar 'gyur ro zhes yang dag par skul ba 
[\[254a.2\]]byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/_de ltar spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_nam yang ngan song du mi ltung ba dang /_
[\[254a.3\]]nam yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa bon ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu 'byung ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i drung du slongs mo pa gang ji snyed cig 'ongs kyang /_'khor 
[\[254a.4\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par gzhan gyi don du 'khor los sgyur ba yongs su ma bzung ngo zhes nas/_de 'di skad ces zer te/_su ci 'dod pa de khyed byin gyis/_
[\[254a.5\]]'di ni nga'i ma yin gyi khyed kyi'o/_/nga ni nang gi gzugs la yang don du gnyer ba [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_gzhan lta la ci smos te/_gzhan du na ngas sems can rnams kyi don du 'khor ba yongs su bzung gi_/bdag ni 'khor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin no 
[\[254a.6\]]zhes te/_de snying brtse bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_snying rje chen pos sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang sems can gang yongs su grub pa de lta bu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_gzhan du na 'du shes dang [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda'i tha 
[\[254a.7\]]snyad kyis rnam par spyod de/_rnam par spyad pa de yang sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par spyad du [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/_spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang bdag gi sha yan chad kyang sems can rnams la yongs su ma btang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya na/_phyi rol gyi yo byad gang gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya ba dag lta smos 
[\[254b.2\]]su yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ltar spyad par bya'o/_/gsold pa/_yo byad de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[254b.3\]]phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/phyi nang stong pa 
[\[254b.4\]]nyid ni yo byad do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/chen po stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/mtha' las 'das pa 
[\[254b.5\]]stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yo 
[\[254b.6\]]byad do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/yang 
[\[254b.7\]]dag par spong ba rnams ni yo byad do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/dbang po rnams ni yo byad do/_/stobs rnams ni yo byad do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yo byad do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yo 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]byad do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/bsam gtan rnams ni yo byad do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams ni yo 
[\[255a.2\]]byad do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni yo byad do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/ting nge 'dzin 
[\[255a.3\]]rnams ni yo byad do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yo byad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yo byad do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yo bye do/_/byams pa chen po ni yo byad 
[\[255a.4\]]do/_/snying rje chen po ni yo byad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/de dag ni yo byad de yo byad de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su bsdus shing rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[255a.5\]]theg pa 'am/_theg pa chen po 'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[255a.6\]]phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba 
[\[255a.7\]]yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la 'di skad du tshur sheg_/rigs kyi bu dag tshul khrims srungs shig_/ngas khyed 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]la zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man 
[\[255b.2\]]shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_mi'i rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya'o/_/khyed kyis phongs par gyur pa'i phyir tshul khrims ngan pa la spyod par gyur grang na/_khyed zas dang 
[\[255b.3\]]skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_
[\[255b.4\]]byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba rin po che sna bdun gyi bar gyis phongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas/_khyed sdom pa'i tshul khrims la gnos la/_rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[255b.5\]]rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig ces/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdag nyid kyang /_tshul khrims 
[\[255b.6\]]srung ngo /_/gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro/_/tshul khrims kyi legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[255b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar tshul khrims la sbyar cing /_tshul khrims la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag 
[\[256a.2\]]brgya pa/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba 
[\[256a.3\]]yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can gang khro ba dang /_gnod sems su byed pa dag mthong na/_de dag la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/
[\[256a.4\]]rigs kyi bu dag khyed ci'i rgyus gnod sems su byed par gyur/_gang gis phongs shing gnod sems su byed par gyur pa de dang de nga las long shig_/ngas khyed la zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_
[\[256a.5\]]me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]rkyen dang /_
[\[256a.6\]]yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas/_khro ba dang /_gnod sems [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyis shig ces/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can 
[\[256a.7\]]de dag bzod pa la sbyor te/_'di skad du gcugs gang gis khyed kyi khro ba skye bar gyur pa de ni snying po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de la dngos po gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/khro ba de ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa ste/_dngos po gang gi phyir khyed 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]'thab cing 'khon pa dang /_gnod sems su byed par gyur pa dang /_de ltar 'thabs shing 'khon te/_gnod sems su gyur nas dbyig pas 'gyed pa dang /_mtshon gyis 'dre ba dang /_phan tshun gyi srog la rgol bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la dngos po'i 
[\[256b.2\]]rang bzhin gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de lta yin yang khyed yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas 'khrugs na/_sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_byol song gi skye gnas dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 
[\[256b.3\]]'gyur/_de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu yang khyed sdug bsngal [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzad pa tsha zhing rtsub la yid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyis skyes bu khyed rnams dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos kyi don du las gang yongs su bzung bas myir skye 
[\[256b.4\]]ba yang thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur na/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur ba lta smos su yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_de lta bu'i las yongs su ma 'dzin cig_/grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon no/_/myir skye ba 'thob pa ni dkon no/_/dal ba phun 
[\[256b.5\]]sum tshogs pa ni dkon no/_/'khor ba las thar pa ni dkon no/_/de lta yin gyis dal ba 'di don med par ma bya shig_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]khom par gyur cing gsor [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung bar gyur ta re zhes de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid 
[\[256b.6\]]kyang bzod pa sgrub bo/_/gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/bzod pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan yang bzod pa sgom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[256b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar bzod pa la sbyar cing /_bzod pa la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[257a.2\]]tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/_'di skad du khyed ci'i 
[\[257a.3\]]phyir le lo byed ces rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te/_kye skyes bu dag 
[\[257a.4\]]ngas sbyin pa'i rkyen tam tshul khrims kyi rkyen tam/_bzod pa'i rkyen tam/_gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang gis brtson 'grus brtsam du rung ba de dag khyed la ngas nye bar bsgrub par byas brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas/_sems can 
[\[257a.5\]]de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing lus sam/_sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_dge ba'i 
[\[257a.6\]]chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams sgom mo/_/de dag bsgoms pas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/dgra bcom pa 
[\[257a.7\]]nyid 'thob bo/_/rang byang chub 'thob bo/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/gzhan yang 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo/_/brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[257b.2\]]po de sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyar cing /_brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha 
[\[257b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_bsam 
[\[257b.4\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir bsam gtan 
[\[257b.5\]]la mnyam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzhog ces rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/_kye sems can dag ngas rkyen gang dang gang gis chos la 
[\[257b.6\]]rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas/_rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen 
[\[257b.7\]]nye bar sgrub ste/_de'i phyir de dag rnam par rtog pa chad nas bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan bzhi pa 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]la snyoms par 'jug go_/byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go_/dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug go_/btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug go_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[258a.2\]]pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go_/de dag bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems dul bar gyur pas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom 
[\[258a.3\]]mo/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/_/dbang po lnga sgom mo/_/stobs lnga sgom mo/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo/_/de 
[\[258a.4\]]dag bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/_de la la la ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub 
[\[258a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[258a.6\]]po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[258a.7\]]gnas shing /_shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab [{]myi [,]mi [}]sgom zhes rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/_nga las yo byad rnams long la/_sbyin pa byin cig_/tshul khrims srungs shig_/bzod pa sgoms shig_/brtson 'grus rtsoms 
[\[258b.2\]]shig/_ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog shig_/rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyis la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_'gro ba 'am/_gso ba 'am/_skyes bu 'am/_gang zag 
[\[258b.3\]]gam/_shed can nam/_shed bdag gam/_byed pa po 'am/_tshor ba po 'am/_shes pa po 'am/_mthong ba po 'am/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_'dod pa'i khams sam/_
[\[258b.4\]]gzugs kyi khams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams sam/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[258b.5\]]tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 
[\[258b.6\]]dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/_rang gi 
[\[258b.7\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_
[\[259a.2\]]bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[259a.3\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 
[\[259a.4\]]sam/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje che po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_

[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]gtogs pa'o/_/'di ni lha'o/_/'di ni mi'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims ngan pa can no/_/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/

[\[260a.1\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang /_de la sbyin par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sbyin pa'i bdag por [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa med/_len par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'di lta ste/_sbyin

[\[261a.1\]]gtogs par/_chos gang la sems can rnams chags par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa med kyis/_de lta bas na phyin ci log gi 'dzin pa thams cad rgyun chod la/_'khor ba las bdag cag

[\[261b.1\]]rnam par spyad du [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/_spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang bdag gi sha yan chad kyang sems can rnams la yongs su ma

[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[263a.2\]]spyod cing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can gang khro ba dang gnod sems su 
[\[263a.3\]]byed pa dag mthong na/_de dag la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed ci'i rgyus gnod sems su byed par gyur/_gang gis phongs shing gnod sems su byed par gyur pa de dang de nga las long shig/_ngas khyed zas dang /_skom dang /_
[\[263a.4\]]gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_
