[\[263a.6\]]tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag bzod pa la sbyor te/_'di skad du gcugs gang gis khyed kyis khro ba skye bar gyur pa de ni snying po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de la dngos po gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/khro ba de ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags 
[\[263a.7\]]pa ste/_dngos po gang gi phyir khyed 'thab cing 'khon pa dang /_gnod sems su byed par gyur pa dang /_de ltar khyed 'thabs shing 'khon te/_gnod sems su gyur nas dbyigs pas 'gyed pa dang /_mtshon gyis 'dre ba dang /_phan tshun 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]gyi srog la rgol bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de lta yin yang khyed yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas 'khrugs na sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_byol song gi skye gnas dag tu ltung bar 
[\[263b.2\]]'gyur/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu yang khyed sdug bsngal [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzad pa tsha zhing rtsub la yid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyis/_skyes bu khyed rnams dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos 
[\[263b.3\]]kyi don du las gang yongs su bzung bas/_myir skye ba yang 'thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur na/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur ba lta smos su yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_de lta bu'i las yongs su ma 'dzin cig_/grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon no/_/
[\[263b.4\]]myir skye ba 'thob pa ni dkon no/_/dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni dkon no/_/'khor ba las thar pa ni dkon no/_/de lta yin gyis dal ba 'di don [{]myed [,]med [}]par ma bya shig_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]khom par gyur cing gsor [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung bar gyur ta re zhes de la byang 
[\[263b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang bzod pa sgrub po/_/gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/bzod pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun 
[\[263b.6\]]pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar bzod pa la sbyar cing /_bzod pa la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor 
[\[263b.7\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can le 
[\[264a.2\]]lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/_'di skad du khyed ci'i phyir le lo byed ces rjod do/_/de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[264a.3\]]spyod cing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te/_kye skyes bu dag ngas sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/_tshul khrims kyi rkyen tam/_bzod pa'i rkyen tam/_gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang gis brtson 'grus brtsam du rung ba de dag khyad 
[\[264a.4\]]la ngas nye bar bsgrub par byas/_brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing /_lus sam sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_de dag lus dang sems kyi 
[\[264a.5\]]brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo/_/de dag bsgoms pas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_lan cig phyir 
[\[264a.6\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob bo/_/rang byang chub 'thob bo/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de la byang chub sems 
[\[264a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo/_/brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa rjod 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag 'di ltar brtson 'grus la rab tu sbyar cing /_brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo 
[\[264b.2\]]ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[264b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems g.yengs par gyur 
[\[264b.4\]]pa'i sems can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir bsam gtan la mnyam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzhog ces rjod do/_/de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag 
[\[264b.5\]]la 'di skad du 'dems te/_kye sems can dag ngas khyed rkyen gang dang gang gis phyi nang gi chos la rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag 
[\[264b.6\]]la rkyen gang dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar sgrub ste/_de'i phyir de dag rnam par rtog pa chad nas/_bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug 
[\[264b.7\]]go_/bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go_/dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug go_/btang snyoms la snyoms par 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]'jug go_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go_/de dag bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems dul bar gyur pas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[265a.2\]]pa bzhi sgom mo/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/_/dbang po lnga sgom mo/_/stobs lnga sgom mo/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/_/rnam 
[\[265a.3\]]par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo/_/de dag bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/_de la la la ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam ste/_
[\[265a.4\]]rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[265a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[265a.6\]]tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab [{]myi [,]mi [}]sgom zhes rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[265a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/_nga las yo byad rnams long la sbyin pa byin cig_/tshul khrims srungs shig_/bzod pa sgoms shig_/brtson 'grus 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]rtsoms shig_/ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog shig_/rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyis la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_'gro ba 'am/_gso ba 'am/_skyes bu 'am/_gang zag gam/_
[\[265b.2\]]shed can nam/_shed bdag gam/_byed pa po 'am/_tshor ba po 'am/_shes pa po 'am/_mthong ba po 'am/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/_'dod pa'i khams sam/_gzugs 
[\[265b.3\]]kyi khams sam/_gzugs med pa'i khams sam/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[265b.4\]]tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas stong 
[\[265b.5\]]pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/_
[\[265b.6\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang 
[\[265b.7\]]dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 
[\[266a.2\]]sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/_
[\[266a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 
[\[266a.4\]]'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/_chos gang yang yod dam rtogs shig ces 
[\[266a.5\]]'dems shing rjes su ston te/_des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos gang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_
[\[266a.6\]]de la mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas chos gang yang skye ba 'am/_'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_'di ni sems can dmyal 
[\[266a.7\]]ba pa'o/_/'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/_/'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni lha ma yin gyi ris su gtogs pa'o/_/'di ni lha'o/_'di ni myi'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]ngan pa can no/_/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[266b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems 
[\[266b.3\]]can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/_
[\[266b.4\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_sbyin pa yongs su btang nas 'di skad du/_rigs kyi bu dag sbyin pa de 
[\[266b.5\]]la 'dzin pas ma 'dzin cig_/sbyin pa la 'dzin pas 'dzin 'dzin cing /_lus gang mngon par grub pas/_sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus mngon par grub pa re/_rigs kyi bu 'di la don dam par na sbyin 
[\[266b.6\]]pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sbyin pa'i bdag po yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_len pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_chos de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 
[\[266b.7\]]gzung du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o zhes 'dems shing rjes su ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang de la sbyin par 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sbyin pa'i bdag por [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_len par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de chos gsum po de dag thams 
[\[267a.2\]]cad la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor ro/_/rang byang chub la sbyor ro/_/
[\[267a.3\]]bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sbyor ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor cing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par 
[\[267a.4\]]byed de/_de bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/sbyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas 
[\[267a.5\]]dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang de lta bu'i sbyin pa chen po byin pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba 
[\[267a.6\]]mnyam par skye'o/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/khams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob bo/_/de de dag na yang sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po 
[\[267a.7\]]bzhis yongs su sdud de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa dang /_don bya ba dang /_don mthun pas yongs su sdud de/_de ltar sems can sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa de dag kyang rim gyis tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/_/
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]bzod pa la rab tu 'god do/_/brtson 'grus la rab tu 'god do/_/bsam gtan la rab tu 'god do/_/shes rab la rab tu 'god do/_/bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms 
[\[267b.2\]]par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/dbang po lnga la rab tu 'god do/_/stobs lnga 
[\[267b.3\]]la rab tu 'god do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rab tu 'god do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rab tu 'god do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad la rab tu 'god do/_/mthar 
[\[267b.4\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rab tu 'god do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la rab tu 'god do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams la rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la rab 
[\[267b.5\]]tu 'god do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rab tu 'god do/_/yang dag par skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug par byed do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 
[\[267b.6\]]'bras bu thob par byed do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rang byang chub thob par byed do/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed do/_/kye skyes bu dag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[267b.7\]]pa'i byang chub ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]dka' ste/_de la phyin ci log gis rmongs pa'i sems kyis khong du ma chud pa ma gtogs par chos gang la sems can rnams chags par gyur pa'i chos de lta bu gang yang ngo bo 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]nyid kyis yod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]kyis de lta bas na phyin ci log gi 'dzin pa thams cad rgyun chod la/_'khor ba las bdag cag kyang thar bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang thar bar gyis shig_/de ltar na khyed bdag cag gi don du yang cher 
[\[268a.2\]]'gyur/_gzhan yang don chen po la 'byor bar 'gyur ro zhes yang dag par skul ba byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/_de ltar spyod pa'i tshe ci 
[\[268a.3\]]nas kyang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_nam yang ngan song du [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ba dang /_nam yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa bon ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu 
[\[268a.4\]]'byung ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i drung du slongs mo pa gang ji snyed cig 'ongs kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par gzhan gyis don du 'khor 
[\[268a.5\]]los sgyur ba yongs su ma bzung ngo zhes nas/_de 'di skad ces zer te/_su ci 'dod pa de khyed byin gyis 'di ni nga'i ma yin gyi khyed kyi'o/_/nga ni nang gi gzugs la yang don du gnyer ba [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_gzhan lta la ci smos te/_gzhan du na 
[\[268a.6\]]ngas sems can rnams kyi don du 'khor ba yongs su bzung gi_/bdag ni 'khor ba don du gnyer pa ma yin no zhes te/_de snying brtse bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_snying rje chen pos sems can rnams kyi don 
[\[268a.7\]]byed kyang sems can gang yongs su grub pa de lta bu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_gzhan du na 'du shes dang [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda'i tha snyad kyis rnam par spyod de/_rnam par spyod pa de yang sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par spyad du [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/_spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang bdag gi sha yan chad kyang sems can rnams la yongs su ma btang 
[\[268b.2\]]ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya na/_phyi rol gyi yo byad gang gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya ba dag lta smos su yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ltar spyad par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_yo byad de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[268b.3\]]stsal pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[268b.4\]]pa ni yo byad do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do/_/nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/chen po stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/don 
[\[268b.5\]]dam pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[268b.6\]]ni yo byad do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/ngo bo nyid 
[\[268b.7\]]stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yo byad do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/dbang po rnams ni yo 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]byad do/_/stobs rnams ni yo byad do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yo byad do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yo byad do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/bsam gtan rnams ni yo byad do/_/
[\[269a.2\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid 
[\[269a.3\]]dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa med pa ni yo byad do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni yo byad do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yo byad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yo byad do/_/
[\[269a.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/snying rje chen po ni yo byad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yo byad do/_/de dag ni yo byad do/_yo byad de dag gis sems can rnams 
[\[269a.5\]]yongs su bsdus shing /_rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_theg pa chen po 'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[269a.6\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_/rab 'byor 
[\[269a.7\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can rnams la 'di skad du tshur sheg_/rigs kyi bu dag tshul khrims srungs shig_/ngas khyed la zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_
[\[269b.2\]]bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DU r+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]rkyen dang /_yo byad 
[\[269b.3\]]gang ci yang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya'o/_/khyed phongs pa'i phyir tshul khrims ngan pa la spyod par gyur grang na/_khyed zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos 
[\[269b.4\]]dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci 
[\[269b.5\]]yang rung ste/_rin po che sna bdun gyi bar gyis phongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas/_de bas na khyed sdom pa'i tshul khrims gnos la rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg 
[\[269b.6\]]pa 'am/_theg pa gsum po de dag gis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig ces/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung ngo /_/gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro/_/tshul khrims 
[\[269b.7\]]kyi legs pa rjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar tshul khrims 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]la skyar cing /_tshul khrims la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing

[\[270a.3\]]sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can gang khro ba dang /_gnod sems su byed pa dag mthong na de dag la 'di 
[\[270a.4\]]skad ces zer ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed ci'i rgyus gnod sems su byed par gyur/_gang gis phongs shing gnod sems su byed par gyur pa de dang /_de nga las long shig_/ngas khyed la zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_

[\[270a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag bzod pa la sbyor te/_'di skad du gcugs gang gis khyed kyi khro ba skye bar gyur pa de ni snying po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de la dngos po gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/khro ba de ni yang dag pa ma yin par 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]yongs su brtags pa ste/_dngos po gang gi phyir khyed 'thab cing 'khon te/_gnod sems su byed par gyur pa dang /_de ltar 'thabs shing 'khon te/_gnod sems su gyur nas dbyig pas 'gyed pa dang /_mtshon gyis 'dre ba dang /_phan 
[\[270b.2\]]tshun gyi srog la rgol bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de lta yin yang khyed yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su rtog pas 'khrugs na/_sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_byol song gi skye gnas 
[\[270b.3\]]dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu yang khyed sdug bsngal [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzad pa tsha zhing rtsub la yid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyis/_skyes bu khyed

[\[270b.5\]]sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon no/_/myir skye ba 'thob pa ni dkon no/_/dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni dkon no/_/'khor ba las thar ba ni dkon no/_/de lta yin gyis dal ba 'di don [{]myed [,]med [}]par ma bya shig [{]myi [,]mi [}]khom par gyur cing gsor [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[270b.6\]]rung bar gyur ta re zhes/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang bzod pa sgrub bo/_gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/bzod pa'i legs pa brjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom 
[\[270b.7\]]pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar bzod pa la sbyar cing /_bzod pa la rab tu bkod de/_rim gyis theg pa gsum pos 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa 
[\[271a.2\]]yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[271a.3\]]dpa' chen po sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/_'di skad du khyed ci'i phyir le lo byed ces rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[271a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te/_kye skyes bu dag ngas sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/_tshul khrims kyi rkyen tam/_bzod pa'i rkyen tam/_gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang gis brtson 'grus 
[\[271a.5\]]brtsam du rung ba de dag khyed la ngas nye bar bsgrub par byas/_brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas/_sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing lus sam sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_

[\[271a.7\]]'thob bo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob bo/_/rang byang chub 'thob bo/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]'tshang rgya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo/_/brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do/_/sems can gzhan gang brtson 
[\[271b.2\]]'grus rtsom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyar cing /_brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod de/_

[\[271b.4\]]yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[271b.5\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir bsam gtan la mnyam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]gzhog ces rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan 
[\[271b.6\]]pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/_kye sems can dag ngas rkyen gang dang gang gis phyi nang gi chos la rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta 
[\[271b.7\]]bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas rnam par rtog par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar sgrub ste/_de'i phyir de 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]dag rnam par rtog pa chad nas/_bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan bzhi ba la

[\[272a.3\]]par 'jug go_/de dag bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems dul bar gyur pas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/_/
[\[272a.4\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/_/dbang po lnga sgom mo/_/stobs lnga sgom mo/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo/_/de dag 
[\[272a.5\]]bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/_de la la la ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub

[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/_'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab [{]myi [,]mi [}]sgom zhes rjod de/_de dag rkyen dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/_de la byang chub

[\[272b.3\]]brtson 'grus rtsoms shig_/ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog shig_/rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyis la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la/_bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_

[\[272b.5\]]byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/_'dod pa'i khams sam/_gzugs kyi khams sam/_gzugs med pa'i khams sam/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[272b.6\]]pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_
[\[272b.7\]]chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[273a.2\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags 
[\[273a.3\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar

[\[273a.6\]]'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/_
[\[273a.7\]]chos gang yang yod dam rtogs shig ces 'dems shing rjes su ston te/_des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas mngon par zhen par 'gyur 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de la mngon par zhen pa med pas chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes 
[\[273b.2\]]su ma mthong bas/_'di ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o/_/'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/_/'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni lha ma yin gyi ris su gtogs pa'o/_/'di ni lha'o/_/'di ni myi'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni tshul 
[\[273b.3\]]khrims ngan pa can no/_/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni byang chub 
[\[273b.4\]]sems dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[273b.5\]]phyin pa la gnas shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dran pa nye bar 
[\[273b.6\]]gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams 
[\[273b.7\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]gnas shing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_yang dag par spong ba 
[\[274a.2\]]bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag 
[\[274a.3\]]par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_
[\[274a.4\]]yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba 
[\[274a.5\]]yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[274a.6\]]gyi rkang pa rnams bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems 
[\[274a.7\]]can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo/_/dbang po rnams bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 
[\[274b.2\]]'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin 
[\[274b.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs 
[\[274b.4\]]su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo/_/stobs rnams bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing 
[\[274b.5\]]stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin 
[\[274b.6\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo/_/
[\[274b.7\]]byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can 
[\[275a.2\]]rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad 
[\[275a.3\]]pa sgom mo/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_
[\[275a.4\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[275a.5\]]bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams 
[\[275a.6\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[275a.7\]]tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_yang dag 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par 
[\[275b.2\]]spong ba bzhi sgom mo/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_yang dag par 
[\[275b.3\]]spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_
[\[275b.4\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 
[\[275b.5\]]bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba 
[\[275b.6\]]yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[275b.7\]]dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo/_/dbang po lnga bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[276a.2\]]dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad 
[\[276a.3\]]de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo/_/stobs lnga bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi 
[\[276a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la 
[\[276a.5\]]sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[276a.6\]]bdun sgom mo/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_byang chub 
[\[276a.7\]]kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

[\[276b.3\]]shing /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la 
[\[276b.4\]]sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag

[\[276b.6\]]nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin 
[\[276b.7\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/_/yang dag 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]par spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_yang dag par spong ba 
[\[277a.2\]]bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_

[\[277a.5\]]sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[277a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo/_/dbang po lnga bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 
[\[277a.7\]]'gyur te/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub

[\[277b.5\]]lag bdun sgom mo/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_byang chub

[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]brgyad pa sgom mo/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[278a.2\]]la gnas shing /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 
[\[278a.3\]]la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag

[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe 
[\[278b.2\]]na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[278b.3\]]rkang pa bzhi bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems 
[\[278b.4\]]can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la 
[\[278b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo/_/dbang po lnga bsgoms pas 'khor ba las 
[\[278b.6\]]yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar 
[\[278b.7\]]na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo/_/stobs lnga bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de 
[\[279a.2\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 
[\[279a.3\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub 
[\[279a.4\]]ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub 
[\[279a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 
[\[279a.6\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams 
[\[279a.7\]]nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[279b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[279b.3\]]sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar 
[\[279b.4\]]bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[279b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can 
[\[279b.6\]]dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 
[\[279b.7\]]'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can 
[\[280a.2\]]dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 
[\[280a.3\]]'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[280a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad 
[\[280a.5\]]rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo/_/dbang po lnga bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[280a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[280a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo/_/stobs lnga bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu 
[\[280b.2\]]phyin pa la gnas shing /_stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la 
[\[280b.3\]]sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi 
[\[280b.4\]]yan lag bdun sgom mo/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[280b.5\]]gnas shing /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_'phags pa'i lam 
[\[280b.6\]]yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems 
[\[280b.7\]]can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]dpa' chen pos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[281a.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems 
[\[281a.3\]]can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur 
[\[281a.4\]]te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[281a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[281a.6\]]pa la gnas shing /_sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las 
[\[281a.7\]]yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[281b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 
[\[281b.3\]]bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor 
[\[281b.4\]]ba yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems

[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]gnas shing /_sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/_yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo/_/stobs lnga bsgoms pas/_'khor ba las yongs su thar par

[\[282b.4\]]zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang

[\[282b.6\]]bde bar 'gyur gyis/_'di ltar don 'di ni pha bi'i yin gyi/_bdag gi ma yin no snyam du bsam par mi bya'o/_/don 'di ni bdag gis yun ring po nas sems can rnams kyi don du bsgrubs pa yin no zhes de ltar khyed kyis bdag gi yin 
[\[282b.7\]]par soms la/_sems can rnams la yongs su thong shig_/sbyin pa des kyang tshul khrims la sbyor cig_/bzod pa la sbyor cig_/brtson 'grus la sbyor cig_/bsam gtan la sbyor cig_/shes rab la sbyor cig_/nang stong 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]pa nyid la sbyor cig_/phyi stong pa nyid la sbyor cig_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la sbyor cig_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor cig_/chen po stong pa nyid la sbyor cig_/don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig_/'dus byas stong pa

[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]gnas shing /_sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/_phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas/_de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas te/_de dag sdom pa'i tshul khrims

[\[284a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_nang stong pa nyid la

[\[284b\]]

[\[285a\]]

[\[285a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ba gnas/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas/_dbang po lnga la gnas/_stobs lnga la gnas/_byang chub kyi yan 
[\[285a.7\]]lag bdun la gnas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/_bsam gtan rnams la gnas/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la gnas/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]rnams la gnas/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la gnas/_mngon par shes pa rnams la 
[\[285b.2\]]gnas/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/_snying rje chen po la gnas/_
[\[285b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[285b.4\]]gnas shing /_sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/_'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/_rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed le lo byed par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyis/_zas dang /_skom 
[\[285b.5\]]dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_
[\[285b.6\]]byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]rkyen dang /_yo byad gang ci yang rung ba rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long shig ces nas/_de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 
[\[285b.7\]]'dogs te/_phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas/_de dag brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_le lo [{]myed [,]med [}]cing brtson 'grus rtsom par gyur pa de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[286a.2\]]la gnas/_nang stong pa nyid la gnas/_phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/_chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/_don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/_'dus byas stong pa nyid la 
[\[286a.3\]]gnas/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la gnas/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la gnas/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/_chos

[\[286a.5\]]stong pa nyid la gnas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas/_dbang po lnga la gnas/_stobs lnga la gnas/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 
[\[286a.6\]]la gnas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/_bsam gtan rnams la gnas/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la gnas/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[286a.7\]]rnams la gnas/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la gnas/_mngon 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]par shes pa rnams la gnas/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/_snying

[\[286b.6\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/_phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas de dag bsam gtan sgom ste/_sems g.yeng ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mnyam 
[\[286b.7\]]par gzhag par gyur pa de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_brtson 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_nang stong pa nyid la gnas/_phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/_

[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]gnas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/_snying rje chen po la gnas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la gnas shing /_rnam pa

[\[287b.3\]]smin par byas pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su 'thar ba nas/_'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su 'thar ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[287b.4\]]pa la gnas shing /_sems can shes rab 'chal par gyur pa blo chung ba dag mthong na/_'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/_rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs

[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]pa la gnas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/_nang stong pa nyid la gnas/_

[\[288a.7\]]'jug pa rnams la gnas/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa la gnas/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/_so so yang dag par rig pa

[\[288b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_de ltar yongs su smin par byas [(]pa'i [,]pa [)]rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su 'thar ba nas/_'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su 
[\[288b.4\]]'thar ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u drug cu rtsa drug go_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[288b.5\]]pos de lta bu'i go bgo bar bya na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam ji lta bu zhig yod snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog 
[\[288b.6\]]par thugs su chud nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu 
[\[288b.7\]]phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub 
[\[289a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/
[\[289a.3\]]rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid ni byang chub 
[\[289a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[289a.5\]]chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[289a.6\]]lam mo/_/rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/
[\[289a.7\]]rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor rang gi mtshan 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems 
[\[289b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[289b.3\]]dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[289b.4\]]po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor

[\[289b.6\]]brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor bsam gtan ni byang chub 
[\[289b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni byang chub sems 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[290a.2\]]pa dgu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/
[\[290a.3\]]rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[290a.4\]]rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni byang 
[\[290a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[290a.6\]]dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[290a.7\]]dpa' chen po'i lam mo/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ba dang /_gang la ma bslabs kyang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yod dam/_rab 'byor gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang med de/_chos thams cad la ma 
[\[290b.2\]]bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad stong pa lags na/_
[\[290b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ji ltar bslab par bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di snyed do zhes bgyi ba'am/_'di dag go zhes bgyi ba dang /_'jig rten pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/'jig 
[\[290b.4\]]rten las 'das pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/'dus byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go_/'dus ma byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go_/so so'i skye bo'i 
[\[290b.5\]]chos ni 'di dag go_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos ni 'di dag go_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i chos ni 'di dag go_/dgra bcom pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag 
[\[290b.6\]]go_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go_/zhes bgyi ba ni spros pa ma mchis pa 'phro bar bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/
[\[290b.7\]]de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni stong pa'o/_/rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la bslabs shing /_bla na 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la 
[\[291a.2\]]bslabs shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor khyod kyis gzhan yang gang 'di skad du gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/_byang chub 
[\[291a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyed do zhes bya ba 'am/_'di dag go zhes bya ba dang /_'jig rten pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ni 'di dag go_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos

[\[291a.7\]]na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_rab 'byor sems can 'di dag chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya

[\[291b.1\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos rnam par dgod par byas shing /_sems can rnams

[\[292a.1\]]po lnga 'am/_stobs lnga 'am/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun nam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'am/_bsam gtan bzhi 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi 'am/_gzugs

[\[296a\]]

[\[296a.4\]]su ma byed cig_/de la snying po gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de bzhin du rang byang chub la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/rang byang chub sgoms shig_/rang byang chub des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po 
[\[296a.5\]]gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgoms shig_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de la snying po 
[\[296a.6\]]gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'dems te/_kye sems can dag tshur sheg_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgoms shig_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig_/de 
[\[296a.7\]]la snying po gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/zhes de de ltar sems can rnams la 'dems pa dang /_rjes su ston pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod kyang /_gang la yang mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni mngon 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir/_gang gis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu pa/_/rab 
[\[296b.2\]]'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam la spyod kyang gang la yang mi gnas te/_de gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu 
[\[296b.3\]]phyin pa la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi gnas so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas 
[\[296b.4\]]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/de bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan dang po ni/_bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/
[\[296b.5\]]gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_

[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan bzhi pa ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/

[\[297b.1\]]gyis stong ngo /_/gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe

[\[298a.1\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhog pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag

[\[298b.5\]]gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la
