[\[298b.7\]]de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de mngon par shes pa lnga la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 
[\[299a.2\]]'bras bu 'thob kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_de phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/de dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/de rang byang chub 'thob kyang 
[\[299a.3\]]de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/gsol pa/_ci'i slad du [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyis phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_ngo bo nyid dang ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de gnyis kyi phyir gang la gnas pa 'am/_gang gis 
[\[299a.4\]]gnas pa 'am/_gang gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu de dag la [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de tsam gyis dga' bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de 'di snyam du bdag gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ba ma yin te/_de la 
[\[299a.5\]]gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/bdag gis lan/_cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ba ma yin te/_de la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/bdag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ba ma yin te/_de la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/bdag gis 
[\[299a.6\]]dgra bcom pa nyid thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ba ma yin te/_de la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/bdag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ba ma yin te/_de la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'i/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par 
[\[299a.7\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]zhe na/_bdag gis ni sa dang po nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/_/bdag gis ni sa gnyis pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[299b.2\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/_/bdag gis ni sa gsum pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed 
[\[299b.3\]]do/_/bdag gis ni sa bzhi pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/_/bdag gis ni sa lnga pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[299b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/_/bdag gis ni sa drug pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang 
[\[299b.5\]]ma bskyed do/_/bdag gis ni sa bdun pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/_/bdag gis ni sa brgyad pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[299b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/_/bdag gis ni sa dgu pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang 
[\[299b.7\]]yang ma bskyed do/_/bdag gis ni sa bcu pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs nas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do snyam ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sems g.yeng ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par lus sam/_ngag gam/_yid kyis gang 
[\[300a.2\]]spyod kyang rung ste/_byang chub kyi sems kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/_byang chub kyi sems la gnas nas/_yid g.yeng ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par byang chub kyi lam sgrub bo/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad 
[\[300a.3\]]ma skyes pa lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub kyi lam ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ste/_de ji lta bu 
[\[300a.4\]]zhes byas na/_gang mngon par 'du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa de dag la ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams 
[\[300a.5\]]kyi chos nyid de bzhin du gnas pa ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi 
[\[300a.6\]]gnas nyid ni de bzhin du gnas so/_/de la gang yang chos kyi gnas nyid de lta bu mi shes pa de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam skyed de/_lam des sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[300a.7\]]ldan 'das ci lags/_skyes par gyur pa'i lam gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ma skyes pa'i lam gyis/_byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/_
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na skyes kyang skyes la ma skyes kyang ma skyes pa'i lam gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[300b.2\]]stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na skyes pa yang ma lags/_ma skyes pa yang ma lags pa'i lam gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[300b.3\]]ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub ji ltar thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub ni lam gyis 'thob pa yang ma yin/_lam ma yin pas 'thob pa yang ma 
[\[300b.4\]]yin te/_byang chub nyid kyang lam mo/_/lam nyid kyang byang chub po/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub nyid kyang lam la/_lam nyid kyang byang chub lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[300b.5\]]byang chub snga nas 'thob par 'gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_
[\[300b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_thugs rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis brjod do zhes kyang ci'i slad du bstan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji 
[\[300b.7\]]snyam du sems/_sangs rgyas zhig byang chub thob par byed pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/sangs rgyas ni byang chub thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]mdzad de/_sangs rgyas nyid kyang byang chub bo/_/byang chub 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]nyid kyang sangs rgyas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub snga nas thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa/_
[\[301a.2\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[301a.3\]]par byas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas/_nang stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[301a.4\]]rdzogs par byas/_phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_don dam pa 
[\[301a.5\]]stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_thog ma dang tha ma 
[\[301a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong 
[\[301a.7\]]pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/_dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs 
[\[301b.2\]]par byas/_stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byas/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[301b.3\]]byas/_bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/_tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/_rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas/_
[\[301b.4\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byas/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su rdzogs par byas/_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su 
[\[301b.5\]]rdzogs par byas/_ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas 
[\[301b.6\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/_byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas/_snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_
[\[301b.7\]]rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin 
[\[302a.2\]]gyis dben pa lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[302a.3\]]pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag dang gzhan gyi lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan len dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ste/_de yongs su dag par byas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[302a.4\]]yongs su dag par byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lus kyi gnas ngan len ni gang lags/_ngag gi gnas ngan len ni gang lags/_yid kyi gnas ngan len ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lus 
[\[302a.5\]]kyi las [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gnas ngan len to/_/ngag gi las [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang /_tshig 
[\[302a.6\]]kyal pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gnas ngan len to/_/yid kyi las mi dge ba chags sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang ser 
[\[302a.7\]]sna'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas ngan len to/_/tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas ngan len to/_/sems 'khrug pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas ngan 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]len to/_/le lo'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas ngan len to/_/g.yeng ba'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas ngan len to/_/mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas 
[\[302b.2\]]ngan len to/_/shes rab 'chal pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang dran pa 
[\[302b.3\]]nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas 
[\[302b.4\]]ngan len to/_/dbang po lnga dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/stobs lnga dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[302b.5\]]gnas ngan len to/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/bsam gtan bzhi 
[\[302b.6\]]dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[302b.7\]]gnas ngan len to/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rnam par 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon tu byed pa 'am/_
[\[303a.2\]]de la 'dod pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa 'am/_de la 'dod pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor 
[\[303a.3\]]gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa 'am/_de la 'dod pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed pa 'am/_de la 'dod pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems 
[\[303a.4\]]dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang rang byang chub mngon du byed pa 'am/_de la 'dod pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/tshor ba'i 
[\[303a.5\]]'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/'du byed kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/mig gi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rna 
[\[303a.6\]]ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/sna'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/lce'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/lus kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/yid kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/gzugs kyi 'du shes 
[\[303a.7\]]ni gnas ngan len to/_/sgra'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/dri'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/ro'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/reg gi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/chos kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni 
[\[303b.2\]]gnas ngan len to/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg 
[\[303b.3\]]pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/yid kyi 
[\[303b.4\]]'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/sna'i 'dus te 
[\[303b.5\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/yid kyi 
[\[303b.6\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/sa'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/chu'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rlung 
[\[303b.7\]]gi khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/ma rig pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/'du byed kyi 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/skye mched drug gi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/reg pa'i 
[\[304a.2\]]'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/sred pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/len pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/srid pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/skye ba'i 'du 
[\[304a.3\]]shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rga shi'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/bud [{]myed [,]med [}]kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/skyes pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/
[\[304a.4\]]gzugs kyi khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/dge ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/'jig rten 
[\[304a.5\]]pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len no/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/'dus byas kyi 'du 
[\[304a.6\]]shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/'dus ma byas kyi 'du shes ni gnas ngan len to/_/rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan len dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len te/_byang chub 
[\[304a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gnas ngan len de thams cad rnam par spangs shing bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul te/_de zas 'dod pa la ni 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]zas yongs su gtong ngo /_/skom 'dod pa la ni skom/_gos 'dod pa la ni gos/_bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa/_mal cha 'dod pa la ni mal cha/_me tog 'dod pa la ni me tog_/bdug spos 'dod pa la ni bdug spos/_spos 'dod pa 
[\[304b.2\]]la ni spos/_phreng ba 'dod pa ni phreng ba/_byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa/_gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/_nor dang 'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byu ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul 
[\[304b.3\]]'dod pa la ni nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byu ru dang /_gser dang dngul yongs su gtong ngo /_/mi'i rkyen dang yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du 'dod pa la ni de dag 
[\[304b.4\]]yongs su gtong ste/_gzhan yang mi'i rkyen dang yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ba la yang dag par skul zhing rab tu bkod de/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du 
[\[304b.5\]]byas shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o/_/de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung ngo /_/gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul lo/_/bdag kyang bzod pa sgom mo/_/gzhan yang bzod pa la 
[\[304b.6\]]yang dag par skul lo/_/bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo/_/bdag kyang bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go_/gzhan yang bsam gtan la yang dag par skul lo/_/bdag 
[\[304b.7\]]kyang shes rab sgom mo/_/gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par skul zhing /_gzhog go_/'dul lo/_rab tu 'god do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang zhing /_dkon mchog gsum la 'bul ba byed kyang /_de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[305a.2\]]ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub par gyur cig ces bya bar sems skyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi mchod 
[\[305a.3\]]rten gyi drung du lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dkrol ba byed kyang de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lha rdzas kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]chad par 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya bar sems skyed do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[305a.4\]]gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lha rdzas kyi spos kyis yongs su bkang zhing /_sangs rgyas rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dag la 'bul ba byed kyang de 'di snyam du/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 
[\[305a.5\]]gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rtag tu rgyun mi chad par lha rdzas kyi spos kyi ngad ldang bar gyur cig_/ces bya bar sems skyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha 
[\[305a.6\]]zas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos la 'bul bar byed cing /_de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/_bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/_bdag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[305a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i mnabs stsal ro brgya dang ldan pa mngon par grub par gyur cig ces bya bar sems skyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la lha rdzas kyi byug pa yongs su 'bul bar byed kyang /_de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[305b.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad lha rdzas kyi reg dang ldan par gyur cig ces bya bar sems skyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[305b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du yid kyis bsams pa tsam gyis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_sems can thams cad la 
[\[305b.4\]]dbul zhing /_yongs su gtang bar bya'o snyam du sems te/_de de ltar sems pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/_bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/_bdag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[305b.5\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyang yid kyis bsams pa tsam gyis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang /_sgra dang dri dang ro dang /_reg yongs su grub par gyur cig 
[\[305b.6\]]ces bya bar sems skyed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang bsam gtan dang po 
[\[305b.7\]]la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan dang po la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag 
[\[306a.2\]]go_/sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang byams pa la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams cad kyang byams pa la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang snying rje la mnyam par gzhag go_/
[\[306a.3\]]sems can thams cad kyang snying rje la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang dga' ba la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams cad kyang dga' ba la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang btang snyoms la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams 
[\[306a.4\]]cad kyang btang snyoms la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams cad kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang /_rnam shes mtha' 
[\[306a.5\]]yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams cad kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams cad kyang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med pa'i 
[\[306a.6\]]skye mched la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go_/sems can thams cad kyang 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[306a.7\]]rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams la 'god do/_/
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang dbang po rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang dbang po rnams la 
[\[306b.2\]]'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang stobs rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang stobs rnams la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi 
[\[306b.3\]]yan lag rnams la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'god do/_/ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong 
[\[306b.4\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la 'god do snyam ste/_de de ltar sems pa'i tshe/_de 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[306b.5\]]'dis/_bdag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad/_bsam gtan bzhi dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral zhing /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral ba dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[306b.6\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral bar shog shig_/ces bya bar sems skyed do/_/
[\[306b.7\]]rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed de/_nam bsam pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_de bdag nyid kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa yin/_sems can thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa yin/_sems can de dag thams 
[\[307a.2\]]cad kyang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par byed pa yin te/_de bdag nyid kyi lus kyang mdzes pa yin/_sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/_bsod nams kyis yongs 
[\[307a.3\]]su bzung ba'i phyir/_gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la/_yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs mngon par 'grub ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ltar yongs su dag par byed do/_/ci nas kyang ngan song 
[\[307a.4\]]gsum du gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]srid pa dang /_lta ba rnam par gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]srid pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug du gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]srid pa dang /_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]dang /_skyes par gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[307a.5\]]srid pa dang /_theg pa gnyis su gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]srid pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]par gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]srid pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin par gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]srid pa dang /_bdag dang 
[\[307a.6\]]bdag gir bya bar gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]srid pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas ldang bar gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]srid pa dang /_phyin ci log tu gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]srid pa dang /_'bras bur gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]srid pa dang /_
[\[307a.7\]]gzhan du na sems can de dag 'dod pa bzhin du shing rlung gis btab pa 'am/_phyi nang gi dngos po dag las 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sgra dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sgra dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skye/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'gag pa'i sgra dang /_chos

[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]bdag tu lta bar bying ba nas lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi bar du bying ba/_rtag pa 'am/_chad pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/_log par 'dzin pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa la ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[308a.2\]]sangs rgyas yin par 'du shes pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa la ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par 'du shes pa de dag ni/_chos ma yin pa la yang chos so zhes zer/_chos la yang chos ma yin no zhes zer te/_
[\[308a.3\]]de dag chos la spong bar 'gyur te/_de ltar chos spangs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu/_shi nas ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_de lta bu dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bla na 
[\[308a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing 'khor ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sems can de dag/_sdig par lta ba'i rnam pa de dag las rnam par 'grol te/_de ltar rnam par bkrol nas nges pa'i phung por rab tu 'god 
[\[308a.5\]]de/_der bkod pa'i rnams phyin cad ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin te/_de ltar yongs su sbyangs pas sems can rnams 
[\[308a.6\]]'jig rten pa'i chos sam/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos sam/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos sam/_zag pa med pa'i chos sam/_'dus byas kyi chos sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang gnas par mi 'gyur te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[308a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du nges par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u drug cu bdun no//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges zhes bgyi ba'am/_ma nges zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa ste/_ma nges pa ma yin no/_
[\[308b.2\]]gsol pa/_nyan thos kyi phung po 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/_phung po gang du nges pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi phung 
[\[308b.3\]]por nges pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi phung por nges pa ma yin gyi/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sangs rgyas kyi phung por nges pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[308b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po nges zhes bgyi 'am/_'on tam phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa nges zhes bgyi 'am/_'on tam srid pa tha ma pa nges zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[308b.5\]]po ni nges pa'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa ni nges pa'o/_/srid pa gcig gis thog pa ni nges pa'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma 
[\[308b.6\]]yin te/_rab 'byor nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngan song du mi skye'o/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_brgyad pa'am/_rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/_dgra bcom pa 'am/_
[\[308b.7\]]rang sangs rgyas ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_gang sems dang po bskyed pa 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa gtong ba dang /_tshul khrims srung ba dang /_bzod pa sgrub pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab sgom pa dang /_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang 
[\[309a.2\]]ba'i don du gnas pa de ni/_ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lha tshe ring por skye ba'i gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang na dge ba'i chos rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod pa de lta bur skye ba'i gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/glen pa dang /_lkugs par 'gyur ba'i yul du/_skye ba'i 
[\[309a.3\]]gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mtha' 'khob kyi kla klo dang /_mi srun zhing 'khor bzhi rgyur [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yul du skye ba'i gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/log par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba'i gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra [{]myi [,]mi [}]grag pa dang /_chos kyi sgra [{]myi [,]mi [}]grag pa dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[309a.4\]]gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bur skye ba'i gnas med do/_/bya ba ma yin pa'i lta bar ltung ba'i gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[309a.5\]]byang chub tu lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod ces bya ba'i gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i dge ba'i 
[\[309a.6\]]rtsa ba dang ldan zhing /_tshul dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dra ba'i gnas su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba lags na/_gang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang byol song gi rgyud du skyes pa'i rabs bstan na/_de'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang du mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[309a.7\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i las kyis byol song gi rgyud du skye ba ma yin gyi/_lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing /_sems can rnams kyi don 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]du yongs su 'dzin cing /_rab 'byor de ltar thabs mkhas pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byol song gi skye gnas su skyes shing /_de la la la zhig gsod du 'ongs kyang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bzod pas bdag yongs su gtong zhing /_sems can de 
[\[309b.2\]]dag la gnod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa dag dgra bcom pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas dag la yod dam/_rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs des kyang /_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi phyir/_bla na 
[\[309b.3\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_byol song gi skye gnas su skye yang /_byol song gi skye gnas kyi rgyud kyi nyes pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]gos par rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i 
[\[309b.4\]]chos gang la gnas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ba'i dge 
[\[309b.5\]]ba'i chos de lta bu gang zhig yod de/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_snying 
[\[309b.6\]]po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos gang yang yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dge ba'i chos gang yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de 
[\[309b.7\]]lta bu med de de ni gnas ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la bslab par bya ste/_de 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]la bslabs na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob bo/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyang yongs su spong ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[310a.2\]]dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos dkar po zag pa ma mchis pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ngan song ngam/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin 
[\[310a.3\]]nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lags/_bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'phags shing zag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas byol 
[\[310a.4\]]song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags mngon par sprul pa mdzad cing /_de mngon par sprul nas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad pa de lta bu yod dam [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[310a.5\]]des/_de bzhin gshegs pa byol song gi skye gnas par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 
[\[310a.6\]]'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta bu ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing 
[\[310a.7\]]de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/_lus de dag gis sems can rnams ci rigs ci tshul du yongs su smin par byed do/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dgra bcom pas sprul pa mngon par sprul na/_sprul pa des dgra bcom pa'i las byas shing /_las des gzhan gyi 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]dge ba skye bar 'gyur ba yod dam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/_mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa 
[\[310b.2\]]yang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/_ci rigs ci tshul du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/de lta bu'i lus des sdug bsngal du'ang mi 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang nyams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]myong ngo /_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[310b.3\]]sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma las glang po'i gzugs sam/_rta'i gzugs sam/_glang gi gzugs shig bstan tam/_gzhan yang sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs bstan na/_de dag glang po'i gzugs sam/_rta'i gzugs sam glang gi gzugs sam/_srog chags kyi rigs 
[\[310b.4\]]gzhan dag tu 'ang 'gyur ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa yang ched 
[\[310b.5\]]du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/_lus de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don byad de/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor bar 'gyur ba gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[310b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes zag pa ma mchis pa de lta bu dang ldan zhing /_lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang /_de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa ni/_thabs shin tu mkhas pa ste/_de ni ngo 
[\[310b.7\]]mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dkar po gang dang gang la gnas shing /_de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa bgyid kyang /_las de lta bus [{]myi [,]mi [}]gos par spyod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod de/_thabs mkhas pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[311a.2\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang des de la gang yang reg par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang reg par byed pa dang /_gang gis reg par bya ba 
[\[311a.3\]]dang /_gang la reg par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gsum po de dag thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos gsum po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas/_stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la reg par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/stong pa 
[\[311a.4\]]nyid kyis chos gang la yang reg par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid kyang reg par bya ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid de/_de la gnas shing byang chub 
[\[311a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gzhan la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas kyi/_
[\[311a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig la gnas shing /_rnam pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su ma chud pa 
[\[311a.7\]]de lta bu yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su chos thams cad 'du ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid la ni chos gang 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]yang khongs su chud pa 'am/_khongs su ma chud pa zhes bgyi ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]stong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das stong ngo /_/bcom 
[\[311b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ste chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong na/_thams cad stong pa nyid du ma 'dus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[311b.3\]]rab 'byor rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod par rig par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom 
[\[311b.4\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos thams cad la gnas te/_mngon par shes pa gang la gnas shing /_phyogs bcu'i 
[\[311b.5\]]phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mchi ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa 
[\[311b.6\]]dang /_chos nyan cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di 
[\[311b.7\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo /_/gzhan du 
[\[312a.2\]]na [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brdar gdags pa nye bar bzung zhing bstan pa ma gtogs te/_gdags pa kun kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/gal te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]stong la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis 
[\[312a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]stong ste/_gdags pa'i rgyud de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]stong pa zhig yin na ni/_nyi tshe ba'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/_de yang stong pa nyid tshe ba ma yin no/_/de'i phyir chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ste/_de nyid kyi phyir byang chub 
[\[312a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub ste/_mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing /_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_
[\[312a.5\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dang /_pha rol kyi sems shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas dran pa dang /_'chi 'pho shes pa mngon par sgrub ste/_mngon par shes pa ma bskyed par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[312a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'dus te/_mngon par shes pa de dag 
[\[312a.7\]]las byang chub yongs su btsal bar bya'o/_/de tshol ba'i tshe/_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pas bdag nyid kyis kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad mthong /_gzhan yang dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor te/_dge ba'i chos de dag 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/_stong pa nyid ni gang la mngon par zhen cing /_ro myong bar byed par mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_stong pa 
[\[312b.2\]]nyid ni ro myong bar byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu gcig pa/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]
[\[312b.3\]]mngon par sgrub ste/_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]des chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ste/_de chos de dag la gnas shing las mngon par sgrub bo/_/las mngon par sgrub pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sems can nam sems can dag tu 
[\[312b.4\]]gdags par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub ste/_mngon par shes pa de dag gis mngon par shes par bya ba'i chos 
[\[312b.5\]]gang ji snyed pa de dag byed do/_/de lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pa de nyid kyis/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/_de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /_sbyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod 
[\[312b.6\]]pa 'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang 
[\[312b.7\]]chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[313a.2\]]rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_
[\[313a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /_sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/_de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_sbyin pa byin cig_/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_phongs 
[\[313a.4\]]pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/_de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/_bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig_/phongs pas zil kyis non cing /_nying sha nyid gis 
[\[313a.5\]]zos te/_ngan song gsum las [{]myi [,]mi [}]thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan 
[\[313a.6\]]pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyod ngan song 
[\[313a.7\]]gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyod kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston te/_
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig_/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la/_dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de lta 
[\[313b.2\]]bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/_de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam 
[\[313b.3\]]gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[313b.4\]]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par 
[\[313b.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de 
[\[313b.6\]]dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_/kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin 
[\[313b.7\]]te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni 
[\[314a.2\]]bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_de ltar shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_/sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 
[\[314a.3\]]'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la 
[\[314a.4\]]sbyor ro/_/gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/_/lam ngan par zhugs pa la spyod pa dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/_nyan thos kyi lam mam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_sangs 
[\[314a.5\]]rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing /_de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_stong pa nyid la 
[\[314a.6\]]mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes chos ston te/_rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/_/de lha'i 
[\[314a.7\]{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/_de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /_sbyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa 'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags 
[\[314b.2\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_
