[\[314b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /_sems can de dag gi bya ba 
[\[314b.5\]]byed de/_de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_sbyin pa byin cig phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/_de ltar khyed kyis 
[\[314b.6\]]sbyin pa byin la/_bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig_/phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/_ngan song gsum las [{]myi [,]mi [}]thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan 
[\[314b.7\]]pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_
[\[315a.2\]]de'i phyir khyod kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can phan tshun du gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_de ltar khyed gcig 
[\[315a.3\]]la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig_/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de lta bas na khyed phan tshun du sems 'khrug par gyur na/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 
[\[315a.4\]]'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/_de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can le lo can gang ji snyed 
[\[315a.5\]]ba de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas 
[\[315a.6\]]sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/
[\[315a.7\]]phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i 
[\[315b.2\]]sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal 
[\[315b.3\]]ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin 
[\[315b.4\]]te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod 
[\[315b.5\]]pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/_/gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/_/lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/_nyan thos kyi lam mam/_
[\[315b.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par 
[\[315b.7\]]zhen par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /_
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/_/de lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pa de nyid kyis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/_de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /_sbyin pa 'am/_
[\[316a.2\]]tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa 'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_
[\[316a.3\]]stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad 
[\[316a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[316a.5\]]rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_
[\[316a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /_sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/_de yang sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_sbyin pa byin cig_/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_
[\[316a.7\]]phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/_de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig_/phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]gis zos te/_ngan song gsum las [{]myi [,]mi [}]thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan 
[\[316b.2\]]pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum 
[\[316b.3\]]du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems 
[\[316b.4\]]can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig_/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de lta bas na khyed phan 
[\[316b.5\]]tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/_de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang 
[\[316b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_
[\[316b.7\]]gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de 
[\[317a.2\]]dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar 
[\[317a.3\]]khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos 
[\[317a.4\]]ston to/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci 
[\[317a.5\]]smos te/_gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[317a.6\]]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/_/gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa 
[\[317a.7\]]de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro/_/lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyad ba de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/_nyan thos kyi lam mam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]du chos ston te/_khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni/_mngon par zhen par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes chos ston to/_/
[\[317b.2\]]rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/_/de lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 
[\[317b.3\]]'das pa de nyid kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/_de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /_sbyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa 'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_
[\[317b.4\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad 
[\[317b.5\]]pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'am/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_
[\[317b.6\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 
[\[317b.7\]]sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /_sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/_de la sems can ser sna can 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_sbyin pa byin cig_/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/_de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa 
[\[318a.2\]]byin la/_bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig_/phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/_ngan song gsum las [{]myi [,]mi [}]thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa 
[\[318a.3\]]can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin 
[\[318a.4\]]pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyod 
[\[318a.5\]]kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_de ltar khyed 
[\[318a.6\]]gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig_/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la/_dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de lta bas na khyed phan tshun du sems 'khrug par gyur na/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/_byol 
[\[318a.7\]]song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/_de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 
[\[318b.2\]]'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' 
[\[318b.3\]]tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang sems 
[\[318b.4\]]g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci 
[\[318b.5\]]smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye 
[\[318b.6\]]skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi 
[\[318b.7\]]skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]pa de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/_/gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro/_/lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed 
[\[319a.2\]]pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/_nyan thos kyi lam mam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid 
[\[319a.3\]]kyis stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[319a.4\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/_/de lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pa de nyid kyis/_byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[319a.5\]]thams cad mthong ste/_de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /_sbyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa 'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par 
[\[319a.6\]]spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[319a.7\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_mthar 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_
[\[319b.2\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/_de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_sbyin 
[\[319b.3\]]pa byin cig_/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/_de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig_
[\[319b.4\]]phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/_ngan song gsum las [{]myi [,]mi [}]thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims 
[\[319b.5\]]ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_
[\[319b.6\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs 
[\[319b.7\]]kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can phan tshun du gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig_/sems 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/_
[\[320a.2\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/_de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 
[\[320a.3\]]'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas 
[\[320a.4\]]sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang 
[\[320a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam 
[\[320a.6\]]par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i 
[\[320a.7\]]phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_
[\[320b.2\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/
[\[320b.3\]]zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/_/gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro/_/lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[320b.4\]]lam mam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing /_de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos 
[\[320b.5\]]rnams la ni mngon par zhen par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes 
[\[320b.6\]]pa rnams la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/_/de lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /_
[\[320b.7\]]sbyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa 'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[321a.2\]]smon pa med pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[321a.3\]]par 'jug pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_
[\[321a.4\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /_sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/_de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du 
[\[321a.5\]]chos ston te/_sbyin pa byin cig/_/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/_de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/_bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/
[\[321a.6\]]gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig_/phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/_ngan song gsum las [{]myi [,]mi [}]thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad 
[\[321a.7\]]du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_sems can 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul 
[\[321b.2\]]khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_de ltar khyed gcig la 
[\[321b.3\]]gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig_/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/_byol song gi skye 
[\[321b.4\]]gnas su skye ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/_de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can le lo 
[\[321b.5\]]can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/_
[\[321b.6\]]byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam 
[\[321b.7\]]gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par 
[\[322a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji 
[\[322a.3\]]snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/_shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par 
[\[322a.4\]]smyin pa ni/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'tshal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re 
[\[322a.5\]]zhes chos ston to/_/'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/_/gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung 
[\[322a.6\]]ba la sbyor ro/_/lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/_nyan thos kyi lam mam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing /_de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_khyed chos 
[\[322a.7\]]gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/_/de lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pa de nyid kyis/_lho 
[\[322b.2\]]nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/_de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /_sbyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa 'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_dran 
[\[322b.3\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_
[\[322b.4\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_ting nge 
[\[322b.5\]]'dzin rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[322b.6\]]rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/_de la sems 
[\[322b.7\]]can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_sbyin pa byin cig_/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/_de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig_/phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/_ngan song gsum las [{]myi [,]mi [}]thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can tshul 
[\[323a.2\]]khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_tshul khrims ngan 
[\[323a.3\]]pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci 
[\[323a.4\]]smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di 
[\[323a.5\]]skad du chos ston te/_de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig_/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/_sems can dmyal 
[\[323a.6\]]bar skye ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/_de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston 
[\[323a.7\]]to/_/sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis 
[\[323b.2\]]le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal 
[\[323b.3\]]ba ste/_gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan 
[\[323b.4\]]gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du 
[\[323b.5\]]chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_sems can 
[\[323b.6\]]dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/'dod 
[\[323b.7\]]chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/_/gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/_/lam ngan 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/_nyan thos kyi lam mam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing /_de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_khyed chos gang 
[\[324a.2\]]la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[324a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/_/de lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pa de nyid kyis/_nub byang 
[\[324a.4\]]gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/_de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /_sbyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa 'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_dran 
[\[324a.5\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_
[\[324a.6\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_
[\[324a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]'dres pa rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /_sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/_de 
[\[324b.2\]]la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_sbyin pa byin cig_/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa 
[\[324b.3\]]byin la/_bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig_/phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/_ngan song gsum las [{]myi [,]mi [}]thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa 
[\[324b.4\]]can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam 
[\[324b.5\]]par smyin pa ni/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_
[\[324b.6\]]de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du 
[\[324b.7\]]chos ston te/_de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig_/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/_sems can 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]dmyal bar skye ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/_de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod 
[\[325a.2\]]pa can du gyur ta re chos ston to/_/sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le 
[\[325a.3\]]lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos 
[\[325a.4\]]kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes 
[\[325a.5\]]bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_
[\[325a.6\]]bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can shes 
[\[325a.7\]]rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_shes rab 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]'chal ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 
[\[325b.2\]]'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/_/gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag 
[\[325b.3\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro/_/lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/_nyan thos kyi lam mam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing /_de dag la 
[\[325b.4\]]'di skad du chos ston te/_khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes 
[\[325b.5\]]chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/_/de lha'i 
[\[325b.6\]{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pa de nyid kyis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/_de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /_sbyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa 'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam 
[\[325b.7\]]gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs 
[\[326a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams 
[\[326a.3\]]sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 
[\[326a.4\]]kyis sems can gyi don byed cing /_sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/_de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_sbyin pa byin cig_/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya 
[\[326a.5\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/_de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/_bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig_/phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/_ngan song gsum 
[\[326a.6\]]las [{]myi [,]mi [}]thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi 
[\[326a.7\]]don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos te/_de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes 
[\[326b.2\]]chos ston to/_/sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig_/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang 
[\[326b.3\]]yang skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/_de bas 
[\[326b.4\]]na khyed gyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag le 
[\[326b.5\]]lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin 
[\[326b.6\]]te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du 
[\[326b.7\]]gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_
[\[327a.2\]]de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye 
[\[327a.3\]]skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_
[\[327a.4\]]byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/'dod chags 
[\[327a.5\]]kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/_/gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro/_/
[\[327a.6\]]lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/_nyan thos kyi lam mam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_khyed chos gang la mngon 
[\[327a.7\]]par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 
[\[327b.2\]]stong phrag brgya pa/_/bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_/de lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pa de nyid kyis/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /_sbyin pa 'am/_
[\[327b.3\]]tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa 'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab bam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams 
[\[327b.4\]]sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams 
[\[327b.5\]]sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_de 
[\[327b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_
[\[327b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /_sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/_de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_sbyin 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]pa byin cig_/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/_de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig_/gzhan yang 
[\[328a.2\]]bde bar gyis shig_/phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/_ngan song gsum las [{]myi [,]mi [}]thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_
[\[328a.3\]]kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_
[\[328a.4\]]byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i 
[\[328a.5\]]sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_de ltar khyed gcig 
[\[328a.6\]]la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig_/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/_byol song 
[\[328a.7\]]gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/_de bas na khyod kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_sems 
[\[328b.2\]]can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyod kyis 
[\[328b.3\]]le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal 
[\[328b.4\]]ba ste/_gang sems g.yeng pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/_bdag cag kyang gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan 
[\[328b.5\]]gdan par lta ci smos kyis/_de'i phyir khyod kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di 
[\[328b.6\]]skad du chos ston te/_kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/_gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/_
[\[328b.7\]]sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/_de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]chos ston to/_/'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa la sbyor ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams pa la sbyor ro/_/gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de 
[\[329a.2\]]dag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/_/lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/_nyan thos kyi lam mam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/_sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 
[\[329a.3\]]'di skad du chos ston te/_khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do 
[\[329a.4\]]zhes chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/_/rab 
[\[329a.5\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_mngon par shes pa rnams la ma gnas par sems can rnams la chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du gzud par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus 
[\[329a.6\]]so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_bya 'dab ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pas ni/_nam mkha' la 'gro bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma brten par 
[\[329a.7\]]sems can rnams la chos bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/_
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]de mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag gis/_sems can rnams kyi don ci bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do/_/des lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/_de dag tu 
[\[329b.2\]]sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /_sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/_de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_
[\[329b.3\]]tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/
[\[329b.4\]]des lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/_de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can 
[\[329b.5\]]de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/_de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_
[\[329b.6\]]shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/des lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/_gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/_de dag tu 
[\[329b.7\]]sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /_sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/_de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_
[\[330a.2\]]'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/des lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/_de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 
[\[330a.3\]]'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /_sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/_de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam 
[\[330a.4\]]mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/des lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[330a.5\]]khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/_de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /_sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du 
[\[330a.6\]]chud par byas nas/_de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags 
[\[330a.7\]]pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/des lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/_de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /_sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/_de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_
[\[330b.2\]]bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/des lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]
[\[330b.3\]]gis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/_de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /_
[\[330b.4\]]sems can de dag gis sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/_de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan 
[\[330b.5\]]gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/des lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi 
[\[330b.6\]]bye ma snyed mthong ste/_de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /_sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/_
[\[330b.7\]]de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/des lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/_de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig 
[\[331a.2\]]skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /_sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/_de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi 
[\[331a.3\]]gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/des 
[\[331a.4\]]lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/_de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /_sems 
[\[331a.5\]]can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/_de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab 
[\[331a.6\]]kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis 'di lta ste/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis ka'i sgra yang thos te/_de shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 
[\[331a.7\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/_thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/_de bzhin nyid du sems 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]can rnams la chos ston to/_/sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags 
[\[331b.2\]]pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna 
[\[331b.3\]]bas nyan te/_thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/_de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_
[\[331b.4\]]brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 
[\[331b.5\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/_thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/_de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams 
[\[331b.6\]]la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i 
[\[331b.7\]]gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/_
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/_de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_
[\[332a.2\]]brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten 
[\[332a.3\]]gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/_thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/_de bzhin nyid du 
[\[332a.4\]]sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags 
[\[332a.5\]]pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa 
[\[332a.6\]]de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/_thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/_de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod 
[\[332a.7\]]pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de lho nub kyi phyogs 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gis chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/_thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid 
[\[332b.2\]]du bzung nas/_de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes 
[\[332b.3\]]rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[332b.4\]]'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/_thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/_de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_
[\[332b.5\]]tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi 
[\[332b.6\]]bar du chos ston to/_/de 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/_thos nas kyang de bzhin 
[\[332b.7\]]nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/_de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 
[\[333a.2\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/_thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/_/de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/_de bzhin nyid du sems 
[\[333a.3\]]can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_
[\[333a.4\]]'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can 
[\[333a.5\]]rnams kyi sems shes par byas shing /_de dag la de bzhin nyid du chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi 
[\[333a.6\]]gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de bdag gam gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te/_/sngon gyi gnas rjes 
[\[333a.7\]]su dran pa'i shes pa des/_/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byung ngo zhes bya bar yang shes te/_sems can 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mos pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la yang dag pa nyid du chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam 
[\[333b.2\]]gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[333b.3\]]snyed dag tu song zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed de/_bsnyen bkur byas nas/_mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i gtam mam/_
[\[333b.4\]]tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung ba'i gtam 
[\[333b.5\]]gyi bar du chos ston to/_/de zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin tu rig pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/_sbyin pa'i 
[\[333b.6\]]gtam mam/_tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_bzod pa'i gtam mam/_brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/_bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/_shes rab kyi gtam mam/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/_'byung 
[\[333b.7\]]ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/_de mngon 
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]par shes pa shin tu 'dris pa de dag gis lus ci dang ci lta bu yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su gzung zhing mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don byed cing bde ba 'am 
[\[334a.2\]]sdug bsngal ba de dag gis gos par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i skyes bu ni/_dgos pa thams cad byed kyang bde ba 'am/_sdug bsngal ba des gos par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[334a.3\]]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[334a.4\]]dag tu mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston kyang bde ba 'am/_sdug bsngal ba des phrogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[334a.5\]]de ltar mngon par shes pas/_rnam par brtse bar bya ste/_ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba de ltar brtse bar bya ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[334a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/_sems can yongs su smyin par ma byas par/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[334a.7\]]rgya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lam gyi yan lag dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor gyis 
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[334b.2\]]bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi yan lag de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi yan lag go_/gsol 
[\[334b.3\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das lam gyi yan lag gang gis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags/_bcom 
[\[334b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 
[\[334b.5\]]'di ni sbyin pa'o/_/'di la yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/bdag gis sbyin par bya'o zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 
[\[334b.6\]]'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_de tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis 
[\[334b.7\]]stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni tshul khrims so/_/bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo /_/'di'i don du tshul khrims bsrung ngo /_/zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las 
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_
[\[335a.2\]]bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bzod pa'o/_/bdag gis bzod pa bsgom mo/_/'di'i don du bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/_/zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[335a.3\]]phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[335a.4\]]kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni brtson 'grus so/_/bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam mo/_/'di'i don du brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/_/zhes gsum po 
[\[335a.5\]]de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_
[\[335a.6\]]dge ba'i chos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_de bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di ni bsam gtan no/_/bdag gis bsam gtan 
[\[335a.7\]]la mnyam par gzhag go_/'di'i don du bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing de shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis 
[\[335b.2\]]stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shes rab bo/_/bdag gis ni shes rab bsgom mo/_'di'i don du shes rab bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las 
[\[335b.3\]]sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/_
[\[335b.4\]]ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_nang stong pa nyid gang gis 
[\[335b.5\]]bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos phyi stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_phyi stong pa 
[\[335b.6\]]nyid sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_phyi stong pa nyid gang 
[\[335b.7\]]gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes 
[\[336a.2\]]gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_phyi nang stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge 
[\[336a.3\]]ba'i chos stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/
[\[336a.4\]]'di'i don du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/_/zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i 
[\[336a.5\]]chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos chen po stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do/_/
[\[336a.6\]]bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du chen po stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_chen po stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 
[\[336a.7\]]'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong 
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_don dam pa stong pa nyid gang gis 
[\[336b.2\]]bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_
[\[336b.3\]]'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum 
[\[336b.4\]]po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_'dus byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i 
[\[336b.5\]]chos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang /_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 
[\[336b.6\]]bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi 
[\[336b.7\]]yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid 
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po 
[\[337a.2\]]de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid/_gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_
[\[337a.3\]]dge ba'i chos thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang /_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/bdag 
[\[337a.4\]]gis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las 
[\[337a.5\]]sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[337a.6\]]bsgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la 
[\[337a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos rang 
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod kyang /_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i 
[\[337b.2\]]don du rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/
[\[337b.3\]]sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos thams cad

[\[337b.5\]]bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod 
[\[337b.6\]]kyang /_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par 
[\[337b.7\]]bya'o/_/'di'i don du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang /_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa

[\[338a.4\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom
