[\[338a.6\]]dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di ni ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[338a.7\]]pa nyid do/_/bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

[\[338b.3\]]pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang 
[\[338b.4\]]po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid

[\[338b.6\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[338b.7\]]po'i dge ba'i chos yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so/_/bdag gis yang dag par 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]spong ba rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_yang dag par spong ba gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang 
[\[339a.2\]]sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod kyang /_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_rdzu 
[\[339a.3\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/_/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 
[\[339a.4\]]bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar 
[\[339a.5\]]bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dbang po lnga la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_dbang po lnga sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni dbang po rnams so/_/

[\[339a.7\]]yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos stobs lnga la spyod kyang /_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_stobs rnams sgom pa'i tshe/_
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni stobs rnams so/_/bdag gis stobs rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du stobs rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_stobs gang gis 
[\[339b.2\]]bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos byang

[\[339b.5\]]'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod kyang /_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing 
[\[339b.6\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/_/

[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod kyang

[\[340b\]]

[\[340b.5\]]ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod kyang /_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_rnam 
[\[340b.6\]]par thar pa brgyad sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/_/bdag gis rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom mo zhes gsum

[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom 
[\[341a.2\]]pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/bdag gis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du 
[\[341a.3\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di 
[\[341a.4\]]ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[341a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[341a.6\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/bdag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[341a.7\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang 
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_mngon 
[\[341b.2\]]par shes pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom 
[\[341b.3\]]mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_mngon par shes pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub 
[\[341b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/bdag 
[\[341b.5\]]gis ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_ting nge 'dzin gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi 
[\[341b.6\]]yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/_
[\[341b.7\]]ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]gzungs kyi sgo gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[342a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[342a.3\]]pa'i stobs rnams so/_/bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[342a.4\]]gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[342a.5\]]'jigs pa rnams la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams so/_/bdag gis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/
[\[342a.6\]]'di'i don du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems 
[\[342a.7\]]dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod kyang /_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo 
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/_/bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po 
[\[342b.2\]]de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_so so yang dag par rig pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub 
[\[342b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos snying rje chen po la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_snying rje chen po sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di ni snying rje chen po'o/_/bdag gis snying rje chen po bsgom 
[\[342b.4\]]par bya'o/_/'di'i don du snying rje chen po bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_snying rje chen po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/
[\[342b.5\]]sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog cing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]
[\[342b.6\]]brgyad sgom pa'i tshe/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/'di'i don du sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[342b.7\]]chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /_gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/_/
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]rab 'byor dge ba'i chos de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/_lam des 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar gyi byang chub 
[\[343a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ded de/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur pa dang /_rgal ba dang /_rgal bar 'gyur ba ste/_lam de yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_byang chub 
[\[343a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_sems can rnams kyi 
[\[343a.4\]]don byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u drug cu brgyad do//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[343a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos lags na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang 'di skad du gal te chos de dag byang chub sems 
[\[343a.6\]]dpa'i chos yin na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang chos de dag nyid rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar zad de/_de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[343a.7\]]nyid thob nas/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spong ngo /_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[343b.2\]]chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyad par de yod do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_zhugs pa yang gzhan la/_'bras bu la gnas pa yang gzhan te/_de

[\[343b.5\]]rgyas kyi khyad par ro/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos de dag la ni 'di ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o/_/
[\[343b.6\]]'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/_/'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni lha'o/_/'di ni myi'o/_/'di ni rigs kyi sa'o/_/'di ni brgyad pa'o/_/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/

[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]khyad par dang /_rnam par dbye bar ji ltar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang zag de dag [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis/_las ji ltar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis

[\[344a.6\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/_nang stong pa nyid la spyad/_phyi stong pa nyid la spyad/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad/_stong pa nyid stong pa

[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]nyid la spyad/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid

[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_don byas nas ci nas kyang phyis chud ma zos shing /_rgyud lnga'i 'khor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ba de ltar don byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom

[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]gal te sems can de dag 'di ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]ldan pa rnams/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mngon par 'du byed pa de dag rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[347a.2\]]tu phyin par dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par byas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[347a.3\]]rgyas nas/_rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel to//_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_/
[\[347a.4\]]rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[347a.5\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[347a.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam sems can 
[\[347a.7\]]rnams la ston to/_/'chad do/_/'jog go_/'god do/_/'grel to/_/rnam par 'grel to/_/gsal bar byed do/_/yang dag par rjod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'dir dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs 
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]gang ji snyed pa gang gis dkon mchog gsum rnam par 'god pa de thams cad yongs su 'dus te/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du byung bas/_
[\[347b.2\]]sems can rnams lam rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol lo/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te sdug bsngal gyis 
[\[347b.3\]]mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_kun 'byung ba 'tshal bas/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te kun 'byung bas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan 
[\[347b.4\]]las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te sdug bsngal 'gog pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_lam 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te lam gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_bcom 
[\[347b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' ste/_sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no/_/kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' ste/_kun 'byung 
[\[347b.6\]]bas kyang ma yin no/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes bas/_yongs su mya ngan las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' ste/_sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no/_/lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' ste/_lam gyis kyang 
[\[347b.7\]]ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'da' bar ngas gsungs te/_sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin no/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]gyis kyang ma yin no/_/kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin no/_/kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma 
[\[348a.2\]]yin/_sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no/_/lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/_lam gyis kyang ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis/_sdug 
[\[348a.3\]]bsngal 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/_kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis/_kun 'byung ba 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/_'gog pa yang ma mchis/_'gog pa 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/_lam yang ma mchis/_lam 'tshal ba 
[\[348a.4\]]yang ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi [(]bde [,]ba de [)]gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 
[\[348a.5\]]dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin 
[\[348a.6\]]gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_de bzhin gnas pa'i dbyings/_chos kyi dbyings [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'grib par 'dug pa ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[348a.7\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_bden pa khong du chud par ji ltar bya ba bzhin du/_bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod do/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/_bden pa rtogs pa'i don du spyod pa lags/_ji ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs shing 'tshal te/_khong du chud nas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung zhing byang 
[\[348b.2\]]chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos 
[\[348b.3\]]de dag ci nas kyang chos gang yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ltar mthong ste/_chos thams cad ma [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas bden par gtogs pa 'am/_bden par ma gtogs pa'i chos thams cad stong par mthong ste/_des de ltar mthong 
[\[348b.4\]]bas skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyis la gnas par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de rigs kyis la gnas par gyur nas/_spyi bor ltung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de la nyan thos 
[\[348b.5\]]kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i spyi bor ltung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis de la gnas shing /_bsam gtan bzhi sgrub po/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi sgrub po/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[348b.6\]]snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub bo/_/de lhag mthong gis de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed de/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par byed do/_/de sdug bsngal yongs su shes kyang sdug 
[\[348b.7\]]bsngal la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/kun 'byung ba rab tu spangs kyang /_kun 'byung ba la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/'gog pa mngon du byed kyang 'gog pa la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]lam sgom yang lam la dmigs pa'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/gzhan du na byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[349a.2\]]ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stong pa nyid do/_/gsol pa/_stong pa nyid gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[349a.3\]]stsal pa/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de/_rnam pa de lta bu'i lhag mthong gis chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar lta ste/_ngo bo nyid gang la gnas shing byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de lta bu'i 
[\[349a.4\]]ngo bo nyid chos gang la yang ngo bo nyid yod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni byang chub ste/_de ni sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad/_rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/_dgra bcom pas ma byas/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong bas ma byas/_lan 
[\[349a.5\]]cig phyir 'ong bas ma byas/_rgyun tu zhugs pas ma byas/_de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma byas/_gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma byas te/_gzhan du na yang 
[\[349a.6\]]dag pa ji lta ba de sems can rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/
[\[349a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u drug cu dgu'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis te/_de dag sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma mdzad/_rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dgra bcom pas kyang ma bgyis/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong bas kyang ma bgyis/_lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[349b.2\]]bas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyun tu zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/_de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/_gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma bgyis na/_chos de dag la 
[\[349b.3\]]'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o/_/'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/_/'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di dag ni lha'o/_/'di dag ni myi'o/_/las 'dis ni sems can dmyal ba pa dang /_
[\[349b.4\]]byol song gi skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten par 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni myir 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[349b.5\]]las 'dis ni mtshe ma'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni dga' ldan gyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni 'phrul dga'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis 
[\[349b.6\]]ni tshangs ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni tshangs chen gyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni snang ba'i 
[\[349b.7\]]lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni chung snang gi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni kun snang dang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni dge ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]'dis ni chung dge'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni dge rgyas kyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni 
[\[350a.2\]]chung che'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni 'bras bu che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[350a.3\]]las 'dis ni shin tu mthong ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni gya nom snang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni 'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[350a.4\]]las 'dis ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 'di ni 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/_/las 
[\[350a.5\]]'dis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni dgra bcom pa nyid du 'gyur 
[\[350a.6\]]ro/_/las 'dis ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro/_/las 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro 
[\[350a.7\]]zhes bgyi bar tha dad du dbye ba 'am/_rnam par dgod pa yang ji ltar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis te/_bgyi ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/_byol song 
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/_myir skye ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dga' ldan gyi 
[\[350b.2\]]lhar skye ba 'am/_'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs chen gyi 
[\[350b.3\]]lhar skye ba 'am/_snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[350b.4\]]dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[350b.5\]]gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye 
[\[350b.6\]]mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 
[\[350b.7\]]'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]lam la spyod par 'gyur ba 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_thob bar gyur nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu gang yang 
[\[351a.2\]]ma mchis so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/_rab 'byor 
[\[351a.3\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la ni las kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_bya ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'bras bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo/_/'phags pa'i chos la [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pa rnams kyis chos rnams dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes te/_
[\[351a.4\]]phyin ci log las byung ba'i sems kyis las sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pas/_de dag gi lus rnam pa de bzhin du mngon par 'grub ste/_sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 
[\[351a.5\]]'jig rten nam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'am/_mtshe ma'i lha 'am/_dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/_'phrul dga'i lha 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha 'am/_
[\[351a.6\]]tshangs ris kyi lha 'am/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha 'am/_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha 'am/_tshangs chen gyi lha 'am/_snang ba'i lha 'am/_chung snang gi lha 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha 'am/_kun snang dang 
[\[351a.7\]]ba'i lha 'am/_dge ba'i lha 'am/_chung dge'i lha 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha 'am/_dge rgyas kyi lha 'am/_che ba'i lha 'am/_chung che'i lha 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha 'am/_'bras bu che ba'i lha 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]che ba'i lha 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha 'am/_shin tu mthong ba'i lha 'am/_gya nom snang ba'i lha 'am/_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha 'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 'am/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 'am/_chung 
[\[351b.2\]]zad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha 'am/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lus mngon par 'grub ste/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la ni las sam/_bya ba 'am/_'bras bu [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa de ni dngos 
[\[351b.3\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor de la 'di skad du dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la ni bya ba gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/_
[\[351b.4\]]myir skye ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 
[\[351b.5\]]kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_chung snang gi lhar 
[\[351b.6\]]skye ba 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_che 
[\[351b.7\]]ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye 
[\[352a.2\]]mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 
[\[352a.3\]]'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod pa 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[352a.4\]]nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/_de thob nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bya ba gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lam dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma 
[\[352a.5\]]yin nam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin nam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin nam/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin nam/_dgra bcom pa nyid dngos 
[\[352a.6\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin nam/_rang byang chub dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin nam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin nam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[352a.7\]]ldan 'das lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis 
[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/rang byang chub ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/
[\[352b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos shig dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos thob par byed snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[352b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar na dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_lam gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa yang ma yin gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bstan du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_
[\[352b.4\]]thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[352b.5\]]thabs mkhas pas sems can phyin ci log bzhis phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/_sdug bsngal ba la bde ba'i 'du shes su gyur pa/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la bdag gi 'du shes su 
[\[352b.6\]]gyur pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa la sdug pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/_dngos po la mngon par zhen pa rnams dngos po las rnam par 'grel to/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byis pa so so'i skye 
[\[352b.7\]]bo rnams gang la dngos po'o zhes nas mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu'i dngos po de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin zhes bgyi ba ma mchis sam/_de ste ma mchis na ni las mngon par 'du bgyid par yang ji ltar 'gyur/_
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]sug las des kyang shul rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las ci ste [{]myi [,]mi [}]'grol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor phyin ci log ma gtogs par gang la gnas te/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 
[\[353a.2\]]las mngon par 'du byed pa'i dngos po ni chung ngu na/_skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na ci nas kyang don 'di gsal zhing rdzogs pa dang /_mkhas pas shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe 
[\[353a.3\]]bshad do/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam du mthong ba la [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam mthong ba de gang la gnas shing /_'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[353a.4\]]'das [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam nyid kyang ma mchis na/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam mthong ba de la gnas shing /_'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[353a.5\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'jig rten pa 'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam dang 'dra ba ma yin 
[\[353a.6\]]pa de lta bu yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa 'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/_zag pa ma mchis pa 'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi 
[\[353a.7\]]chos gang yang [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bu ma lags pa de lta bu ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ci [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam la rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam la lam bsgoms pas/_kun nas nyon mongs par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom 
[\[353b.2\]]pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni dngos po ma mchis te/_brjod pa dang /_tshig dang /_sgra dang /_yi ge thams cad kyis gdags su ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[353b.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_me long la gzugs brnyan snang ba de la gang las mngon par 'du byed cing /_mngon par 'du byas pas/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/_byol 
[\[353b.4\]]song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang lhar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni gzhan 
[\[353b.5\]]du na/_byis pa rnams la bslu ba ma gtogs par dngos po ma mchis pa ste/_gzugs brnyan nyid kyang ma mchis na/_gang las mngon par 'du bgyid cing /_mngon par 'du bgyis pas/_sems can dmyal bar 
[\[353b.6\]]mchi ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang lhar 'gyur ba'i sug las lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[353b.7\]]pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de la lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]lam bsgom pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/_lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar 
[\[354a.2\]]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nags stug po dang /_ri dang /_gcong rong dang /_lung 
[\[354a.3\]]pa nas sgra brnyan byung na sgra brnyan de la las gang mngon par 'du byed cing /_mngon par 'du byas pas/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 
[\[354a.4\]]'am/_lha dang myir 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das sgra brnyan de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/_de la gang sug las mngon par 'du 
[\[354a.5\]]bgyid cing mngon par 'du bgyis na sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/_lha dang myir skye ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 
[\[354a.6\]]'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 
[\[354a.7\]]'am/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_
[\[354b\]]

[\[355a\]]
[\[355a.1\]]gyur pa de la 'du shes kyi las gang mngon par 'du byas pas/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/_myir skye ba 
[\[355a.2\]]'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 
[\[355a.3\]]lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_chung snang gi lhar skye ba

[\[355b\]]
[\[355b.1\]]chu klung dang /_grong khyer dang /_skyed mos tshal shin tu ma mchis na/_sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pas/_sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 
[\[355b.2\]]'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/_myir skye ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_'phrul dga'i lhar skye 
[\[355b.3\]]ba 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_snang ba'i lhar

[\[356a.1\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_phyin ci log gi 'du shes de la lam gang bsgoms pas/_kun nas nyon mongs par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa

[\[356b.6\]]skye ba 'am/_mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye

[\[357a\]]
[\[357a.1\]]dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che

[\[357a.4\]]mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba ni skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma la lam gang bsgoms pas/_
[\[357a.5\]]kun nas nyon mongs par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa gang yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma 
[\[357a.6\]]mchis pa'i chos la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul 
[\[357a.7\]]pa mdzad na/_sprul pa de la las gang mngon par 'du byas pas/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/_myir skye ba 'am/_
[\[357b\]]
[\[357b.1\]]rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar 
[\[357b.2\]]skye ba 'am/_tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_chung snang gi lhar skye ba 
[\[357b.3\]]'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_che 
[\[357b.4\]]ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_shin tu mthong ba'i lhar 
[\[357b.5\]]skye ba 'am/_gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lhar skye ba 'am/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye 
[\[357b.6\]]mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pa de la 
[\[357b.7\]]dngos po ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sprul pa de la lam gang bsgoms pas/_kun nas nyon mongs par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la/_rnam par byang bar yang 
[\[358a\]]
[\[358a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_de la 
[\[358a.2\]]gang la la zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_ji 
[\[358a.3\]]ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de bzhin du/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag dang bdag gir bya ba la gnas 
[\[358a.4\]]shing /_sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi/_yang dag pa mthong ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ji ltar yang dag pa mthong ba la 
[\[358a.5\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de bzhin du/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_
[\[358a.6\]]le'u bdun cu'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur 
[\[358a.7\]]ba 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du/_yang dag pa ma mthong ba la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma mchis te/_de ni chos thams cad dngos po ma 
[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]]mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid pas/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang ba ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang 
[\[358b.2\]]ba ma mchis te/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par byang bar gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[358b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ngas rnam par byang bar gsungs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de gang lags/_bcom 
[\[358b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings nyid dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[358b.5\]]pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_de bzhin du gnas pa'i chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_dbyings 'di lta ste/_chos 
[\[358b.6\]]kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni rab 'byor rnam par byang ba ste/_de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis brjod kyi/_de ni brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]cing smos su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_sgra dang tshig thams cad kyi lam las 'das pa'i chos so/_/gsol pa/_
[\[358b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bu/_sgra brnyan lta bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu/_smyig rgyu lta bu/_sgyu ma lta bu sprul pa lta bu lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams 
[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]cad [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bu dang /_chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_chos thams cad [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu dang /_chos thams cad smyig rgyu lta bu dang /_chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /_chos thams 
[\[359a.2\]]cad sprul pa lta bu ste/_dngos po ma mchis pa/_rdzas ma mchis pa la/_bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bzod 
[\[359a.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[359a.4\]]phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[359a.5\]]par bya'o/_/ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[359a.6\]]bya'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs 
[\[359a.7\]]par bya'o/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[359b\]]
[\[359b.1\]]stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/
[\[359b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[359b.3\]]rdzogs par bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/dbang po lnga 
[\[359b.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/'phags 
[\[359b.5\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs 
[\[359b.6\]]par bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon 
[\[359b.7\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/
[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/snying rje chen po yongs 
[\[360a.2\]]su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/
[\[360a.3\]]'od chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes par bya ste/_dbyangs gcig gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan 
[\[360a.4\]]pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/zhes bgyi bar bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[360a.5\]]gang khyod kyis brjod pa'i chos de dag [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu dang /_smyig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu ma yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]
[\[360a.6\]]lam lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu dang /_smyig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par 
[\[360a.7\]]bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam ni yang dag pa ma lags/_sgra brnyan ni yang dag pa ma ma lags/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor ni yang dag pa ma lags/_smyig rgyu ni yang dag pa ma lags/_sgyu ma ni yang dag pa ma lags/_sprul pa ni yang 
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]dag pa ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa ma lags pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_brtson 
[\[360b.2\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid 
[\[360b.3\]]la spyad pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid pa spyad pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_mtha' 
[\[360b.4\]]las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_
[\[360b.5\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_
[\[360b.6\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyad pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /_dbang po lnga la spyad pa dang /_stobs lnga la spyad pa dang /_
[\[360b.7\]]byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi la spyad pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms 
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]]par 'jug pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyad pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[361a.2\]]dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyad pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la spyad pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyad pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyad pa dang /_
[\[361a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /_snying rje chen po la spyad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyad pas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[361a.4\]]chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_yang dag pa ma yin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[361a.5\]]tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad 
[\[361a.6\]]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la 
[\[361a.7\]]spyad pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_dor ba 
[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_dngos 
[\[361b.2\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyad pa dang /_

[\[361b.7\]]spyad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyad pas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so//_//shes rab kyi 
[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_/rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]de ji snyam du sems/_sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[362a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[362a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji 
[\[362a.4\]]snyam du sems/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[362a.5\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/

[\[362a.7\]]ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]'tshang rgya 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nang stong pa nyid bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[362b.2\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_phyi stong pa nyid bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[362b.3\]]chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_phyi nang stong pa nyid bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[362b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bla

[\[367b\]]
[\[367b.1\]]par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya'o/_/snying rje chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya'o/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[367b.2\]]tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya'o/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dus byas pa mngon par 'dus byas pa ste/_'dus byas pa dang /_mngon par 'dus byas pa'i 
[\[367b.3\]]chos kyis ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rab 'byor 'on kyang chos de dag ni thams cad kyang lam bsgrub pa dang /_lam bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba ste/_'bras bu thob pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/
[\[367b.4\]]chos de dag gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba gang yin pa ni mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang de yin te/_de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i 
[\[367b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]
[\[367b.6\]]pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa 
[\[367b.7\]]nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]]dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_
[\[368a.2\]]yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_
[\[368a.3\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa brgyad dam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[368a.4\]]par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de 
[\[368a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_dge ba'i chos gang dang 
[\[368a.6\]]gang rtsom yang de thams cad sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[368a.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa 
[\[368b\]]
[\[368b.1\]]stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[368b.2\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa 
[\[368b.3\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stabs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad 
[\[368b.4\]]pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i 
[\[368b.5\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_
[\[368b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad po de dag yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[368b.7\]]ma byas par/_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bya ba 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus pas/_de'i phyir de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[369a\]]
[\[369a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bur shes so/_/sgra brnyan lta bur shes so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bur shes so/_/smyig rgyu lta bur shes so/_/

[\[371a\]]

[\[372a\]]
[\[372a.1\]{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bur shes so/_/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu dang /_smyig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur shes so/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de 
[\[372a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bur shes so/_/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu dang /_smyig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur shes so/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

[\[372a.4\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bur shes so/_/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu dang /_smyig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur shes so/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[372a.5\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_snying rje chen po [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bur shes so/_/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu dang /_smyig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur shes so/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

[\[372a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thams cad shes pa nyid [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bur shes so/_/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu dang /_smyig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur shes 
[\[372b\]]
[\[372b.1\]]so/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bur shes so/_/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu dang /_smyig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur shes so/_/

[\[374a\]]
[\[374a.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni gzung du [{]myed [,]med [}]cing dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bu sgra brnyan lta bu [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu/_smyig rgyu lta bu/_sgyu ma lta bu/_sprul pa lta bu ste/_sems

[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]yin te/_rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba 'am/_dgra bcom pa 'am/_rang byang chub bam/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i

[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/_mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di

[\[376b.3\]]nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ste/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'o/_/

[\[376b.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_des so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[376b.6\]]dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/
[\[376b.7\]]de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang 
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gsol pa/_
[\[377a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de ste/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang 
[\[377a.3\]]sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du 
[\[377a.4\]]sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog dang /_dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[377a.5\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/_chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/_chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_
[\[377a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/_chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/_dge 'dun dkon mchog 
[\[377a.7\]]kyang gzhan zhig la/_chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan pa ma lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang /_chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog 
[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid de/_chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa yang ma lags/_gzugs ma mchis pa bstan du ma mchis pa/_thogs pa ma mchis pa mtshan nyid gcig 
[\[377b.2\]]pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o/_/de ltar chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/_/'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[377b.3\]]'ong ba'o/_/'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par dgod

[\[377b.6\]]par sangs ma rgyas la/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir/_chos rnams rnam par dgod pa ma mdzad na/_sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam/_byol song gi skye gnas yod par 
[\[377b.7\]]mngon nam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yod par mngon nam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]yod par mngon nam/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha yod par mngon nam/_mtshe ma'i lha rnams 
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]yod par mngon nam/_dga' ldan gyi lha yod par mngon nam/_'phrul dga'i lha yod par mngon nam/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha yod par mngon nam/_tshangs ris kyi lha yod par mngon

[\[382a\]]
[\[382a.1\]]thams cad dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[382a.2\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu
