[\[382a.4\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[382a.5\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong 
[\[382a.6\]]pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[382a.7\]]stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[382b\]]
[\[382b.1\]]bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_
[\[382b.2\]]dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams te/_bcom ldan 'das chos de dag ni kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dra ba/_gcig las gcig 'das pa'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[382b.3\]]'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan la/_tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 
[\[382b.4\]]kyang gzhan te/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_rna ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_sna'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_lce'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_lus kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang 
[\[382b.5\]]gzhan/_sgra'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_dri'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_ro'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_reg gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_chos kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_rna ba'i 
[\[382b.6\]]rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos 
[\[382b.7\]]nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang 
[\[383a\]]
[\[383a.1\]]gzhan/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_rna ba'i 'dus 
[\[383a.2\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_lus kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[383a.3\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi chos 
[\[383a.4\]]nyid kyang gzhan/_rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_
[\[383a.5\]]rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_sred pa'i chos 
[\[383a.6\]]nyid kyang gzhan/_len pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_srid pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_skye ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_rga shi'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_gti mug gi 
[\[383a.7\]]chos nyid kyang gzhan/_lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_
[\[383b\]]
[\[383b.1\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang 
[\[383b.2\]]gzhan/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_
[\[383b.3\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_rang bzhin 
[\[383b.4\]]stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[383b.5\]]chos nyid kyang gzhan/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_
[\[383b.6\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang 
[\[383b.7\]]gzhan/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_
[\[384a\]]
[\[384a.1\]]rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[384a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid 
[\[384a.3\]]kyang gzhan/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_byams pa chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[384a.4\]]'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_dpe byad bzang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'dus byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/_'dus ma byas kyi khams 
[\[384a.5\]]kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mtshan nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags/_chos rnam par dgod par ni ji ltar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[384a.6\]]chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gang la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyid pa lags/_chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[384a.7\]]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sa nas sar 'phar zhing skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug pa lags/_ji ltar skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[384b\]]
[\[384b.1\]]zhugs nas/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/_mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[384b.2\]]par bgyi ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[384b.3\]]bgyi ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_de dag la rnam par rtse bas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[384b.4\]]nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags/_de dag tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa lags/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can 
[\[384b.5\]]rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]gang 'di skad du de ste/_chos thams cad kyi chos 
[\[384b.6\]]mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/_de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/_de nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/_de nyid 
[\[384b.7\]]brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/_de nyid rgyun tu zhus pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/_de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/_de nyid phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams kyi chos 
[\[385a\]]
[\[385a.1\]]mnyam pa nyid/_de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/_de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/_de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/_de 
[\[385a.2\]]nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na/_mtshan nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/_rab 
[\[385a.3\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_'du shes kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_'du 
[\[385a.4\]]byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rna ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong 
[\[385a.5\]]pa nyid ma yin nam/_sna'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_lce'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_lus kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_yid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa 
[\[385a.6\]]de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_sgra'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_dri'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_ro'i chos nyid 
[\[385a.7\]]gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_reg gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_chos kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid 
[\[385b\]]
[\[385b.1\]]stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa/_de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang 
[\[385b.2\]]yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos 
[\[385b.3\]]nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos 
[\[385b.4\]]nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg 
[\[385b.5\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin 
[\[385b.6\]]pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_
[\[385b.7\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_sa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_chu'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_
[\[386a\]]
[\[386a.1\]{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin 
[\[386a.2\]]nam/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_ma rig pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rnam par 
[\[386a.3\]]shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_skye mched drug gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_reg pa'i chos nyid 
[\[386a.4\]]gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_sred pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_len pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_
[\[386a.5\]]srid pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_skye ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rga shi'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin 
[\[386a.6\]]pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_tshul khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_brtson 'grus 
[\[386a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid 
[\[386b\]]
[\[386b.1\]]stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin 
[\[386b.2\]]nam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_
[\[386b.3\]]'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma 
[\[386b.4\]]yin nam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa 
[\[386b.5\]]de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[386b.6\]]kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_dngos po 
[\[386b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de 
[\[387a\]]
[\[387a.1\]]nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_stobs [(]rnam [,]rnams [)]kyi chos nyid gang 
[\[387a.2\]]yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_'phags pa'i 
[\[387a.3\]]bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_gzugs 
[\[387a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid 
[\[387a.5\]]gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa 
[\[387a.6\]]de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 
[\[387a.7\]]kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin 
[\[387b\]]
[\[387b.1\]]nam/_snying rje chen po'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid 
[\[387b.2\]]stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang 
[\[387b.3\]]yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rang byang chub kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos 
[\[387b.4\]]nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i chos nyid gang

[\[387b.7\]]gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/_tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/_'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dam/_'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi mtshan nyid dam/_rna ba'i mtshan nyid dam/_sna'i 
[\[388a\]]
[\[388a.1\]]mtshan nyid dam/_lce'i mtshan nyid dam/_lus kyi mtshan nyid dam/_yid kyi mtshan nyid dam/_gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/_sgra'i mtshan nyid dam/_dri'i mtshan nyid dam/_ro'i mtshan nyid dam/_reg gi 
[\[388a.2\]]mtshan nyid dam/_chos kyi mtshan nyid dam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_lus

[\[388a.7\]]nyid dam/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/_ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/_skye mched drug gi 
[\[388b\]]
[\[388b.1\]]mtshan nyid dam/_reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/_sred pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_len pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_srid pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_skye ba'i mtshan nyid dam/_rga shi'i mtshan nyid dam/_sbyin pa'i pha rol

[\[388b.6\]]mtshan nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/_dran pa nye 
[\[388b.7\]]bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/_dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/_stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/_byang chub kyi yan 
[\[389a\]]
[\[389a.1\]]lag rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/_bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi

[\[389b\]]
[\[389b.1\]]bu'i chos gang yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de lta bas na rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de

[\[390a.1\]]de yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod kyi/_don dam par ni ma yin te/_don dam pa la lus kyi 'du byed dam/_ngag gi 'du byed dam/_yid kyi 'du byed [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_lus kyi 'du byed dang /_ngag gi

[\[392a.7\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes 
[\[392b\]]
[\[392b.1\]]dang bral bar byed cing /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_sna'i 'dus 
[\[392b.2\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du 
[\[392b.3\]]shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa 
[\[392b.4\]]nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 
[\[392b.5\]]'grel pa dang /_sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_chu'i khams kyi 
[\[392b.6\]]'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_rlung 
[\[392b.7\]]gi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_rlung gi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid gyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_nam mkha'i khams 
[\[393a\]]
[\[393a.1\]]kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong 
[\[393a.2\]]pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_'du byed kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_
[\[393a.3\]]'du byed kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral par byed cing /_rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa 
[\[393a.4\]]dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_skye mched drug 
[\[393a.5\]]gi 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral 
[\[393a.6\]]bar byed cing /_tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_sred pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_sred pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_
[\[393a.7\]]len pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_len pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_srid pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_srid pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_
[\[393b\]]
[\[393b.1\]]stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_skye ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_skye ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_rga shi'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_
[\[393b.2\]]rga shi'i 'du shes dang phral nas/_stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /_'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /_'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/_'dus ma byas kyi 
[\[393b.3\]]dbyings stong pa yin yang /_'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su 'god pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthur mi 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de cis stong pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[393b.4\]]stsal pa/_'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste/_rab 'byor la la zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul na/_de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/
[\[393b.5\]]sprul pa de la gang stong pa nyid ma lags pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis te/_stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang /_sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma lags/_mi ldan pa yang ma lags te/_
[\[393b.6\]]de gnyis ka yang stong pa nyid kyis stong na/_de ci'i slad du/_'di ni stong pa nyid do/_/'di ni sprul pa'o/_/zhes bgyi bar rnam par bcab pa mdzad/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid dang /_sprul 
[\[393b.7\]]pa gnyis ka yang stong pa nyid la dmigs su ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa gang sprul pa ma 
[\[394a\]]
[\[394a.1\]]yin pa de lta bu yod dam/_gang sprul pa de ni stong pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten pa'i chos sprul pa lags kyang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye 
[\[394a.2\]]bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar 
[\[394a.3\]]pa'i sgo gsum dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs 
[\[394a.4\]]kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[394a.5\]]dang /_de dag gi 'bras bu gang gis gang zag rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[394a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes gang zag rnam par dgod pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/_de la la la ni nyan thos kyis sprul pa'o/_/
[\[394b\]]
[\[394b.1\]]la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o/_/la la ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa'o/_/la la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'o/_/la la ni nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o/_/la la ni las kyis sprul pa'o/_/rab 
[\[394b.2\]]'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni sprul pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang spangs pa zhes bgyi ba/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong 
[\[394b.3\]]'od ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang sangs rgyas kyis 'am/_sangs rgyas kyis 'am/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang sprul pa lags sam/_bcom 
[\[394b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]bskyed pa 'am/_bkag pa'i chos gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad ni sprul pa'o/_/gsold pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang ma sprul pa'i chos de gang lags/_
[\[394b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' [{]stsald [,]stsal [}]pa/_chos gang la skye ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'gag pa yang med pa de ni ma sprul pa'o/_/gsold pa/_da gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' [{]stsald [,]stsal [}]pa/_mi mnyam 
[\[394b.6\]]ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_chos de ni ma sprul pa'o/_/gsold pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du stong pa nyid las kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo la/_gnyis su yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs te/_chos gang yang stong pa nyid 
[\[395a\]]
[\[395a.1\]]ma [{]yind [,]yin [}]pa de lta bu [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/zhes bka' [{]stsald [,]stsal [}]pa ltar na/_bcom ldan 'das [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yang sprul par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' [{]stsald [,]stsal [}]
[\[395a.2\]]pa/_rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhind te/_rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/_de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/_rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma 
[\[395a.3\]]byas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma byas te/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyis gsol pa/_
[\[395a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi na/_ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' [{]stsald [,]stsal [}]pa/_rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]ci sngon dngos 
[\[395a.5\]]po yod par gyur la/_phyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur ba yod dam/_rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]'di la dngos po yod pa yang med/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_ngo bo nyid kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gzhan gyi dngos po yang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de la gang yongs 
[\[395a.6\]]su shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par 'gyur re skan//_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_chos nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba bstan pa'i le'u ste/_bdun cu rtsa gnyis so//_/
